A bice rpg, if you want to you can even play it as a singke player game, but the base is so courteous and interactive that I'd highly recommend playing alongside others. The game experience is good and the mechanics are good even if you play it in a small device. The downside is the part in which we cannot use a controller when playing on an Ipad or an android... which is very odd.

This game is seriously amazing. Cross platform allows me to log onto my pc and continue playing when I want. As long as you don't mind the gacha element, it's a terrific, free l, open world, Zelda BoTW style adventure with a great story. Edit: after a year of playing and grinding, I find new 5* characters way too costly in terms of play time and the rewards are so excruciatingly minimal. Can't recommend this game anymore

The Game is AMAZING, really. Work of art. However, even though I was advancing well, my account has suddenly disappeared from the server. It keeps saying "parameter error" and when I type my email it says it doesnt exist. Really hope they can fix this....

Great game over all. Graphics are good, gameplay is good, combat and exploration and leveling is good. It's all good. Similar to BotW in mechanics but NOT a clone. I do think this game should be optimized better on mobile because even with high end devices the game is still laggy even at the lowest settings. Speaking of settings, the game still manages to look good even with everything set to the low. I highly recommend playing this if you like open air RPG's.

Really great app. Character designs and Graphics are good. I like how there is also a multiplayer option, but only for four, but still cool. Besides all that I also love the story line and at the same time you can adventure like fight mobs or bosses. Something I don't really like is the update of the serenitea teapot. You can't really do much inside the teapot, like all you do is just build. I recommend adding some features for that.

For a mobile game, it's sooo astonishing, I love the style and everything in this game, the details and mechanics. It would be cool if you can develop the game more in terms of compatibility, I have friends that loves the game but because of the compatibility issue, they have to wait a little, I wish you can develop this issue fast, Thanks!

It is used to be a good game with amazing gameplay, design and ost. But it's not worth to spend any more money on this. The anniversary event is not remarkable not only reward but also events that should be designed for all players can participate. They only care players who can draw and edit videos for free marketing purposes. I have played this game for 360 days and the anniversary event is very disappointing. The quality of recent story quest is also disappointing.

Beautiful game with several big cons. While not impossible for f2p players, it takes a lot of time to save up primogems for guaranteed character. Also, there are only 5 body types and close to no diversity in skin color. The biggest problem are the artifacts. The RNG is horrible and it can take years (literally, i mean YEARS) to get a good artifact set. Resin is not the problem, it's the drop rates and RNG.

A beautiful world, and a good experience with fun gameplay at first, but later in the game almost nothing I do feels truly rewarding. The rewards are always so underwhelming and building new characters is no longer as fun for me because of how difficult it is as a result of the game's strange character leveling system and the tedium that comes with collecting the limited resources. I would give a much higher rating if it wasn't for it's major flaws that become apparent in the endgame.

I have been playing since release and the gameplay is what keeps me playing. What I don't enjoy is hours and hours of dialogue you have to go through with the story quests. Please give a skip button for this. I have never played a game that does not have a skip option for cutscenes. I have requested this multiple times through survey feedback and nothing gets done. Everything else is great, but it gets annoying when you just want to play the quests without dialogue and cutscene interruptions.

This game is amazing. I've yet to be able to put it down. The world is absolutely stunning to look at and explore. The gameplay mechanics are easy to learn for beginners yet still tough enough to master. Another big plus is there are no ads and no need to soend any real world money (although there is an in-game store). Easily the most fun I've ever had playing a game of its kind.

This game was advertised to me as a mmorpg. It is not I see that it is always online and the story style of it and gameplay is amazing. Cons thought are that t it lacks customization, not an mmo and I have to switch between characters instead of creating one and sticking to it which for an mmo is kinda important. But honestly if you spin it around to later on choose a class and stick with it you have hit gold.

It's a lot of fun. I'm not very good at games but the combat isn't too difficult or too easy. Pretty big map. I think some quests could be a little clearer on what I'm supposed to do, and the camera moves on its own when I don't want it to sometimes. Also, I NEED to pet the animals. Please. Love that they still interact with the character though.

The dialogue is a bit slow and cut scenes can't be skipped. But the game is fun. A bit tedious on grinding for the mat's for Wishes (character/weapon summons) Best part is being able to carry your account from platform to platform Update: would also like to add that the game needs a Fast forward option for the dialogue. A Skip feature for Any/All cut scenes, better camera management during Combat (it's constantly sinking into the Dirt) and characters get knocked over by the SlightedOf breezes

i've been playing for 2 years now and i can only say is that this game is a gem!! the gameplay, characters, plot, graphics, background music and the VAs are absolutely gorgeous!! also, it doesnt matter much if you are f2p player because there are many quests and events wherein you can grind primos, the only downside is that the wishing system suck big time if you are unlucky. but still, this game is really amazing!
fix your game IN my expirence the game did not show damage text icant se when the water is frozen and ican Even see fk grass 2 years of waiting for an update to fix it fk you

It takes up way too much storage and it's super laggy even when I'm connected to wifi or when my storage is enough it's laggy to a high hell. I really enjoyed this game and I have some amazingly built characters but I just can't deal with the lag. It's so frustrating when I'm doing a quest and the characters move so slowly, and with all the quests there are I can barley finish one just with the amount of lag. This doesn't happen when I play other games they run smoothly effortlessly.

I think a creaters wants to put a game size increase by the all in games update and don't put any update after game download thts you know why bcs a update size is around a 20gb so that's why we want to a always turn on our sreec for update that's why our phone get a so heat and it's chance to lose ur phone when updating that's why I'm asking

I enjoy the game but the rng gacha system being on basically everything really pulls it back. It's even on the stats of the gear itself and there's no way to change them so you just have to continue griding and pray. More co-op things to do would be very nice. Balancing for characters isn't the best. Also no controller support for Android after a year really sucks. All that said it is very pretty and nice music. Story can be good to.

Great game, but needs optimization. A great game to play, but the game will lag and render a lot slower when your entering an instance with a lot of buildings, objects or details. Perhaps its a server issue, perhaps its my S9 unable to run it properly. Needs an optimization for frame rates and lags. Other than that its a 5/5

Not much to say about it aside from it being an amazing game, goo- I mean, perfect quality and a great adventuring. The character list is so exciting to watch Thus leveling up your characters and party. The game even let's you explore the free space of this wanderland, fight enemies to unlock treasure and even has that good vibe. The BGM is relaxing and sky changes are beautiful. It's worth the space on my phone it took really

I love this game! Paimon is super cute and there are so many quests that are easy and hard but fun to do. The quests in the game are like puzzles but in a different way the wind gliders are super easy to use and the challenges can be hard depending on what level the hurlichurls are on or any monster you've seen or never seen. This game is fun and I believe it does not need any changes. Plus I like how you can make up a name for your character. Mine is Sakani!

Overall amazing game. I love the graphics, game play, and events. I wish that there was more ways to earn primos but its still very plausible to get a 5 star every other event depending on how much you play. I wish there was more representation for other races and hair types. And it would be great if some more difficult quests had in game tips for them other than the directions

This game is honestly awesome. You will find yourself many times playing it more then you intended. It's almost without a complaint, and even those that exist are minor. You can play on PC, PS4 and Mobile while having the same progression on your account no matter the platform. So my only complaint is that on PC you can't change your key bindings which can be frustrating. All in all, more then a solid game for a free to play game.

It's a strange combination of a Skyrim type finite single player gameplay and gacha mechanics with little reason to pay for them. But if you are willing to accept a bit of randomness in what characters and weapons you are able to get, it is a great game. Quests are just as shallow as Skyrim, but the world is so easy to get lost in. A lot of the game is about collecting items and grinding but it is exceptionally enjoyable in this one.

A very outstanding game. Its like assassin creed with a twist of 4 characters that can do combo. The combo part is the most attractive for me. Overall fun and relax game. Only slight downside for me, even with smartphone huawei p20, the flow is a bit sluggish, i need to put the lowest setting for the game to be a bit smooth to play. Will be playing this game for a long time. Thumbs up. Keep up the great work guys.

Tons of potential, but held back by unreasonable time gating that feels like the game barely even wants you to play. It's been an issue since launch and only becomes more of an issue as the game gets larger, but Hoyoverse never makes meaningful improvements to it. Resin requirement / time gating needs to be removed from artifact farming entirely, would solve almost all of the game's problems and would encourage people to spend more money more often.

This feels like a proper full fledged RPG game but its free. In love with its game mechanic, fighting system, and storyline. I like the exploratory aspect of the game. And i like that i can play single player most of the time, and if i newd to coop, just coop for domains and stuff, and you're done. No commitment. Awesome game. Cant wait for content updates

It's an awesome game, I love it, but I don't know if it's my phone or my reception, but it tends to freeze and slow down fairly often, but when it's smooth it's SMOOTH! the combat, dialogue and animation is a work of art and the constant updates and fixes are worth the wait! A well lovedandhonest company and game!

At first I didn't bother with the game, coz I thought it'd be one of those generic hack and slash RPGs that you'll be able to beat mobs and mobs of monsters by just pressing the same button over and over again, I guess I was wrong. This game is great. If you played Zelda Breath of the Wild, the gameplay is comparible to that, however it has its' own twists. My only complaint is the sound. This could be just a compatibility issue with my phone, but the sound has some cracking or static noises.

So far, the best game i've ever played, but...it appears to be some audio distortion when in comes to mobile users i supposed, or maybe just the android users...it doesnt affect the gameplay much but the cutscenes are, some cutscenes aren't tht smooth and laggy, and sometimes don't even show the whole cutscene...please fix it if possible

I really like the game so I totally suggest playing it. On mobile is a different story. It runs ok but I unless tou have a newer phone that can run these kinds of games you have to make sure all your other apps are closed and graphics are all on low. Even then it's not that great. It's definitely good enough though if you really have to play it on mobile. Oh and be prepared for it to take up a whole 7 gbs

Amazing, beautiful world. Tons to do great voice acting. This game is exceptional and exquisite. The ONLY reason it does not get a full 5 stars is a lack of controller support. I get having touch controls but the lack of gamepad support is baffling. Just about every single person who will play this will have a controller they can use be it an Xbox, PS4, or even some 3rd party (I use the Razer Kishi). PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE ADD CONTROLLER SUPPORT!

No controller support. Because of that I stopped playing, the game is unplayable otherwise. I cant barely even see the screen because of all the buttons, along with my hands, them the screen gets filthy because of using my fingers which just adds to the annoyance. Deserves a 1 star rating. Would deserve 5 stars if there was controller support.

The game doesn't work. I have 3.5 ram and i didn't even make it to the playthrough. My phone literally crashes if i ever play it. My phone was build for gaming. I played PUBG MOBILE, COD MOBILE, MOBILE LEGENDS (sucks) and many more games but this is the first game to have ever needed so much ram in the entire history of phones. Please fix it. Like make the settings super low so i can probably play and adjust it if i have a better phone.

In my own opinion. This game is the best of all the best. Everything is beautiful! The animations, the effects, the voices, the sceneries, the backstory of every character, and EVERYTHING!! I've always wanted to play this game but I can't cuz my mobile phone can't handle it. I'm still trying to save money so I can buy Redmagic 6s Pro so I can finally play this game. I hope this game's popularity keeps rising up and become more and more Amazing and beatiful!! Oh no! The words are limited!! I stil

Although I was pretty skeptical whether or not this would be worth my time, I decided to try it out. I am now kinda in love with this rpg/BoTW clone. Also, its free from the in-app-purchase hell most other free2play experiences are trapped in, which is nearly unheard of (for some reason). My only complaints are; 1. Its kinda difficult to get stones for wishes. Kinda lame, but understandable. 2. This experience would be perfect on a console, and my phone isn't particularly large.

This is the best JRPG on mobile game. I'm happy with the graphics and gameplay. but controls need a custom placement where we can place buttons. Also co-op features is what makes it even more fun. If we can own a pet, ride (horse) and add variety of wild animals instead of boars, squirrels, cats and etc. that would be wonderful :3

LOVE THIS GAME!!! The quality is so mesmerising and beautiful. Every single character design are cute. I love how they made even the simplest characters have voice acting lines, it adds flavour to the whole story. The storyline of the overall game is very interesting too, even some side quest stories are fun to sit through. I can only give this 4 stars though because the loading screen sometimes takes too long to load.. Hope in the future they would minimise this issue :/

This is, to be put simply, a more complex, engaging, and fun version of Breath of the Wild that is available on mobile. The story's engaging, the gameplay is flawless, the quality is topnotch. But I can't give it full stars because of one simple flaw: resources. The game's system requires heavy investment and time to be for a chance to get the characters you want. It's rates are very low, and the resources are scarce. So not only is it hard to get good characters, it's also hard to upgrade then

HI! If you plan on become a traveler in Teyvet, read this. I have been playing the game for 5 months now and I can say I love it. The story and character are great, so are the mechanics, but If you plan on download this game on your phone, forget it! Even if you use most of your space to be able to support the game and it's constant updates, using a common phone you'll only be able to play the game in the lowest stings. Your game is still going to crash constantly, slowing down your progress!

Needs controller support asap. Basic things are easy to do, but once you get into rapid character changing, combos, and tighter movement it becomes a hassle. Also I have large hands that cover the screen and imporant information gets covered like the bottom character in the party roster on the right side. I play on a Note 20 Ultra and cannot fathom how others play it on small screens.

This game is great ,i played it for a few months and id say i recommend it ,the graphics are so beautiful, there are tons of interesting characters , the story is interesting and you can freely explore the open world, but some parts are tedious and also sometimes the game crashes or goes slow ,I played it on many different devices and the same keeps happening, also once you make the missions that you can and you need to level up to do the next one sometimes is too tedious and you can do nothing

This has got to be one of the most fun games I have ever played. You can explore new areas, characters, builds, quests, and events. You can never run out of things to do, and you can obviously tell they put hard work into it. The characters designs are amazing, (especially Klee) and there attacks are so cool! (Klee solos ofc) MY whole phone is based on Genshin Impact (It's only based on Klee) It's such a great game!

This is definitely one of the BEST GAMES EVER MADE. first of all i wanna thank the developers for making this master piece. This game is perfect, the graphics, the story, the details, etc. The game is so well made that i can't believe IT'S FREE. PLAY IT IN CO-OP MODE (unlock this game mode by getting to adventure rank 16): I play with my brothers, one uses ps4, the other uses pc, and i use my phone, we have a lot of fun adventuring through the beautiful and huge map of Genshin Impact.

Been playing this game for a year and a half now. I LOVE the world. It's so effing gorgeous! The characters are super cool. However, sometimes the game gets boring. Yes I know, shocking right? Well... the game ropes you in because it's so addictive and immersive, and before you know it, you kinda reach a halt when it comes to content. Thankfully, Genshin is always updating and adding events to their game, so you never run out of things to do. However, it can get repetitive after a while. 4/5
One of the best games so far. Everything one expects from an adventure game is present.

Don't get me wrong, I appreciate the game for what it is. I stopped playing a bit ago though because the massive emphasis on optimization when you reach each endcap requiring grinding and being on top of the gacha simply ruined the enjoyment for me ultimately. I had fun while it lasted, but that wasn't what i wanted out of this game. I'll admit, asking for something along the lines of Breath of the Wild on mobile was up there. But something along those lines would have been great.

Its awesome! I'd give it a 5 star if there weren't any problems in my game Play, everytime I play ofc i log in so the problem is idk how many mins i can play but everytime i do smth like fighting enemies the game starts lagging and the screen turns back and kicks me out and when im in co-op and that happens all my progress is restarted i hope this gets fixed cuz i rlly wanna play genshin while on the go

Laggy. I think that since the game is available for my phone it should be able to run. Even putting the graphics on the lowest and clearing storage it still doesn't run nicely. The game then lags when jumping and fighting, which is something you do a lot in genshin. Terribly disappointed, I guess I'll have to wait for it to come out on the switch and who knows when that'll be.

I love the game. It's really fun to play, there's so much story, a lot of things to explore and find, but it gets a bit boring later. The gacha system takes ages&you barely get enough primogems from activities. Saving primos takes ages. And there's the lack of diversity; while the character designs are enjoyable and unique, there's no diversity in body types and skin color. Please do improve that! That&the slow-paced farming for materials are points of critique for an otherwise enjoyable game.

The game is Great and it has a lot to do. I can spend hundreds of hours on it and not even see everything. I get the whole 16GB download, the graphics, textures, and 3d models/rigs are amazing. The only problem I had, witch reduced it into 4 stars is that I have greater frame rates and almost no lag while playing it, but I don't get why the opening scene is so laggy. I only saw 2 or 3 frames of the whole thing. I think the opining scene is rendered on your phone, not a video. PLZ fix this. More

The game has beautiful art, animations, characters, etc. The story lines are also thoughtful and interesting. It's a great game to play if you have a lot of time on your hands. However, it's come to the attention of players that the company did not announce or give a more generous reward for their recently passed anniversary, as many games of similar or lower calibar have done. It's not something to ruin the general gameplay, but something to think about on who you want to support monetarily.

The storyline has so much potential but its executed sooo slowly. I'm nearly ar57 and from what I remember we only had around 6 quests in which there's useful information for finding our sibling. I get that it's a new game with high graphics but updates take a month and a half and there's a lack of main story quests. If people want to take things slow and enjoy the game and other quests, they should have that option but a quest about our sibling should be released every 2 months at least

Super beautiful game but the story is extremely bland and at times simply doesn't make sense. If they fixed that up then I'd give it 5 stars, but as is it lacked enough plot to keep my interest past about an hour into the game. The graphics are phenomenal for a phone though. Controls are a bit tough.

I don't recommend this game for people who are impatient. It just takes too much time grinding a good build/set for a character (unless if you pay, it'll be easier). And the problem is it lacks endgame content, every time an event has ended, it gets SUPER boring... and it'd be more fun if Co-Op mode is more than 4 players tbh. And we REALLY need more primogem rewards from daily commissions, stories and events, how are we supposed to get the character we want if there are double banners now?!

The game itself has tons of potential and is very enjoyable AT FIRST. I really really enjoyed it up until the moment I finished the story, and there is absolutely nothing to do except slowly make your characters more powerful when there isn't any end game content to use that power in. The customer service is kinda trash and the developers has zero transparency, they refuse to provide any kind of roadmap or give any information to the players and they refuse to fix or even address the biggest issues in the game. If the developers added some end game content and were more transparent about the games future this would be a 5 star review.

Im enjoying the game so much. Graphics is pretty good and you can interact with the characters which is really fun. Not only that you can even stroll around, explore, collect items and kill monsters as well. But watch out 'cause you need to check their levels too. It's easy to use, in fact you'll get used to it when you're a beginner because there are guides that will help you along the way. Thank you for this awesome game. It's the best game I've ever tried. ü•∞

Brilliant exploration, beautiful graphics, amazing combat all clad in the traditional casino-style gacha game. The game is fairly good with giving you currency to spend on summons, but at the same time it always leaves you thinking, what if I spend a coin or two. That feeling of somewhere right around the corner, you'll hit the famous pay wall. For a free game there's a solid 20-30 h of great gameplay in one of the best mobile games I've ever played, without spending coins, so do what you will

I really did like this game on launch, i played for a month straight. Forward a year later and everything became boring. The events are unoriginal and a chore to do. The story quests are inconsistent in pacing and content (there was even one with a million plot holes!), And the combat is lackluster, apart from character skills, there is nothing enjoyable about the combat. Once you get used to the characters you have, everything gets old really quickly.

Great gameplay, story telling and character development for a free game. The depth of the lore is amazing letting you become engrossed in the world and it's characters. Best way to enjoy it is to not speed-run content otherwise you'll be frustrated with resin system. Rewards have started to be a bit lackluster compared to the beginning, hopefully it can be improved sooner rather than later.

It's an amazing game. Love the combat gameplay, exploration, the designs, the story, events, and characters. What I would suggest is to steer away from part of the community that give Genshin a bad rep. We all aren't like that, we just love the game and enjoy it for what it is. This game as become my favorite game from 2020 up to this year, I'm sure it will stay that way. I can't wait to see more characters and regions, Genshin has in store for us.

This game is amazing on all aspects, i think more people should play it, that being said, this masterpiece with hundreds of hours of content and exploration comes at a price, not any device can handle it, even my phone that has the recommended requirements often stuttered or crashed, but this is the optimizations fault, that being said, this is a great experience, that you should get right now, I'd personally recommend it on PC, wait for the Switch version, or check it out right now on mobile.

Alot of problens. When I load the tutorial after defeating the slime my audio just cuts out. I tried to restart the game but it keeps happening everytime I defeat the slime. So I ignored it and moved on but when I touch the teleporter my game just freezes and just gets stuck there all the way. Please fix this. I can't progress or even enjoy the game like this.

Been playing for a year now and all i can say is that the resin system needs improvement as for it's hard to farm for artifacts and materials with 160 resin per day. As well the rewards are somewhat stingy/not enough for wishes which makes you pay real money for the wanted character/weapon. Great storyline and graphics, really like how a open world game that doesn't really limit you to something is finally on mobile.

Gameplay is very nice, lore not do much (but still decent). Most dialogue options or decisions make no difference and the overall interaction with the world is limited. Time consuming. Combat is very fun and the many ways to build a character makes it interesting. For a free game, it's 5 stars if I didn't value story and interactivity.

The game runs great on my phone and the gameplay can get really addictive. Its art style and graphics are also really gorgeous. I just hope controller support on the Android app is being looked into. After also playing it on the PS4, playing with a controller does add to the fun and easy of control.

It's so good. The art is great, character are fun. Everything was great until this recent update. It seems like the app can't go 5 minutes without crashing That and it freezes half the time now. This really sucks because I've been playing since day one, and nothing like this has happened until this recent update. It makes me sad :/

Game is pretty good. Gatcha isn't bad. But two major problems. Poor controls and settings to fix and or invert. And anytime you minimize the app for anything it completely reboots it which takes forever to get back in. Accidentally answer a text reboot, want to look something up, complete reboot. It's horrible. Phone call in the middle. Reboot.

The main problem of this game is if I stop playing it for few months then in order to play again even though i didn't uninstall it, I have to download 10gb data again after opening it exclusive of updates even after entering login ID and password. Normally most of the games save the game progress and even after months it stays the same and we can play afyer entering login ID and password. I hope the developers can look into this issue as soon as possible as it is ruining the game experience.

Hello mihoyo! I think you might recognize me from the email (julliane jeon). If you didn't saw it, please check. It's abt the graphics. I can't see them. When I walk or rotate the point of view, The graphics disappear. Maybe a bug or glitch. My phone is oppo reno3. I personally think that the problem is the phone, not the game. If you're gonna read the email, No need. This one's just the same as the email so if you saw this, Thank you very much for reading.

Overall nice and one of the best game ever. But needs some minor improvements. Give optional download for voice pack. Tired of reading through side mission sometimes, availability of voice pack would make the experience the best. Increase more co-op and multiplayer activities. Fix latency(ping) issues. Except these, I find everything else as best in Genshin Impact
Amazing game, quality gameplay, story and open world exploration. *Chefs kiss*
I really enjoy playing this game. An open world exploration with anime themed.

Characters are great so many to choose from lots of ability powers an equipment is nice the large huge map is wonderful to explore. Story is very cool everyone should like. Color and grafics are beautiful wow. Plenty of voice actors so we donot have to read all the time. Only problem ive had was audio cracks and alters sound/voices. Does this time to time needs to be fixed asap.

I don't usually play this game as often as I do with other game, but sometimes when I do play I usually do some side quests for awhile. Although some of the main quests are kinda hard to complete so I could use some hints, but other then that it's a fun game and the character selection and their different abilities are interesting and sometimes useful.
Nice n big world, but too many female side characters

Seems pretty fun so far even though there are way too many different things to memorize and collect. Also we need controller support! *One year later the game as expected became more and more predatory with its gacha system and the rewards are more stingier than ever. Even worse, the new characters are released with poorly designed kits. The anniversary rewards are laughable as well. Going f2p until things get better or until I get bored of the game and I would advise others to do the same.

I dont know why people think from the game so much in primo , the game is free so you need to thank hoyoverse for this beautiful grafics game , and even hoyoverse dint get the money from trees to make characters you like and that beautiful world ‚ù§Ô∏è

Absolutely amazing! Best mobile game I have ever played. It possesses a lot of problematic content that other mobile games do, like micro transactions, but never requires or harasses you with it. I love the gameplay (BoTW with unbreakable weapons), characters, enemy designs, lengthy sidequests and plot points...just everything about this game is AMAZING!
I m having in game purchase issue like ("Couldn't complete your transaction. Your play balance can only be use in India ") Any one else having this issue!!

I've been playing since launch and I've seen some major improvements on in-game content throughout the updates. However, communication between the company and players has been steadily declining, to the point where sincere feedback isn't taken into account anymore. It definitely influences the experience, especially with a game in which people invest a lot of time (and for many players money as well).

I have been playing this game since last to last year and it has always been so legendary!!! Its amazing for everything, including its visuals/graphic and its cool theme~ This game almost seems like a whole anime to me!! It also has creative characters ^^ ligit the best!! genshin forever <3 Can you guys make a update for chromebooks tho, i cant control my controls properly~ A chromebook screen and controls would be great- thank you!!

This game is one of the best ones I have ever downloaded. I am definitely keeping it! Don't be discouraged by how long it takes to download! (I almost was) it is so worth it! I cant wait to play more! Prob the best adventure game you can get. Though I would hope for less glitching when you don't have the best connection. I have had to do domains ten times over because of this.
This is the best game so far, but after the update the game began always crashing. Please fix it.

I adore this game - the music, the graphics, the designs, the landscapes, etc. It's all so beautiful and well done. I noticed people are complaining about storage, but keep in mind this game is HUGE, so a large amount of GB makes sense considering the amount of stuff that's in this game. I don't think people appreciate all the effort put into this game sometimes - it's fantastic!

I'm both a ps4 and mobile player and I've played since 1.4ish, so quite a while. I've gotten this on mobile to play with my friends on a driffernt server but I've noticed a few things which kinda bumped this down to a 3 star. Firstly, this is not a beginner friendly game at the moment. What I mean is that the characters on the current banners level up materials are locked behind places you can't get to early game. Making it hard to advance with those characters. Would put more but word limit.

I was only able to play for an hour and a half whenever I did "play" it was barely playable it was so unbelievably laggy and I couldn't do anything about it. It may just have been my device though that's why I gave it 5 stars also the game seemed good for the hour and a half I "played" :) Try it you might have better luck than me :( It also needs a LOT of storage to be playable so good luck!

Definitely a battery burner like most mobile games. Graphics are amazing if you have the internet for it, still pretty nice when you don't haha. Story is constantly being updated and always keeps you interested. New characters and landscapes keep you busy. Other players are always friendly and helpful in co-op mode. Overall great game and I always try to recommend it.

Really really great game!!! Only reason I didn't give 5 stars was the gotcha aspect of it, which honestly isn't nearly as bad as other gotcha games. Only bad part about it is that the game is much more difficult without getting characters through the gambling system. Besides that, the game looks gorgeous and has a lot of really good story elements.

Now time to edit my review after 900+ day I play this game. I just can say I love this game, the story, new map, new even, character and weapon + item in this game is very Interesting and I hope the next update can give me more surprise.

The game is very nice overall, the plot, the graphics, the gameplay, everything is great. My only reason for giving a 4 star though is because I can't run the game smoothly (probably because my phone is only mid end), I do hope there would be a future graphic settings where even low-end android players can make Genshin a smooth fps experience

I never do ratings but this game is actually incredible. cross play with friends on pc is amazing and because it saves in the cloud, I play on my phone on the go, laptop when I'm at home. when I tell you the graphics are actually real, it blew my mind away how perfectly, exactly like Zelda this game is. So much to do, im super excited to discover the open world and do all the missions and daily stuff. COMPLETELY FREE and Truly do not need to buy anything!!

Absolutely fantastic! what can I say? this game is one of the greatest mobile games out there in my opinion, graphics? 10/10. gameplay? 10/10 my phone can run this game at max graphics and it's absolutely beautiful. the only thing I have to say is when playing for awhile, it starts to absolutely BAKE my phone. I guess that's the price for good graphics though.
When I downloaded this it's only 300 MB But when I open it and start to play it will be take 28000 mb . oh my god, how can I downloaded it

i love this game, absolutely amazing, the amount of content is great, it is very fun to play, the characters they add are just so amazing, same thing goes for the storyline and new locations. this game is my first and favorite option for when i am bored, if i don't have daily quests, commissions, weekly bosses, etc or don't have any resin remaining i can just explore the world farming essential materials, exploring finding chests and doing puzzles, which all keeps me highly entertained.

Graphic is nice and love the storyline. Play the game with PC using keyboard and mouse for better gaming experience. Game is not phone friendly as buttons keep getting in the way especially when you are on archer mode. Updates reaching 5gb? Again! not mobile phone friendly. Another note, perhaps add sit function for quick hp recovery, shortcut function to switch party? Also, if mobs can interrupt attacks then players should too

The graphics, gameplay, character designs, quest, etc. are very good. The only thing is, u need a very good internet connection to play it smoothly. Even after reducing all the graphics to its lowest, my phone still freezes. And pls add another feature, to let players change the controls according to our wishes.

I don't really do review bombing. I hate the idea of it. But, if i'm being honest- the rating isn't just for the rewards. I've come back into the game and i can, in all honesty say, it's gotten dull. The grind and daily content is short and unfullfilling, the gacha system continues to be trash with the 2 hard pity necessary for banner, maps being kind of barren and the exploration basically boiling down to "go to the interactive map, alt tab to genshin and go where the map tells you to". They did fix the gameplay from a year ago to being more interractive and responsive, but from materials grind to level up boost grind, it's too tiring to actually get into. If you plan on bothering, just play through the story mode and don't get invested. Wait for a couple of months, maybe play only the event stuff, and when a new region comes out just play the story mode on that too.

Overall, the game itself is beautiful to look at, and all the characters have amazing designs and voices! It includes fun things like co-op, events, gacha pulling, and so many more things I can't say because I would be spoiling. Though the downloads can be pretty long, and it takes a lotttt of storage, it's definitely pretty worth it, in my opinion. I also like how the pay wall doesn't affect the game too much, and a ftp account is actually possible. 100% recommend.

Great game, even though I hit the content wall very quickly. Fun quests. Interesting lore. Cute characters. Love the cocogoat(Ganyu). Fun to build interesting team comps. Fun to do co-op runs against the hypostasis and in domains. Only issues/downsides are audio crackling on mobile and screen always wants to re-center looking up, gacha, quick content wall, mora becomes scarce during leveling, tough to find primogems after playing through most of the story, and gets grindy/repetative.

Love the game. It has beautiful scenery, game design and a wide variety of characters. I had a small issue when i tried to open the game, it just kept loading and then said there was an error and i couldn't play for three days. But over all it's an amazing game and i really enjoy palying it.

Great game if you're here for the experience, I'd argue even the best one out there. However, if you were to stay here for long, you gonna have to deal with a variety of problems. From devs not fixing the most simple mistakes for years (No joke) to blantly ignoring their community when they are unhappy. Probably the most significant issue with this game is that it doesn't allow you to play whenever you want to play it after you're done with the quests, so instead it becomes a second job.

Been playing this game for a year. Overall the art, graphics and music are phenomenal. The lore and world building is intriguing enough to get me to theorize. The characters and exploration in this game are charming and well designed. However the one thing that demotivates and cancels out the mentioned positives, is the artifact system. It's layered RNG over RNG, over RNG. It's ridiculous! I've been farming for one set for months and still get terrible artifacts. Please make it less RNG-like!

Great game, I've been playing for 2 and a half years and it's still a big interest of mine, but the storage space is laughable. It takes up 30GB on my phone, and i only have one language downloaded for the game so I've kept it to a minimum where possible. This is an issue that has been ignored constantly, especially for mobile players. We were promised that the storage would be reduced over a year ago, and no action was still taken. Please just fix this already.

The game got better in the recent few updates. As for the reason, it's because there has been new stuff to explore on each update for the last few patches and the lore reveals have made the plot more interesting. However, the game lacks some serious QoL improvements and more endgame content like Spiral Abyss. Although this has turned into my comfort game, I still wouldn't recommend this to people who can manage to find time to play for long periods.
The game has improved now with better main storyline questes(Archon Quests)

Hands down, this might be the best game I ever played on mobile. Still I have some suggestions on physics of clothes and character when he/she is leaping down. I think character should come to a diving pose if the distance is too huge. Also if it's not, clothes should be effected by the air stream moving it upwards. Also there are certain fountains in the game like the one near crafting table in Mondstadt which has no elemental reaction. Love & support to the developers! Thank you
I have had so much h fun with genshin I can't even think of any down sides except how long it takes to update because I'm so excited to play.

I just updated it and when I get in, the second loading screen finish it give me "reconnecting to server" before go to loading screen again. It fine for like a few times but it keeps on repeating like more than 20 times already my line is fine too. I try again the next day and it's still like that. It keeps on repeating and it's not like I can properly log out like this, it's getting annoying.

I both love and hate this game. I'm still playing and enjoying it, but there are so many things that I find frustrating. I love that its casual and requires less time commitment. The combat system is good, and it's periodic events are quite creative. But it's unfriendly to new players for reasons I can't get into cos of char limit. I appreciate that they do not obfuscate the gacha currency like other games but they are also very miserly by comparison. The artifact stat system is too random.

I love the game. I have been playing since it launched. And since this is not my first game that requires obtaining characters and weapons from a pick up draw, I wonder if in the future "Mihoyo" will give away or give us the option to pick a 5 star character for free; or at least let us be able to buy one. Anyways a trully amazing game that fills me with joy when I play.

Genshin is an amazing game so much to do and see. My friends and I even make stories about it and a what could be scenarios. I play it every day and sometimes It gets boring and repetitive but it's still developing while mihoyo is always ask for feedback slowly making the game better and better. The music, the background and character are phenomenal.

An incredible game that I cannot believe is free. Don't spend money you don't have to! I've already put more time into this game than I have any other cell phone game in history and I've only had it like One week. Is deathly lots of encouragement for you to purchase more Items but in reality you can get a fair bit of stuff for free by just playing the game for a few hours if you really want to spend money wait until you've played a decent amount there is nothing that you can't do!

This is a really great game, unfortunately for me I started it on console, I made tons of progress, but now I don't have free access to my console, and there's no way to carry my progress from console to mobile, which is Absurdly disheartening, seeing as I had a few limited 5 stars that are gone now. I'll play on mobile, but the lack of cross save between the versions is why my score is the way it is. Also for mobile, the option to rearrange the button layout would be nice

I love this app so much! It is a great game. But, the character designs are not very great, specifically in Sumeru. Sumeru is based off of the middle east (india, turkey, etc.), and a lot of characters have inaccurate designs based off of the culture. For example, Dori has a Turkish inspired design, but there are many inaccurate parts. A lot of characters are also whitewashed. Why is the other regions accurate based off of cultural designs, but not Sumeru? Also, Primogems are too hard to earn!

The game is very addictive and interesting. I've never played these kind of story telling games for this long before because the story was badly made or there just weren't many options... In this game you can actually explore the world and fight against monsters without it being a quest. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because the placement of diffrent things such as changing the party ppl, is in weird places. If you have an older/weak phone I don't recommend this game to you. It is good tho!!!

From 5 stars to 1, why? well if the game can change a LOT of them problems that most of us are dealing with. Bugs and everything are common issues, but the content of the game is getting BORING as the time goes by. The hype train for a week is fine but afterwards it goes rolling down the hill. I used to love this game so I hope mihoyo will make some changes or at least try to make some.

I am about 1 week in playing as a pure F2P, and I am finding the game to be very fair in terms of being able to grind for free characters and equipment and upgrades. Lots of free gifts during the first 20 levels. The gameplay is great too (think anime Breath of the Wild). I love the voice acting in multiple languages, and the world is engaging and immersive. I'll come back in 6 months and modify this rating, but am very happy at the moment. Cross-saves are supported from PC too! Easy 5* from me.

Great game honestly. The music is great, Paimon is annoying, graphics and character design are amazing. However, recent anniversary rewards and content are disappointing. There was so much more miHoyo could have done to improve player experience (not just rewards). Quality of life changes would have sufficed, introduction of toggleable constellations would have been great or maybe reducing the resin regen time. Overall great game just disappointing how they treat their players.

I was put off by the idea of another gachapon game, but genahin impact has surprised and impressed me at every turn, putting out as much, if not more quality content than a triple a studio, for free. The base unpaid content is immense, and fun, and varied, and if you're interested in the game enough to shell out a little bit, it'll only add style changes that aren't necessary, but are a welcome perk.

Ok let's be honest. There's a lot of problems with this game once you're at the endgame. No real endgame content besides spiral abyss, repetitive gameplay, inconsistent mechanics among characters. And the worst of all: little to no communication from the devs. It's frustrating because this game is beautiful, the visuals, the lore, the characters, the music, it's love and care put into those asset.

This is a very good game! It has an interesting plot line, the graphics are beautiful, and the voice acting isn't mediocre. The only major thing that really makes or breaks a game for me is whether or not there is a lag and unfortunately, I am experiencing a major lag which is why I only gave it 3 stars. I understand that this is a big game that takes up a lot of data and storage, but if the lag was somehow removed, this game would be a lot more enjoyable.

Graphics are truly console level, storyline is great, and I like that you can switch between characters. The scenery is amazing, and you can get some great screenshots out of it. I only have 6 gb ram and it runs smoothly with a few framerate drops (even on highest graphics, though framerate drops more significantly when it drops) Update: I can do high graphics for a little while and then the framerate will drop a whole lot; this still doesn't take away my 5 stars because my device is mid range

I love the story line of the game, I've played it for many hours , graphics are on point, phenomenal game overall, only 4 stars because this game is really laggy, im using a very capable phone ( ROG phone 5s ) and it still drops up to as low as 24fps on the LOWEST settings with 60fps on! (X MODE on too). It's really disappointing being unable to enjoy the beautiful graphics with a high frame rate . I hope it js fixed soon, love the game nonetheless

Genshin Impact is truly a awesome game! but what I struggle with is that when the CGs happen, the audio lags and the cutscenes like these story teasers totally doesn't shows up. It keeps itself lagged and the audio just gets worse in my device. I logged originally in a computer but i started to play with a phone because it's easier for me, it happened the same thing when i met Unknown God. Hopefully this fixes soon because it's a thing that annoys me a lot.
The game is very very good, im not lying, but i got bored when i first play it and open it the loading screen is so slow, but it's worth the wait trust me.

Boring endgame content(the abyss should get more modes/ floors added or some sort of variation) , the rewards are also kinda disappointing(they dont give me much motivation to continue playing). It would be amazing if events like wind trace or lunar realm would be brought back.Also the fishing system is pretty boring and difficult at the same time, it takes a long time to farm the materials you need to exchange for "the catch". The resin is never enough so I have nothing to do most of the time.

Genshin is really not that bad, its just that they need to be smarter in what their customers wants and needs and i really could see the improvements like the inazuma reputation. You just have to fight the monsters, not like the monstad and liyue. I have many great memories like making friends and helping lower rank players but it seems that the game contents are dry but the rewards are worth it like the recent gouba event i really enjoy the game but needs better improvements

Amazing game. Just gets very repetitive after about a month. Pretty much have to either spend money or quit cos the wish system is on about 0.3% chance to get a new character. Even after getting any new character, you have to further spend more money to level up or grind the same dull thing over and over again. Gets incredibly dull after about ar35. But deffo worth playing for the experience.

Really a great game to play I like the story characters and like the concept of building characters but there is one problem that IAM always having since 1.2 is that whenever IAM trying to download the game in my pc it shows an games files verification error I watched everything on yt to solve the issue but any of the solutions didn't work if you guys help me to solve it I would appreciate it

Never been a fan of phone gaming. There was always an issue, be like money wise or the mechanics of the game. Until i came across Genshin Impact. Everything works as it was advertised, for now I will leave everything at 5 stars. With an exception of the controls, just because there is no option for me to adjust the camera over the shoulders or a little bit higher to look down. Having the camera focus right into the character even when is zoomed out interfere the vision of what is ahead.

I'm giving this game a 5 star because I really think this is a beautiful and amazing game. I would definitely rate it as my top 5 best games to play. However, with many great games, there are downfall. One of the biggest downfall about this game is that the resin system can drastically be improved. The amount of resin you need is insane. One solution would be to increase the amount of max resin or decrease the amount of resin you need to spend to unlock materials.

Absolutely loving this game! Well-built characters with distinctive skills, beautiful story, very realistic graphics and amazing game play. It feels like you're part of the Genshin Impact world and all sub-characters react to your actions with lots of missions, puzzles and monsters to conquer! Only potential downside I can point out is how long it takes to gather enough primogens to summon characters/weapons. Overall, I would give this game 10 stars if I could!

Preface: this only applies to the mobile version of the game. Pc version is a 4-5 star. The phone variant feels terrible to play, even on my slightly higher end phone (note 10+; big screen, loads reletively fast). Laggy, controls feel clunky... And the cherry ontop is that the game fails to load with the most recent update. Crashes or freezes up immediately upon loading in to mondstadt

Great game but for now i'll give it a 3 star. If ever you would consider adjusting everything for us android users that's only on mid-tier phones then that would be very much appreciated. I have a vivo phone with 4gb ram but still it crashes the game every 2-3minutes. Please do something about it if there's still a way. Not many players have decent phone to play this game which is a total bummer. I'll gladly spend money on this game if you could do something about this. Thank you

The game is really fun. I wouldnt expect this amazing animation with beautiful music and nature. The atmosphere was insane it felt playing breath of the wild kind of vibe. I really like using different stereotipical character roles, they all really have nice voice actors which is sound really cool and cute. It would be nice if its mmo seeing multiple random people to party up.

I found this game on play market and instantly pre registered for it. Got bunch of rewards and a great start to the game that I've enjoyed dearly. Problem is that the longer I play, the more I focus on primogems (in-game wish currency) to get new or existing characters to enjoy it, as the filler content is very dry and repetitive. Bosses looks all the same, just plain cubes. To put more, anniversary rewards were unexistent, which made everyone focus even more on stale repetitive gameplay.

The game is amazing in almost every aspect, but its not exactly built for mid-tier and low end fones. Even at the lowest possible settings im experiencing low frames. I could put up with is at first but whenever some cutscenes come up the game goes buggy and janky I had to delete the game cuz i couldnt handle it Please improve this game to make it friendlier to fones and please fix the visual bugs most of your players are actually experiencing

Played genshin for 8 months now. Its my favorite game currently, I'm definitely addicted. Bonded with friends playing it together. So so much content. The lore, exploring, getting attached to characters, grinding to make your team cracked, achievement hunting, etc. So much fun. The gatcha system is annoying ofc, they dont want you to get the characters you want so you spend money lol. But none of the characters are bad honestly, some are better but whoever you get has potential to be awesome.

This could be the best mobile game I have ever tried, has a great storyline, top notch graphics, amazing optimization, and it's not too hard to handle, the gradual unlock of features is a great idea for keeping players engaged, the mechanics are out of this world, the only thing I could complain about was the download speed of the game, had to wait 5 hours cause the speed wouldn't go above a certain number and even failed a couple of times, but nonetheless, it was worth it, wish I could say more

Its a great game to play but one issue for me is the sound audio. When ever I play the game the sound audio will sound static sometimes and it gets annoying sometimes but all in all its a great game to play. I started play when it first came out and has been greatly improving as it goes so I highly recommend this to anyone willing to play

Overall the game is already good. But the mechanics sucks. Please consider removing or decreasing the amount of resin needed for artifacts since it's one of the highest resin consumer on the game. The artifacts system is based PURELY ON LUCK to get the artifacts needed with good stats and sub stats. Please also consider changing the daily commission, the rewards should differ based on difficulty. 10 for the easy and 25 for hard commisions. It may be randomized or fixed. So its more rewarding

I was in love with this game for the longest time and I had so many good characters and friends but my only problem is the storage. I don't know if it's just me but my phone even with basically nothing on it kept on saying I didn't have storage and I had to delete it. Although I really love this game and hoyo keep it up with the great content! <3

this game is way too good. You can explore the whole map in your first day without effort, it looks so beautiful and detailed, and the gameplay is so great. The only problem I have in this game is the optimization. It may be too heavy on some phones and hopefully in the future, it gets a lot lighter. Even if it's still too heavy, it's still a great experience!

I love this game! It's a great game to play on mobile, pc or consoles. I've played since it opened and I can't get enough, the fact that it will keep updating make me feel I will never get enough of it. The only drawback is the resin, you waste to much and get back too little, I under stand if you pay you get more, but even so, I feel it's to expensive in-game to get resin probably setting it to 80/60resin permanent would be great!

What can I say. This game is as close to AAA as you can get on mobile. I'm playing one the oneplus 8pro and it runs soo smoothly. The graphics are amazing and the combat is really satisfying. The way you're able to switch between party members is super fun, and I love being able to combine the different elemental effects during combat. My only gripe is the loot. It feels bland and I find myself not caring about which weapon or artifact I equip to each party member. Other than that it's super fun

Its really addicting and all the characters are quite unique! The one thing that bothers me is how laggy it is. Im not sure if it's because of the device im using but during most of the fights, i seem to be lagging like crazy! Even switching characters take about 3 seconds, and sometimes it doesn't change at all.

It's nice and all, but the game is riddled with visual bugs, texture glitches and rendering issues to the point it becomes unplayable because you can't see where you're going or who you're supposed to fighting/looking for. Haven't seen bugs this bad since Assassin's Creed Unity; in which both games to turn the characters face invisible while creepily leaving their facial features in.
I am starting to lose my interest in playing, because i always spending a lot of time gathering primo gem then i get no hero. I feel like i am wasting my time.

A Great free to play adventure rpg wth captivating exploration, interesting story, and customizable characters. The combat combos keeps me experimenting and engaged. One drawback is as of the 4 character's i have unlocked there is no block. I can always dodge but sometimes when I'm by a cliff or edge it throws me off literally and figuratively. Lastly THERE IS NO SUPPORT FOR MY WIRELESS CONTROLLERS. But other than that a great game to play and get lost in 4/5.
I like this game, its give me a amazing experience, I also like to participate the event, its give me a lot of prizes, thank you keep going!

What Breath of the Wild should have been. I play on PC mostly but use my Samsung Phone (haven't had the lag or sound issues some have stated) to play when not home. Definitely easier with a mouse and keyboard but the phone option is great to have and runs well. This is one of the better games I've played of the type, even comparing to $60 console games. Co-op could be better (more to do) but that's the only real change I'd make to it
this game is so fun, you can make friends online or play with ur friends ‚ù§‚ù§

Fun and aesthetically pleasing looter RPG. Top quality for a mobile game. Good graphics, great music and voice acting (try the other spoken languages!), fun combat, good story once you get into the meat of it. Go slow, do the side content, explore the map, if you try to rush the main story you'll hit grindwalls. Only negative is that characters come from loot boxes with absurdly low drop rates. Try not to get hung up on that, just play the game for what it is and you don't have to spend money.

It's a blast to play on PC, but it becomes a whole other story on mobile. Even on lowest settings, a new gen phone can barely handle the game ‚Äî even on the Lowest settings. Frame drops are constant and it affects gameplay to the point it's unplayable. Otherwise, the content in this game so far is great. Just hope the mobile build becomes optimized.
in general, this gane is outstanding and wonderful, I play this every day after school. It's full of adventures and I like traveling <3 I 100%recommend this game !!

I absolutely LOVE it. Though, like most people, i agree that it takes up a LOT of space. I have an old phone, but it can run Genshin quite fine, just the controls are very... hard to use, plus the screen is small, but i also have it on my computer so no problem. Really recommended. (Hoyoverse 'Skip' button when?)

One of my favourite games to play day in day out. Great graphics, amazing character designs, quality kits, etc. If you take things slowly you'll probably never get burned out. But that's only if you take things slowly. If you complete quests and events too quickly, the game becomes really stale as all you have to do is use your resin and do dailies. If you're up for a long grind, this game is great!

Good quality, but the story is progressing awfully slowly for a game where there's nothing to do most of the time. Everything buyable is expensive. Rewards for doing in-game tasks are very small. After a while it becomes more work than fun (which games are supposed to be!) I still play for the pretty graphics, animations and familiar voice actors, but I don't know how long that will last unless some significant changes are made.

The best mobile game that we have today. Open world, well-developed quest system, playable characters diversity. And the story line! I even shed a tear. Dreamed of a game like this since youth and finally got one. Thank you, all the people who worked on this! UPDATE: it's been a year since I started playing and well... I'm disappointed. I wish this game had to compete with other similar mmorpgs, then they'd finally fixed the bugs and made it player-friendly, not a grinding simulator.

I have been playing since release and the gameplay is what keeps me playing. What I don't enjoy is hours and hours of dialogue you have to go through with the story quests. Please give a skip button for this. I have never played a game that does not have a skip option for cutscenes. I have requested this multiple times through survey feedback and nothing gets done. Everything else is great, but it gets annoying when you just want to play the quests without dialogue and cutscene interruptions.

Amazing, Love the setting,characters the lore of course. Gameplay is smooth on the computer I use now. It had to be a 800$ 16 ram 1Tb space computer though or it wouldn't rly. Run smoothly on others. Or it wouldn't work at all. But other then that it's a rly great game. There is no voice distortion in the cutscenes either like their other game honkai star rail.

Beautiful open world game, love the scenery. Exploring, climbing, gliding through the air. üòÖ Fighting monsters and leveling is nice too. This game gives me a great taste of that. For those who enjoy characters with unique abilitys/weapons; there is a variety. Free is good! However a lot will need to be purchased. This is the teams' income. Understandable. I have yet to fully explore the vast range of land, but I am looking forward to it. *For free, this game is worth a download and some time.
It's an amazing game, I just love the animation and the characters are just perfect üòç

LACK OF DIVERSITY!! I have been playing this game for almost 2 years, daily. It has a good overall experience + things to offer. However, an issue that's been here from the start and has become more obvious with new releases is that it lacks diversity. Skin tones, body shapes, weapon styles and more are very, very lacking. We as a community have been saying this for almost 2 years, yet get no response and are ignored or flagged. Aside from these issues being problematic, it's just bad designing.
If anime and Zelda BOTW got together this would be it. It's really enjoyable and fun.

The game is actually really good, don't let the sudden increase in bad reviews fool you. Obviously at the start you've got more things to do and later on when you've done everything, there won't be much to do. I think that's pretty normal for games tbh and I've played plenty. The amount of effort mhy put into a free game, the graphics, gameplay, voice acting, music is phenomenal. As a casual player who knows how to save primos for characters I want, I don't find anything wrong with the rewards.
I am speechless and I totally LOVE THIS GAME!!? But the problem is the wishing system.i pulled way too much but didn't get a single character. btw my game name is A'storm

Easily the best mobile game that I've ever played. The graphics, storyline, characters; literally everything is top notch. Archon Quests is the main storyline but even if you complete that there is just so much content available that you won't get bored. I do have a few complaints though regarding the 160 resin cap, the limit of 150 markers; both of which needs to be increased. Most importantly I hate that there is no way to change the controls which means you are stuck with the default controls
Best RPG I've ever played... but worrying. This game is extremely heavy in gnostic, esoteric, and new age imagery. Not good for children.

Love this game amazing, make sure to give it at least a try I use a Samsung galaxy s23+ it runs perfectly no lags or glitches once , it is a huge game but worth it delete some photos hahah , King_Fly420 in game name Europe server if you come across üòâ

This is a beautifully designed game if you love fantasy and action based games, I don't really understand why someone said the music and the story itself is boring I guess it's their own opinion but I think the game took a lot of time to design so it's worth it when you play it since you have the best graphics ever!! you have story-line too! (you won't regret it)

I absolutely love this game. The graphics, storyline, character, and community is outstanding!! However, when I went to log in today after about 6 months of playing my save data seemed to have reset. If someone knows how to fix this please, please let me know!! I haven't deleted the app, changed the email, device, or server. :(
Game is pretty good.but some quest in the game is really hard even after watching video on yt that really annoying.

*Haven't seen annoying ads yet. *The graphics even in my low-end phone is superb. *The controls and settings are highly customizable. *The main story and other Stories are good and well-made. *character/NPC's animation is mesmerising. And a good way to spend quality time with your loved ones especially in this time where global pandemic is a threat.

The game is really nice and I've been a fan for such a long time since I saw Qiqi's demo advertisement on YT around Nov. 2021. I like the game and it's design and all! Fontaine has been interesting lately, there's soo much to explore. I have an issue with my game though.. Genshin seems to not support my device (VIVO Y16) so it makes my damage numbers and ice disappear. I hope this bug or issue will be resolved. I really want to see my character's damage and heals.

Developers really need to add controller support. Graphically and game play are stellar. I really really like this game, but I really hate touch controls. They cover up the crown and make it hard to see what's going on and there's no way I can remember where on my smooth glass I'm supposed to touch for things. Really really need controller support.

It is nice and beautiful game, and through the years of developing it, I can say that it improved a lot. Though there are some bugs and issues that is needed to be fixed as soon as possible especially the issue in downloading and updating. A lot of users experiencing it especially in PC when downloading or updating the game, there are a lot of error before you can even downloaded it 100%. I hope these issues will be fixed soon. Anyway, it is a definitely a successful game after all.
The aesthetics and density of architecture could be more but all good except for that
Not so bad to be a game the graphics of the game is nice background good and a lot more recommend this game for people who likes adventures a lot

I've got to say this is one of the best ARPG games that I've played so far, immersive story that goes on a nice flow,both the main and sub quests are well laid out.the boss fights are nice and intense at times. The controls are easy to understand ,and really like the regular events which add a bit of extra spice to the mix. Overall the graphics are top notch there are only a hand full of games that I can compare to its graphics. There are a decent number of characters to choose from as well.
The best game ive ever played ( I've been playing it since januari 2021) and im not gonna stoo playing it any time soon
When can this game be put on the switch ill love that and i lost my account and had to start over i mean i dont mind but i had made it so far and unlocked so meny characters

Breathtaking scenery immersed with beautiful music, and filled with loveable characters. Very interesting story plot too, though not every quest dialogue is engaging. I really enjoy the various combinations of fighting styles of all the characters. Overall, probably the best free game I've ever come across so far!
Game is fun, but Hoyoverse did Dehya dirty. She is so bad, so very very bad. Add Controller Support!

Very fun and lots to do! Amazing graphics and smooth gameplay. Only thing I would recommend would be to add more things to do for players who've completed all quests, and have nothing to do in the mean time. Possibly more Random Events appearing? Besides that, overall one of my top favourite games! Keep it up! üíú
No controller support on Android. Uninstalling.

Amazing game, one of the best currently on mobile. My only complaint is the controls. The button layout and sensitivity of turning isn't up to par for things you need to do in game. This results in a lot of falling or attacking mid glide and ruining travel or a large climb. I may start playing on pc till this is fixed.

Dissatisfied about it's resources. You should make a smaller resource count for low storage devices. Maybe adding a new feature, like only downloading the files according to the current Queast of the player or the current graphics setting selected. Something like that, maybe? Badly want to play again.

Beautiful game. Has spectacular graphics and plays really well. I wish my phone wasnt slightly busted with a popping sound whenever I play. It's not the game. It's my phone. The only negative thing I have with the game is that I wish it was on Xbox. If the devs would let people know if they plan to put it on xbox and not just ps4/other games devices. That would be great. Amazing game. Ima keep playing it.

The company puts a great deal of effort into the game. Everything from design, story, game play, events, music etc etc. The art style may be typical but the game offers more than what you'd expect. This past year I've enjoyed it thoroughly though of course there are some issues when it comes to the game such as resin and slow build up of primogems. Overall it is a great game

Still the best game I've played so far. So much adventures and playing it makes me really forget about the time. There's some features I wish the developers would consider making tho. I wish there were some monsters which can be tamed and be pets and will accompany and help the character thru fights. Also, monsters which can be mounted would be nice given that sometimes the map is too big to be explored by foot. That's it. I hopenthe developers would consider this. Than you.

Wow! My jaw is scraping along the floor. Where to start. The UI/UX is amazing, the gameplay feels so good, and so far it doesn't look like it's being pay-to-win'y. Premium currency is earned through gameplay and achievements. Seriously, I'm impressed. This game is worth a shot. Amazing visuals, audio, gameplay. I have nothing to complain about so far - and that makes me nervous, I hope the developers keep up the amazing work.

Gave up on playing on my ROG phone. It runs too hot, and the audio lacks bass. Disabling the audio makes game run hella better. Unskippable cutscenes, the subs can't be turned off. Controls to get gliding too sensitive. If lagging, I failed the gliding challenges several times because of camera and controls. Found myself jumping around a lot more than fighting during combat cause the buttons are too close together. Went to play pc version, and am having much better experience than on my phone.

This is a fantastic game! From the characters, combat and story. But I wish for us mobile players we could have controller support built in. Like use a Xbox controller and such. Thats why its a 4/5. Otherwise 5/5 game if it gets included! Edit: Also would be nice if you could lock weapons and artifacts so you don't use them for enhancement. And the resin system needs an overhaul. 1 reason every 8 minutes, when at least you need 20 resin to do things? Thats really bad.
the game is good i like it! but I hope genshin will support keyboard and mouse to control the game

Great game, I wish it were easier to get primogems so players wouldn't have to decide between skipping three banners and paying high amounts of money for the characters they want, but that probably won't be changing. Also the resin cap, both condensed and regular, are painful. Resin recovers excruciatingly slowly, and then the condensed cap makes it difficult to do much without stopping all the time to make more. Excited for the future though, I guess. The music and landscapes are beautiful.

Very amazin'! Totally recommend! I faced an error though, i hope the dev would look to it. I did the raddish veggie soup cook quest 3-4 times but it always shows 0/1 done, i don't know why it's happening, i tried reloading and changing networks but no good, i really wanna play more and uncover the story but the bug is not ending at all. I hope you'll do something about it.

Tons of content with lots of heart and art put into it. Never feel pressured to pour money into the game, lots to explore. Great fun story. Great characters. Tons of free rewards. And a constant stream of very diverse updates with more story, new features, and overall improvements. They also constantly ask for feedback like no other game I've played. They do so much hard work on the game and it shows. Crazy impressive. Cannot recommend enough.

The Best Game That I've Played so Far! There some major issues with it though... Especially the optimisation towards my phone... My phone has 8gb of ram and still struggles to render the world, a lot of problems come with it ( characters' faces going invisible, buildings disappearing, mobs not loading...) Other than the game runs pretty smooth on my phone. I'm hoping the developer fixes this bug on the next 1.1 update.

Its soooooo good!!! The graphics, the story, he characters!!!! It's so amazing! But I'm sad that it's not available for macbook pro and also it takes up so much space!!!! Would give this a 5 outta 5 if they added the option to hook up a controller as it would make combat a lot easier too.

Pretty great game visually and functionally. Android Pixel3A, I have some heating issues and aim mode is terrible because of it with archers. Aside from that it slows down sometimes in certain areas but not often. It closes once the screen switches so don't expect it it run in the background if you want to answer a call or send a WhatsApp message.
