Came back for 4.0 and all I can say is that this game feels so antiquated in comparison to Star Rail. It's still a great free game, I don't regret spending money on it, but I think I'm done with Genshin.
Genshin impact is so fun but also so addictive. I recommend this game only on computer or PlayStation, yes you can have it on phone but it will lag quite a lot

The game is amazingly good with beautiful artwork and godly musics. The story and all the hidden easter eggs are just waiting to be uncovered by curious travellers. But the only thing I'm facing is the lack of content/choices to do as an endgame player. After finishing events and such, I'm just stuck doing daily routines which will take like 15 minutes to finish.

Beautiful graphics, music, and story. You just fall in love with the characters. Events are something to look forward to. There's a lot to do to get stronger, but doesn't feel like a chore. Devs also seem to take care of bugs ASAP. F2P friendly. Well worth your time Only issue is, you might need a device with high specs so you don't lag (or adjust everything to the lowest possible settings)

I love this game and use it as an opportunity to play with friends PS4 to pc to mobile alike. I find that aspect extremely pleasing. However, playing co-op isn't that rewarding unless you're stacked with resin because that's the most you can benefit in someone else's map. You also can't activate statues or go to the adventurers guild while in a co- op. Would make for a 5+ star game if the there were less limitations to co-op. Otherwise, it's still an amazing and fun to play game.

Great game. Battle mechanics and graphics are really smooth. Quite a lot to learn in the beginning, so it may be quite confusing. The only downside side is the RNG mechanic of the game. 5/14/22 Edit: After patch 2.4, the texts on mobile for the wish banner and updates are extremely zoomed in, where it is inconvenient and makes navigating through surveys and wish history very difficult and annoying. In-game currency given to the player is low compared to others. Slow paced game without much to do

Hello hoyoverse, I am having major issues downloading the game and insufficient storage space! I have transfered the storage onto my SD card, which has around 29.7GB, yet when I go onto the game, it still says insufficient storage. I only have 2 apps, 8GB free on my phone (not SD card) and no photos or files! No matter how much I remove, it just won't work. I've tried multiple devices aswell! Laptops included. My laptop works, 2 don't. Yet, the game still crashes every 5 minutes on my laptop.

Where's the controller support? I don't play games with dedicated on-screen controls, its too unresponsive and finicky. This should've already been implemented. As of V4.0, it's still missing this critical feature. Not excusable given that many games have controller support nowadays. Bottom-of-the-barrel-tier port, play it on PC.

It's a good game in the graphic side, the battle system is good, but it doesn't support using a controller instead of touch controls, it only supports it in iOS, so that's 2 stars less because user unfriendliness, if I can't control my character easily, then the battle system is less enjoyable in mobile, so I prefer the PC version.

I've played this game since it's release and I didn't notice anything bad , from what should I start; the quality of pictures and the animation are so clear and smooth , and what I like the most is the nature views and how it's showing cultures of many countries starting from Germany, china, Japan , Egypt and France , they play music to every country using their common music instruments , and the main story is so fun when u follow it from the start.
Haaah the lore and story plots so far have been so good! Can't wait for 4.2 update!

The game is beautiful and as far as I know a one of a kind in the gacha space, but that is itself the game's downfall. The lack of late game content in the beginning led me to taking a multiple month break, now getting back into it. With new content it does breathe a new breath, but I can only wonder how long it will last. The amount of free primogems you can get is somewhat lackluster through the game considering the # of characters there are. Collecting oculi is probably the worst part tho.

Played this game since release. It is hands down, one of the greatest games I ever played. It's had the best exploration, character ability sets, visual experience, in-depth story, insane free roam, and in-game mini games. You name it, you will probably find it in Ruin Terror ;)

This game is just amazing in terms of graphics and world building especiallywith it's combat. I played the gane on my android phone for a long time and even though it kept on lagging and fps dropping I've never stopped playing the game and now that I found out I can play it on my school apple ipad I have started a new server to play and experience the whole storyline and cutscences all over again without ever having to lag again. Overall the game is amazing for its combat and characters.

The overall gameplay is amazing but there is only one issue regarding in Co-op, you need to quit first or the person join in your world quit in order to interact with the Statue of the Seven, the hassel of loading in and out and sometimes slow internet speed makes the multiplayer gameplay feels like waiting for some time before you and your friends play together. But still, the game is awesome and great.

Words can't describe how amazing this game is. I've been playing Genshin for over 2 years and I've given up playing other games. The music is simply amazing. The story quests can make you cry. Especially the Sumeru Archon Quest. The characters and the gameplay are top notch. If there was only one thing I could nitpick on is the gacha system. I've seen people get early 5 stars but I get mine only towards the far end of the limits. 80% of them come only after the 70th wish mark üò™

The open-world experience is notable for a mobile game. Exploration can be fun, and rewards are often given for careful searching. Genshin is at its best, in the early/mid game. Late-game seems to be mostly grinding instances for ideal equipment stats and challenge content. Instance rewards are limited by a time-based currency. Challenge content rewards some premium currency, but often requires premium teams to earn the full amount. Probably better on PC/console.

A massive bug appeared when trying to complete the Meka Meka Melee event. I thought it was a problem with the quest but no. An entire underwater region near Fontaine is inaccessible. The one near the underwater library. My game glitches everytime I try to complete that section and when I tried exploring it the app crashed and forcefully kicked me out. I can't log into the game since I am locked at the glitch section. I'm reinstalling the game right now but if it fails to correct anything I'm out

I love the game and the animation and musics are awesome, although my game freeze most of times when I play on Co-Op mode, even tho I did not upgraded my graphics, it still freeze when I want to play with my friends, other than that it's an awesome game and one of the best games I've ever seen!!

I've had this game for 2 years now. Everything about Genshin Impact is perfect. From the combat to the characters to the story. I love every bit of it. It just breaks my heart that with every update, the space needed for Genshin grows to astronomical masses. I had to give it up after the Fontaine update as I could no longer meet the storage requirements. (which runs at 40GB) Genshin is a great game... it just wasn't made for mobile. It's sad to leave everything behind, especially my main, Diluc

My favorite game. Seriously. Hoyo puts so much love and attention to detail into the story, lore, characters, and gameplay. Truly immersive . No, this is not just another gacha game grubbing for money. In fact you are able to play literally all of it for free with no ads. Spending money is optional and can enhance the experience but getting through the game without it is actually pretty easy. No hidden paywalls at all.

Hands down , the best game I've ever played.The game is absolutely a treat for the eyes. The graphics and visuals are stunning. The game is so diverse that you need a lot of time to master the game.The only downside is that it needs a massive storage space.But it makes total sense that it needs this space to deliver the immersive gamming experience everyone craves. #THE BEST RPG GAME

New phone, new review. Originally 3 stars for myself having low ram and stuttering everywhere. Now having much more of a decent device for the times I would I e gone up a couple classes.still not a game for me however it looks amazing, controls make sense, lighting .audio.. it's all outstanding as I am sure it was previously.

Devs clearly put a lot of love and effort in creating the game. Sadly they no longer want to make difficult content as it may "bring anxiety to players", it still offers some challenge but not too difficult than it used to. One of the best in story, characters, gameplay, exploration. Well thought out quests and character lines. Liyue and Sumeru questline has been my fave so far. Hang out events is also amazing. Keep it up hoyoverse.

I think genshin impact is a great game with beautiful visuals and fun gameplay mechanics. However, the game is very pay to play even if it tries hard not to seem that way. Getting a 5 stars requries way too much money, even more depending on whether your actually winning your 50/50 or not and it just ruins the whole experience.

So, the game is absolutely amazing! The design of the game, the sound effects, the characters and story plot, its all great. Plus the gameplay is rlly fun if u have a good device. I really loved the archon quests, and the ascension quests r so fun ongüò≠ü´∂ü´∂ 10/10 recommend. <3 Edit - im crying about the storage now.

Been playing this since launch. Fantastic open world game with plenty of mini events and character building quests. the music and characters each have their own relaxing charm, The beautiful scenaries, adventurous gameplays, and amazing storylines are everything I'd want in a fantasy world that I can explore and play with friends in. And the world of Teyvat keeps getting bigger with each new region being released. So there's plenty of exploration and treasure hunting

The best rpg game I have ever played. Love the scenery, fighting, characters and storyline. I used to play it all the time when I had more 60 games on my mobile. I just can't enjoy the storyline quests cuz u need to level up your adventure rank to get to the nextquest.My rank is 18, and for the next quest I need to berank 22. Leveling up is hard as worl quests don't give any xp and commission quests give less xp. Pls change this. This is the major reason why I deleted this game.

Crashes alot ....like if you're lucky. It goes 10 mins without crashing. And the cherry on top is the absolute worst customer care services. My account got hacked and instead of resolving the issue they will just keep you going in loops and how easy is it for hackers to just hijack your account without any problems. They don't even need access to your email . They can just simply change the damn thing without any problems. I play other games too but none have such flawed security measures

lots of bugs and lags all the time I freed so much of my phone's storage and it still seems to give me a message saying "not enough space to download" while updating the newer versions. Every time a new update comes if I wanna play the new one I have to delete certain apps and free up storage even though I have enough of it. this game takes almost 64 GB as it is now. I'll soon get a pc but I want to continue playing in mobile as I feel comfortable that way but pls fix ur bug issues and lagging.

I think its a really good game, but its takes up too much storage space. And its hard to save primogems when you are a f2p. But the characters are very pretty, and the idea of the game is pretty amazing too. But there are a lot of new characters, and the events are a little boring. But beyond that, it's one of my favorite games. If you have time and storage, it's definitely worth it.

I've been playing this for around 2 years and I've finally decided to quit. It's understandable that the story has to progress but it's too much to catch up on and there's too much to grind. If you're a no lifer then sure play this but for people like me who's gotta give out their attention to the real world this isn't my cup of tea. Plus the reward system is kinda messed up so I suggest yall to not spend too much money on this game and finally, touch grass. It's good

Overall a fun game. I just dislike the fact that my audio has some issues and the controls when played on mobile are a bit wonky. But the art, character design, OSTs and even gameplay are worth it. A very fun game. Would recommend to anyone still hesitating to download this game and play.

I think this game is such an enjoyable game that I played for the past two years but a while ago I decided to uninstall it and then last Thursday I decided to download it at my PC but it took so long to the point it took 4 days but until now it still doesn't download and every time it went to 85% it go back to 68% which is really annoying. It makes me impatient and annoyed. It's already Monday and I still can't play the game because of this. My internet is very stable and my PC don't haveproblem

Graphics are good, the actually experience is good, it's the storage. As a mobile player storage isn't THAT high, and genshin taking half my storage is an issue. So hoyoverse please find a way to bring down the gb of genshin as in the future it may be a problem for most mobile devices. (Also if you can suppress the data while keeping everything the same try it with star rail and future games)

I personally love it! The storylines and plots are insanely interesting. The graphics are extremely detailed. Although, it takes up a lot of storage, it's perfectly fine. There's a lot of places to explore, lots of puzzle and interesting quests to do.

I love this game,but have to make it 1 star, as its nearly impossible to play on mobile. The size of the game is outrageous and gets worse with each update. I have started this game 3 times, on 3 different/newer devices and each time (within 6 months), i was unable to continue playing because of new updates and download sizes. Go play it on a decent computer and it'll be a ton of fun (while still taking up too many resources). Devs are lazy and think bigger means better.

Been playing this game for 1¬Ω years now...... My few issues is the lag that sometimes occur, the RNG for artifacts drop and weekly bosses drop, skip button for dialogue during quest(cause sometimes there are player that make more than 1 account to play and have to go through the same quest again) and maybe a controller support for Android devices

came back after 3-4 months. there are some new quality of life improvements sure. but yet never adding simple skip function. especially since its also an mobile game as well. when we play on phones we dont have that much time. even with normal skip spamming it takes more than hr to finish heavy dialogue based quest.. and it has lot of those. smh its better if i stay away from game

My main acc on genshin is bugged, I cannot enter it, its been a month and the fact that there is a limited time prize from klee and a crystal ball right now and I cant have it because of this bug is annoying, I play on mobile and my phone isn't a gaming phone so its laggy and I cant see grass, but still, atleast extend the event so I can get it after the bugs fixed. T-T The bug started about a month ago when I was exploring underground caves in fontaine. But it is still a good game.

A very beautiful anime style action game. The story & cutscenes are very well done, the characters are well developed, and the music is orchestral, it's amazing! Unfortunately this game has no pvp. Then the quests are too repetitive and too much text, it's tiring to read everything. In addition, the file size of this game is getting bigger every day, the potato mobile phone will not be able to play this game anymore. And the gacha system, no comment...

You guys promised an open world RPG, and from what I've seen, you delivered. The game is amazing, the graphics are breathtaking, and you even made the environmental hazards fairly realistic. Downside, though, is the slow connection at times. I'll be running or walking and then suddenly, I'm not anymore. Or I'll be attacking something and go to use a heavy attack...only to have it not happen at all because of the lag. You guys just need to streamline the connection a bit more.

Amazing game ever made. Incredible Story, Mind blowing soundtracks, amazing character designs. Gatcha is hell, it's okay if you are f2p and chill. Addictive but worth it. I play only for the story line and experience. Not much suitable to play in mobile, in PC, it's perfect. I have snap 888 with 8gb ram, still it overheats and lags. Anyways, it's an awesome game guys!!

I had played this game since September 2020. It's a wonderful game, from having lore to begin' able to decorate your own house, to exploring the world of Teyvat and pulling wonderful and beautiful characters. The only downside of it is that the more versions come out the more space is requiers. I have not been able to play it since version 3.9 where I was required to have 120 space disk. It saddened me since I loved and put so much effort in this awesome game.

Not Gamepad Compatible on Android, I hate covering part of the screen with my fingers, that's why I bought one of those controllers that make my phone look like a portable console, but then the most popular rpg on mobile has no compatibility! It's only compatible on iPhones! The game is good, but I can't give it 5 stars for this blunder.
It's fun, wish there were more chances to roll for items and characters without having to pay too much.

I've been playing ever since it first released. A great game, love almost everything about it. Uninstalled because the storage takes up way too much (I will cry now all that hard work and grind...). Hoping to come back in a few years when my favourite character is put on a banner hopefully (I NEED C6 R5 Dainsleif)... and hopefully by then I'll have a better setup with more storage. Happy times though, thank you, hopefully I'll be able to play again in this lifetime.

I would definitely recommend this game for those who have at least 128 gigs on mobile because it does take up a hearty amount of storage. The graphics are amazing, and so is the game play. The storyline is very interesting, and there are many twists in the plot that are still yet to be figured out. Fontaine is amazing and the scenery in all of the lands are spectacular.

It's a good game. I started when it was 2.4 and it was great, it wasn't that much bugging back then but now I installed it back and it's always bugging even when I'm at the lowest setting and my wifi is great. I never had any problem with my wifi. I don't play anymore but still, that could be fixed.

This is my top game!, I usually don't like those kind of games, but this one is the best I've played! I really love it!!, and I love the characters design, voices, and many other things!!! Mostly how we can make food in that good is just satisfying to see how it looks! I would really love if a lot of games were like this.

Great adventure, mechanics, art , story, quality , just love it. Just lack of hand to hand , close combact Parkour moves n some extra moves. I also don't like idea of multiple character development, Just , want to make my own character from style to stats and weapons

It's a really good game although the rewards sucks but it's also has great graphics, stories interactions and more the prices for Genesis crystals are expensive to a lot of us and not that but the storage needed to play this game too is heavy needed. It needs a lot of storage for this game to work properly that's all.

uh, I really liked this game. it was fun and I love how big the world itself is. unfortunately, i recently uninstalled it out of pure annoyance. it takes up a lot of space, and when i was trying to to a quest it would freeze my phone completely and i would need to restart it, which sucks because genshin takes so long itself to load.

Hello hoyoverse, I just want to tell you that I have a problem about this game, it's started Oct 23 when this happened, I'm just playing it okay, then it started to freeze/crashed for a second, then my screen became black then it made me restart my phone since I can't get out of the app, I tried restarting the game but it ended up the same once the loading screen (when it reaches Geo icon). This game is extremely big for a regular phone to handle, the data this games requires you to download is otherworldly insane. If your going to keep adding more stuff to the game then you HAVE to cut losses because at this point just make it a JUST console and pc game, hell I couldn't even play the game on my new phone without it overheating while downloading IN THE MENU and then it crashed afterwards because of the animation. The game is already on console but please remove the exclusion to PS.

Old characters need buffs and model update. Treasure compass (gadget) indicator/arrow effect should be clearer and should last longer. Oculi collection should be made easier (so one would rely on in game map not ecternal or out of game map) after collecting a certain amount, on toggle, they should all appear on minimap.

This game is perfect! You can do every thing like fishing , fighting with enemys, ride boat, figure out puzzles, hang out with characters, perfect quality, super large map, co-op playing, open world game, etc but it has some problems too like: you can't play this game on Xbox series the game size is too high and etc

I love playing this game! The characters,music,story is amazing!i had fun playing it! Alot of the people in game will help you if you needed help and that is also very good! Though people said many bad things about this game. I think people should be greatful for even getting genshin for free. It's a free and amazing game so I like it! Keep it up!üíû

DO NOT DOWNLOAD. What garbage! The login process is totally screwed up. I created login, confirmed my email and never did manage to get in! I kept getting errors and asked if I forgot my password. I did not, I just created it. I tried to get in again and their numbered confirm would not even fully display! Uninstalled. NOT worth it.

Based on others opinion the game overall is good. But the problem is the game system which makes most of the mobile user in disadvantage because of how the game can suddenly stopped or glitched. So if anything, fix the problem so that any mobile user can enjoy w/o any trouble

I ended up downloading it thanks to YouTube Shorts and I was enjoying it for a bit but after a week and a half the missions it started giving me were impossible to do without leveling up and ascending Characters and this wasn't the main quests, these were the daily missions from the Guild which I feel like I should be able to grind my lower level characters with for free exp instead of having to use the books. Uninstalled.

I'm dropping the game from 5 stars to 3 stars because of the artifact grinding. It's takes too much time to grind artifacts that only end up being absolutely terrible. Ones that are good have terrible rolls and end up becoming bad. The resin cap should be increased as it is not enough for the amount of farmable content available. For newer players, it's harder for them to level up characters as they don't have those locations opened up.

Edit-Ruined by Fomo gatcha and addictive practices. Old review- Has Incredible music, üëåBreathtaking scinery, Combat is intuitive but no place to fully use it, Exploration and story felt so immersive when I first played I got lost in this world. Building characters is satisfying. As long as you don't stress on the gatcha too much you are gona have a good time. This game has potential to be a master piece. I'm really excited to see future of this game.

Amazing game! Graphics are top-notch and the bgm are so good! The characters are well designed and the scenery is amazing! The fighting and leveling up system are easy to understand and the puzzles are fun to do. Best RPG game I've ever played

This game is good; the graphics and gameplay are interesting. However, you will get bored after some time, as the game doesn't reward your efforts. For example, after reaching level 55, it provides no additional rewards, making it feel like we're not getting recognized for our efforts. This game tends to give what it wants rather than what its players want, and it doesn't seem to care and listen to its global community, especially.

After 3 years! The issue about vertical camera movement TOO FREAKING SLOW is still not fixed! And the devs doesn't seem to care. It's like they don't want players to look up. Why the F they make climbing and flying monsters in the first place?!! Is this game only made for PC? I used to play on PS4 before, and it was AWFUL! It takes 5 freaking seconds just to look up. It's also slow on mobile, but atleast you can swipe up 1000x super fast just to look up, and you can't do that on a controller.

One of the best Open World Games in mobile I've been playing for 2 months now I hope you can customize where are the buttons is on your screen in mobile so it make easier for mobile user because you can't really move your screen when fighting I hope you can customize the buttons please add it!And it will feel more realistic if you can rent the houses in cities but we already have the serenitea pot adding houses that we can rent will feel more realistic but it will probably never be in game!

The game is cool and fun and I can see lot of hardwork in developing this game but when it comes to gatcha pity system it's so bad. I've been playing this game for nearly two years and to be honest I never got a soft pity and my 50/50 winning ratio is lower than losing. I lost 50/50 nearly 7 times and I won 50/50 three times only. I feel that gatcha system has to be removed and set it as guaranteed even if it's 100 pulls, so players can save for their favorite player and all.

very fun!! characters are pretty/handsome and well designed, good rewards if you actually play the game, very nice story, and overall a very beautiful game! storage on phone might be an issue, and or type of phone (putting on high graphics MIGHT make it lag so its best to play on pc or ps5) other than that I think its amazing!! if you're looking for a game that you'll enjoy it will probably be this one<3

It's good but sometimes in cutscenes, it just keeps crashing and whenever I log back in, I have to go into another server and change the settings so it doesn't crash. Overall the game is good, excited for Furina

Amazing game. Very rich lore, captivating story and very creative character, enemy and combat design. My only complaints would be that it takes a bit too much to get 5 star rarity characters, especially weapons as a free to play player. But thats about it.

It's the best game I have ever had, just that it takes a lot of storage but I don't mind. It's interactive and gets you thinking (all that puzzles and stuff) is amazing. This game has no flaws except the decreasing rewards

I mean, once you've been playing the game for 3 years ofcourse your gonna rate it 5 stars. I've just made so many memories with these characters that don't even exist, and I love seeing them interact in the game like real people. Thanks, overall for the game. Ofcourse it has flaws, but I like it the way it is.

Repetitive once you reach endgame (AR55+) I've played this game since first version. It was really fun! everything is really awesome and cool. The designs, representations, etc. is really good. (P.S representations isn't skintone only) This game is time consuming aswell, grinding and grinding. It's like an endless cycle, if you get a character you want you get a new responsibility which is to build them to survive endgame. Overall, it's a 8/10 game imo.
Best game ever Really like the plot and the characters ‚ú®

I used to play it, but it became repetitive. Eventually, the game wouldn't progress because it got in a loading screen, and after that, it wouldn't let me log on it's a good game, just it has very annoying bugs.

Long time Star Rail player looking for a 3d adventure. Was very excited to play this on my brand new high end tablet that was finally powerful enough to play this game at decent settings. Downloaded the couple dozen GBs of patches and assets. Booted the game up and worked through the tutorial quest holding the 10" tablet awkwardly until the settings menu and options were finally available. Connected my Bluetooth controller... NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT?!?! how are you supposed to play on a tablet?

I don't like to feel obliged to play everyday and do the same stuff Everytime to get flimsy rewards. And if u try to just play it casually you quickly fall behind and are unable to get stuff done. It's just not a rewarding and enjoyable experience anymore

Its a nice game overall but the thing is, it's too difficult to get 5 stars sometimes. Takes too much storage so not really recommended for mobile users with 64GB storage of lower. But the game is really nice, I love the characters and all.

Amazing game which is really fun. Loads of cool characters and is quite f2p friendly. Bunch of content, which there is also loads more to come out. Looking forward to new areas and characters. Only problem is that you need the storage to play it which I luckily have.

This game is in my top 3 most played games of all time, I have over 1400 total hours in game. I quit playing consistently one year ago. As someone who only spent roughly 30 dollars on the game, the grind was a massive issue. Though my main gripe with this is how repetitive it is. Every update, every optimized 5 star, every domain, all start to feel the same, and it takes so long to realize, yet you still march on, completely addicted to the stale grind. This is the worst game I have ever played.

I love the game but what irritats me is that you can't get all characters and weapons ( I'm a collectors) and don't get me started on the excessive data the game uses except that it is pretty good and I just love everything about it especially the open free world you can explore. Bad game for only one reason... and that is, this game doesn't have skipable dialogues/scenes mechanics, and because of that, it has become a tiring and boring game that you'd have to wait 'til the cringy long dialogues/scenes to finish. As someone who has been playing this game for the best part of 2 years, I'm actually raging. This game is the definition of beautiful masterpiece the characters were so cute&pretty and so detailed plus the graphics are so beautiful theres just one thing I was quite annoyed is that its not for phone users because it's really heavy it's more like for cp or laptops it takes a lot of phone storage and the one thing I was really annoyed is that it takes forever to load I waited so long I only got in twice because it would take forever to load but the game experience was absolutely phenomenal

I was able to play this only briefly after having deleted nearly every app that could be removed from my Samsung A8 to make room for it then waiting for three hours while it downloaded via wifi. The game is absoluetly beautiful the character design is very good and the nation's are just spectacular i didn't have any issues with them but when i started playing in fontain there were some annoying issues whenever i dive to the water my character stops moving and when i'm just trying to walk around my game keeps crashing and it gets pretty annoying even if my quality is low i hope this issue is fixed someday

the stories and the adventure is amazing! the new update and fontaine is truly breathtaking! although, when i created another account and grind it up to AR 20, and when i get back to my former account to play and i log out it out to login the new account again because i want to check it, the AR suddenly went down. at first i was confused because i've never encountered something like this before, could you please fix this?

Game really good and beautiful and played since launch. But I stop playing a year ago and now I'm trying to catch back up but its being a bit annoying when you can't skip dialogue conversation or cutscenes you not interested in. If they can add that I will truly 100% return.

It amazing game and they do have good graphics , sound and va's etc . I just have a problem with it . The storage is too much for mobile . And you know . Game is lacking "unique" charactes which in my opinion would make that game alot more interesting since 95% of all characters are just sword... spear...bow...yknow...these character don't really give me that creativity feel from the game but 4.1 is coming out with another catalyst puncher it would be nice if they add more "unique" characters. Geez the devs acknowledge multiple complaints a the lack physical controls yet they still haven't implemented that QoL feature. What's the point in says "we appreciate and take feedback into consideration" if you're not going to ever address it? It's massively strange to design a well rounded game but be unable to program controller support.

The amount of time it takes to complete the story compared to the old chapters is baffling, the rewards aren't even that good, you get like 30 primo for 5 hours of gameplay, playing this game feels more like a chore now than ever. I get it that this game is targeted at casual players but I don't think anyone would want to go through the prison act in Fontaine again.

I have been playing this game for almost 4 years now and the story progression has always matched my expectations. Other than some lag and bugs and the amount of GB it takes to download/upate it, the game is enjoyable. I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys watching anime and having emergency food by their side.

This game is absolutely amazing! Although, I find farming and pulling for 5 star heroes can be quite hard. Primogems are also hard to get because it's expensive, but the gameplay is really amazing! The graphics, the story and the lores are all amazing! I would recommend to download this!

Storage requirement is huge. Yet, the game looks nice, and it's kind of relaxing to just roam across the world. Nonetheless, in order to get nice playable characters, you need to throw in TONS of cash, after all, it's a gacha game so they want you to gamble until you lose consciousness

I know the game is in early access so there is bound to be bugs on the mobile version. I have a Samsung A51 and the game goes black for no reason and it lasts about 2-5 seconds to go back to the game and it happens quite frequently. But other than that the game graphics are amazing and game play is amazing.

I have always noticed the grinds you have to do in order to get the best gear. Each artifact/weapon has gacha stats. Amount of pulls are kinda off-putting. Things to do dwindle down and is just repeating although it's has a storyline. Overall if you're not willing to invest a lot of money. I mean A LOT, you're gonna get a terrible experience. Look at the anni rewards, trash. 100 given, 10 given back.

It's a good game overall, other then the resin wall which restricts too many things, and in update 1.1 they are gonna increase the max resin capacity to 160 which doesn't change anything because the regen rate is still the same. The drop rates for the 5 star characters are too low at 0.6% only. I've opened 70 wishes, and the only new character I got was fischl and xingqiu. (I drew like 4x or 4 star weapons out of 40 boxes. I'm getting bored because there's nothing pushing me to play.

5 Stars hands down need to get Ganyu üòç. No issues here I love the lore, the characters and love how the game has cross save I can pick up my phone and head anywhere I need to like for getting groceries or something and come back home and turn on my PS4 Pro and immediately pick up wherever I left off on my phone. The best part about this game is it can be 100% Free to play. They give out free Priogems and there are enough in game to grind out. If you love Anime highly recommend.

So far, in two days, I'm quite pleased and impressed. Maybe I haven't hit a paywall, but there's no transaction encouragements. Climbing, swimming, using elemental combinations, and flying. All these things make this the best RPG for mobile I have played. I'm not posting this to get a game reward, this seriously plays like a console game, but on your phone. Its graphic intensive, so watch your battery life. Addition: nearly a year later, I'm still happy. Same thing for compliments and warnings.

I adore this game!! However the months and countless updates with IOS having controller support and still absolutely no mention of it coming to android feels straight up disrespectful. I can't stand to play this anymore with touch controls. I've put so many hours and dollars into building my team and it feels like half of the characters I can't even use (try aiming a bow user with touch controls). Until they bring controller support this game is no longer enjoyable for me.

I pretty like this game. The graphics was awesome and the storyline is great, every quest is challenging and fun. The map is massive and every place is unique, I love how the developers pour their passion and creativity in this game. I hope in my next life I could experience being on the same team developing such awesome software. ‚ù§Ô∏è

An exceptional game, a lot of time and effort has clearly been made to develop it. Graphics are absolutely gorgeous and the game combines the exciting elements of both gatcha and rpg games. Honestly not a mobile game, it's a full blown adventure game with deep mechanic. Decided to drop it after so long, it's just a game you can easily get bored of despite the platitude of features.

The game is okay and all but the problems are.. I just wish the designs were as unique as the Honkai and Star Rail designs.

Um yeah it's a good game. Though it takes a lot of storage, it's still playable. People regularly complain about the file size, but they can't really change that, so... The game is good, great even while there's still story quests to do, once you hit end game it becomes kinda grind heavy and the only thing to pit your hard earned super gear/characters against is the spiral abyss. As for the anniversary rewards... eh could be worse I guess, mostly seems like a marketing/communication foul up poorly timed to coincide with the most underwhelming character banner to date. If we'd known it was only a 10 pull 2 months before hand it would likely be less toxic now.

Used to be addicted to this game for 2 years straight, it gets boring at some point. The graphics and music are truly amazing, same with the story. The thing i dont like about it though, is the gacha system. You have to spend lots of money for a character you want. Overall The game is worth playing.

When I first loaded up genshin back in November 2020, I had no idea what I was getting into. The whole story was new and I had always played fpp shooter games. Going from such a competitive platform to such a relaxing and aesthetic game truly changed me and my perspective of gaming. I've been playing since then. It is truly disappointing to see a game as big as Genshin with a dedicated player base like us give such measely amounts of rewards. A thanku in this form is uncalled for. Happy anni ig.

A good game that i would recommend playing, has some nice story lore but there are some issued that I've encountered. Fantastic! This game is actually very well made. It'll definitely keep you hooked and coming back for more. Highly recommend to anyone looking for an Adventure/RPG. Initial download will be very large so do it over Wi-Fi.

Bad gacha experience: Lost 7 50/50s in a row, so much better gacha games out there. Repetitive: Endless grind for artifacts and events becomes more and more of a chore. Absolutely loving this game so far! Gameplay is smooth, visuals are nice. Story is well-written. Exploring is really fun. I've only made it to the first city, but so far I am very impressed. Loading time can be long though, but that's the only downside. I will edit my review once I've made more progress, but as of right now, I highly recommend playing this game!

Poor communication with the player base. I've been playing everyday since release and the lack of action to fix game mechanic bugs, all while being backed with continuous feedback from the players, grinds my gears. To top it all off, the anniversary rewards were even more disappointing.

I got the game when it first came out on mobile and have since been playing it whenever I have free time from work. This is an amazing game with great models and fantastic animations. This is one of the very few gotcha games that I still play just because of how fun it can be and how intricate the story quests can be for many of the story characters. This is definitely a great game to have fun in and to play with others who also share the same passion for it.

Pro: Amazing solo game. Wide world to explore. Tons of activity & quest to chase. Very nice player treatment with events and access to shop & materials. Enemy lv up also, as you lv up, so always a difficult challenge. Heavy grind. Con: Solo game. Anti co-op. The game actually punishes you for playing co-op with friends. While openworld boss are easier to team up against, dungeon enemy gets buffed. Quest are not shared, quest gets locked in multiplayer, absolutely no reason to play with friends.

Hey! This game is one of my favorite games so far, the graphics are awesome, no wonder why so many people talk about it in my school, and other companies try to copy the game experience, like Honkai Star Rail and more! graphics 5 gameplay 5. probably the best game when it came out, but now its just a chore. nothing else to do, nothing else to find. you play the game to do nothing so why play it at all. story updates are very slow, and rewards for playing are just bad. most are probably still playing because they already invested a lot of money and just forcing themselves to have fun. Quitted a year ago and I gotta rate this one last time. Graphics are great so as mechanics even though you only have 2 skills. The game doesn't have any end game content besides the abyss which is literally hell for average players. It also feels like a job with below average rewards which hoyoverse intended to make us feel drained. Overall, I will still recommend this to people who don't have time on their hands, willing to grind endless hours and to those casual players with a lot of money.

Overrated. Quests and combat play similarly to many other mobile MMORPGs (go to point A to kill X no. of monsters, go to point B to talk to NPC, go to point C to click on an object for a cutscene) except it's not MMO??? Apart from being able to climb *most* structures which is "heavily inspired" *cough*ripped*coughed* by Zelda BOTW, there isn't anything note-worthy. Also the gacha rates are ridiculous with 0.6% for 5 star chars when OTHER GACHA games average at 7% for their highest rank draws.

just started playing this a few days ago and it's already addicting.The animation,the plot,the characters,the graphics everything is so good!My only complain is that it takes so much space,it took 29Gb from my phone,but I'm not surprised and I'm downloading it on my pc.Definitely reccomened this game!<3

This game can keep you busy for hours and hours, it runs great on mobile if you dont put it on max settings or if you dont have an old phone, needless to say its really great and I cant stop playing. One of the best game tbh and it's story is just amazing, the beginning of the lique quests was boring but at the end it was awesome thats the only thing which bored me in the game and it's graphics is superb u will just love it with the animations even though the size is quite big of this game for mobile but still playing it in the pc gives me the thrills.

I have much to say about this game but I'll make it short. Great game. No content. Characters cost too much. Not enough free rewards. Too easy. I love everything this game has to offer, especially the music soundtrack. Thank you miHoYo for making such a great game. I'm sorry to hear about the toxicity from the community. I would love to give it 5 stars but I wish that the developers would add or remove somethings and make genshin mobile different from Genshin on laptop or make it a different thing so players wouldn't have to worry about storage issues.
The game is good well to be honest amazing, the quality, the amount of things you can do in game, I assure you will never get bored of it.

As a person who has played the game since it's release, The rewards and wishing system is completely overrated. Making us grind quest is not going to keep people interested in the game. It's going to make them quite and bring down future Prophets. Yes the people who spend $300+ dollars on the game help y'all but soon they will stop playing. Please keep in mind that we play for fun not for money.

This Game is Too Good, Easy to control, The storyline of the Game is so impressive And The Animation 'Ooh God!!!! Fantastic, Mind blowing etc.... Played for more than a year or so, but the problem is that the commissions are repetitive. The game events are not really desirable over time and you'll eventually get bored. I'm rating it as 3 stars since the game needs significant improvements in terms of these things I have mentioned. Also, forcing players to play for the commissions and their Welkin moon is kind of annoying to me. There should be a convenient feature for the Welkin moon that charges you more, but you don't have to log-in.

Genshin impact sure is a big game so the problem is it cant work on normal devices it needs huge space but the caracters, world building, graphics and storyline is awesome. Playing it on pc makes it even more intresting but sometimes the quests gets too boring still I would consider it a 8/10 game.

It's a good game, but when I click the map or anything that you can click I always lag and the characters movement slows down :/ This is kinda a habit but after I play games I always look to my storage and I noticed that when I play genshin the storage it's taking up increases, I don't know my mobile has a problem or the game. And also about the achievements I think it will be good if you guys add a "claim all" button so it's much easier to claim the prizes (idk if that exists yet)

I love the game and the whole map and quest but there something is very deficault to me fighting the electro hypostasis ancension I can defeat other bosses but except the electro hypostasis mostly my characters are lvl40 but still can't beat it and also I sometimes get stuck in the floor by the enemies cause they kept attacking me until I reach the wall and then I'm stuck in the ground I tried to sprint or attack but nothing happen now I have to do it again I hope this get delete I'm shaking rn

I have a love hate relationship with this game i've been playing since version 1.5, sometimes it overloads with content while some other times you have nothing to do, just a daily cycle that takes 20 to 30 minutes but the music, graphic, characters, culture references that are actually right and the lore of it always brings me back to the game, thats why i will finish this game just as i started it thanks for reading here is your cookie and milküç™ü•õ

I highly recommend this game mostly because of the plot and the challenging yet simple quests. It has a beautiful setting, and if you like the Legend of Zelda then this game is perfect! In conclusion if you are interested in Genshin Impact then I personally recommend downloading this wonderful game. But of it's not your thing then that's perfectly fine!!

Ok after playing it for more than 1month.The game Is just awesome.The area are very big new area new power new characters even new enemy.Even after upgrading your character the enemies got higher level which is pretty good.Then only thing that I don't like is to much talking like we can't skip it as a whole we have to skip one by one.Even this game is about luck if you are lucky enough you will get a good give star character after wishing.So overall this is the best game like I will give 95/100.

Offering a unique flavor with the usual free-to-play gacha model, Genshin Impact has plenty of points to hit on when talking about what it does well. Exploration, combat, aesthetic, load times, and even cross-platform play all come together to form the core of Genshin Impact. These qualities are polished and while they are straightforward and simple, it is also easy to pick up and put down whenever. Definitely worth a try.

Thank you so much hoyoverse for giving me Zhongli‚ò∫Ô∏èand I have a request in game's graphics to add. Can you please make the bloom effect in mobile version more colourful? Comparing to pc version the mobile version looks a little less colourful. If you can make it better then please make it, if yes then we mobile users have no doubt that we will have more joy in playing the game. Thank youuuu<3

In their most recent event, instead of creating yokai they put masks on child models and called it good enough. The story for me is excellent but they always cut corners and give very little back to the fans of the game. They have said there will be no end game content so buying new characters is a waste. Log in once evey couple months to get new story and you won't miss a thing.

I don't even need to mention my favorite aspects of the game, but I keep coming back to the fact that the pull are incredibly unfair. More recently, the game has been driving me crazy because the sakura cleansing quest is so challenging, right down to the annoying final boss.

This is a very good game but two problem there is Genshin Impact crashes so many times when I play and it takes up too much memory space :( This game is good for peoples who like fighting and adventures. Ps. This can Install a computer from Epic Games or you can download from PlayStation. I feel Genshin Impact intended for the computer or PlayStation.

I'm enjoying the story and gameplay so far. Open world, lots to explore, easy but rewarding progression. Kinda reminds me of Breath of the Wild. Definitely a lot of anime vibes though. Some of the dialogue is kinda cringe but hilarious at times. For a free rpg game on mobile, you can't ask for more. No ads makes it even better. 10/10

Genshin Impact is by far the best game I have ever played! I've recommended it to tons of my friends, and everyone that plays it loves it just as much as I do! The game is incredibly f2p, and there is no need to spend money on the game. The storyline and quests are incredibly interesting, and mihoyo has put so much effort into in game details and making it as captivating as possible. Everything about this game is beautiful-the characters, personalities, and soundtracks. Great job, mihoyo!

Would be a wonderful game if not for a few key problems. Endgame is terrible and leaves players with virtually nothing to do. RNG system is absolute hell and a huge obstacle to improving builds. Claims to take inspiration in the people and culture of the real world, but fails to implement it in game without stereotypes and whitewashing. The general lack of diversity in skin tones and body types is very disappointing. Not a single NPC is non-pale and playable characters are all thin. Do better.

Couldn't even play the game. I'm trying to download the resources but everytime it's almost done it resets. Hope the people who played this had the fun that I couldn't. *New review* Been like a year or something and I decided to try Genshin again. And to my surprise....it worked! I've been enjoying the game a lot. The visual and sound is just amazing. This truly deserved the hype.
Please add a feature to make the camera (drone view) is FIX and not moving. because it makes me dizzy while playing üò≠

the game is very good! I love it! But it really needs an optimization, so that more people can play it and enjoy it without lags! Another bad thing is that there aren't as many and long quests as I'd want... Even after releasing a new location, there aren't any quests left in less than a week.

You have to really, really want to play this game. Requires 15+GB of storage space (14.9GB downloads when you launch the game for the first time). The installation alone drained my battery from 96% down to 16% and took nearly 2 hours over stable wifi. After it finally installed and I charged my device I found that it's a wicked battery hog and the movement controls felt wonky at times. Overall the graphics are great and I liked the open world feel but ended up uninstalling.

Overall a positive experience. I love the versatility of each character's abilities and huge open world environment. However I do wish there was a way to store more resin or have an afk mechanism that utilizes excess resin while not playing. Hopefully when this game reaches it final area they expand it by allowing the characters to cross realms via the ley lines.

Great story, great graphics, great locations. But FIX THE MULTI-PLAYER KICK FUNCTION. It's stupid that you can be kicked out by players after multi-player events finish. I lost time and treasure due to this ridiculous "feature." Needless to say this makes me not want to touch multi-player until this is fixed.

This game is just so incredible.The gameplay, characters,graphics and voice acting is just beautiful.Though sometimes the missions piss me off because it takes so long too finish but it's fine.The puzzles is also amazing solving it makes me think I'm smart lol.I will play this game till the end of the story because the story just keeps me getting interested and curious to see what is the end of this journey.

As someone who just got back to Genshin Impact, I must say that the game is still the same the way I see it but slightly better exactly, the graphics are still the same and is still great the way it is even in lowest settings, scenery and the landscapes are great. It is really very casual and relaxing. There are some new stuff idrk and think it's new (ex. Characters). The gameplay and play style is still really enjoyable for me.

Just a really beautiful game. Interesting storyline, stunning artwork, and legit voice actors. Plus the OSTs are so good!! Drawbacks: 1. Need a really good hardware for the game to run smoothly. 2. The storyline is damn slow. Moves an inch after months. 3. You have to grind a lot

I love this game so much! It's an amazing game with beautiful graphics, an entertaining storyline, and pretty characters! I do recommend playing it on a device that is not mobile, such as a ps4, since the quality of the graphics is super high so it is not as clear on a phone and it also may cause your phone to occasionally heat up when playing the game. It also does take up a bit of storage, so be prepared. Other than that, I totally recommend it. This game is awesome.

I've played many RPG games but i feel this one embodies adventure best. You literally feel as if you just landed in a new world. You can explore it & find so many mysteries, rewards & different materials. You can cook, mine, hunt & fight. I like how they allow us to play as different characters with different skillsets & talents. Levelling up requirements are also very nice. Definitely addicted to this game

As a mobile user along with ps4 theres quite a bit of lag generally. Even on ps4 it isnt completely smooth. Mobile at that point is basically unplayable for me. The wish system is also very dificult to work with as someone with terrible luck. Most events hardly even give you enough to do a ten pull, most even giving less then 5 when 80-90 is needed to guarentee a 5 star. Very pay/play a ton to win.

I was disappointed the skills and kits design on Dehya. And things the marketing team did to her was terrible as well. They just showed us how incredibly bad the communication inside the development, team by team. Yet, they don't listen the request to buff her. Great job üëçüèª Edited: After 4.0 update, the Fontaine hydro region is good though üëçüèª

Good graphics but very stuttery (on a high end phone), controls are quite bad and the gameplay is constantly interrupted by cutscenes that cannot be skipped. Your assistant high pitched voice is going to get on your nerves very quickly. Story and the entire setup sounds rather childish - would not recommended if you are above 12. Maybe nice if you manage to skip past the initial annoyance - I just can't.

One of my favorite games for a while but flaws became too hard to ignore. Story is great for the most part, each version has a pretty good central event, and the characters are all interesting. Genshin's main problem is the sheer amount of RNG. It's a gacha game with an eh gacha system. But the problem is artifacts. Getting one good artifact takes so many levels of RNG, and you're limited to very few new artifacts each day due to the very low resin cap. Good game, but it has flaws that ruin it.

Bluetooth game controllers not yet supported. I tried playing on my extra powerful tablet. Runs well, but the controls being so bad makes it impossible to play on mobile. The game itself is amazing, the controls are the only thing keeping it from being the best for me. I'd play all the time if I could.

This game is a huge leap forward for mobile games and the rest of the industry needs to take note. While at surface level the game may look pay to win, there is actually more to it and the amount of stuff a free to play player can do is amazing. Just by playing the game you will slowly build up the premium currency and will be able to buy wishes which will get you the 5 star characters and weapons. You don't need them at all to complete any of the games end game content and that is amazing.

The game is good. Problems are the resins. Takes too long to regenerate. Biggest problem is that the game takes too much memory space for android users. The recent update made it 10gb. If this keeps up i might need to leave the game coz of the need for too much memory. Please lessen the memory needed for the game.

Late game makes you wish the company wasn't so stingy. Voice acting is good quality in every language. Runs okay on a Galaxy S9+, but is better on PC (albeit with locked 60 fps). Characters are cool, cutscenes are extravagant, graphics are amazing, exploration is a blast, and grinding is fun. It's a shame about the greed and the lack of rewards.

Best F2P experience. Generous amounts of in game currency. Battle pass does not have any game changing elements in it. Just things to level your characters. They don't shove in app purchases in your face. Although, you should support the development of this game with a couple bucks ;) totally worth it.
I regret spending money for this game. What a ridiculous game that has no respect for its players.

The game is great, one of the best experiences you can have on mobile but works better on PC or console. Amazing art direction, music, and gameplay. Unfortunately tainted with an expensive gacha with terrible odds, a lack of endgame, and predatory fomo practices where everything is time limited. Additionally, there is a lack quality in a lot of characters that makes them feel incomplete. Some characters just do not feel fun, good, or complete such as Sara and Yoimiya from recent updates.

Damn. This is probably one of the highest quality free games ever released. This could've been a standard $60 game and be worth it for the storyline, exploration and RPG elements. A blend of Breath of the Wild and Gacha. Usually gacha is predatory and an automatic no from me but the games gacha is alright. Not the worst or best it's in the middle, and honestly I don't mind it. Unlocking whole, fun characters is great. Overall game is amazing, and gets constant new content.

I played for about an hour and got into the first city but then when the cutscene with the blue dragon came out, the game froze so i tried force stop and reopen the game but the same thing happens. Does anyone else experience this? Really seems like a solid game if you can fix the crashes.

All's been said. + Lots of fun stories to follow. Play and fight sequences that makes sense and easy to follow n can be figured out, might be deep n intricate but you can get the hang of it !!!Independent worlds so pay to gain makes sense. Vast amount of freedom and branching, related or independent activities. Books to read ? Which are hella fun bdw. Love the adventurer system. A beautiful work to discover on a every way and a game for all lovers and beginners to freely play. This is a must do!

Had to change my review. Though this game is made well filled with wonderful characters and story, the game has slowed down to a crawl. Content is slow coming, events are lackluster and boring. The events that are fantastic should be simply in the game available to everyone at anytime. It's sad that some of these events will never return resulting in new players in missing out on all the fantastic lore provided.
It's a really good game, really good graphics, controls, audio and it's amazingly relaxing üòåüëå That's why I'm giving it 5 Stars ü§©ü§©ü§©

Marvelous! I still can't imagine that a real PC tier game will be available in my phone. I enjoy everything, from the design, gameplay, to storyline. Everything is perfect. Just make more events and more characters/items to keep the players excited.

Game is absolutely amazing, but would really like it if it was made available on iOS platforms..also..I hope that mihoyo gets rid of the xiangling gastronomy quest, bcoz even after cooking 15 radish veggie soups my game can't recognize that I did it. This happened to several other people. The game also glitches and doesn't let my characters move or change...I hope this doesn't happen too much in future
Great Game Tho The Updates Are Kinda Large And Man I Need To Make Storage Space. ;-;

If you really wanna download this game, be sure you have atleast 10gb+ of storage space and high ram. Also I highly recommend to charge your phones before playing it, as it eats up almost half of your battery after a 15+ min playthrough. But overall the soundtracks are pretty good , and the VA's did a good job of voicing the characters.

It's my first GACHA (still is) & Anime style game. And Genshin is THE BEST GAME I've played in 10yrs! Main story is excellent, world building's impressive: VAST amount of Lore! Great Combat Mechanics! The basics are easy to learn, but you'll need to dive deep to master advanced stuff! Too little space for full review. Mihoyo's made some mistakes that damaged its relationship with the fans. YES, it's possible to play for Free, but expect limitations & huge pressure to pay. Still, Great Game!

I love playing this game but I have two issues. 1. The cutscenes should be skippable from second time since every loss causing a rematch has to be done with the cutscene. 2. In domains and boss fights when network error occurs in the middle of the fight, after the reconnection the boss is at full HP however my characters are at their previous HP and items I consumed are also gone. Makes no sense.

It's what I've been waiting for! Really wanted to play an anime game that didn't have Arknights storytelling nor GFL exclusivity of cute girls and guns, so to have a game like this come out so timely is fantastic. Like, I wish Mabinogi could be like this but alas. Can't wait for any expansion on multiplayer and more characters! The only thing that sucks is that there's not a lot of control sizing, positioning or keyboard adapting for mobile, so I constantly attack or climb when I don't mean to.

This game is pretty awesome and the relaxing music gives me the vibes. However 26GB for a game is simply too much. It's extremely difficult to manage storage. Plus the amount of items needed to upgrade the weapons and stuff is pretty hard to come and very annoying.
My phone having a fighter jet. Every good but its Worth it i guess

This game is sick and all, and I'm glad it's on mobile, but I think the charters are getting repetitive, I mean, you keep giving up pyro and cryo charecters, and you are increasing the damage of those charecters so more people pay for it, but I feel like it's spoiling the game a bit. Also can u add the zhongli hair clitch back? I mean you could change it, make it so that the hair lasts for a minute after a pillar is summons, or it stays when there is a pillar nearby, it just looks really cool!

I've been playing since Klee banner and I must say every update the lags and crashing of game keeps getting worse than the previous one. Unplayable and customer service response is close to null, it's been months and I can't see an improvement on game playability, you will be frustrated by the game crashing and not being able to play normally.

I have the game on pc, and it is a really fun game, unfortunately the game is difficult for me to install on mobile. When I go to download the game through the app, it heats up my phone drastically, to the point where it will eventually shut down. Also, instead of the download picking up where it left off, it starts all over again, and if there's enough of the game already installed, it thinks there's not enough room to install.

The backgrounds are beautiful the character design is just amazing üëè and the plot is perfect it's an amazing game and I highly recommend it. - 2020 Thats my review from two years ago and while I still love the game it has problems like not being able to download the app for an upgrade then having to deleting Google play app data, also it takes a lot of storage just to run properly, while this did effect my game play it might not effect yours so while it not to bad I still recommend it.

Overall the game is amazing the grafics look awesome and the storyline is so interesting but I've been having slight problems with the loading and when there are cut scenes it does glitch out really badly but it is understandable as it is a brand new game still but above any of that it's a really good game and I've recommended it to a few people who I know are interested in games like this

Best game I have ever come across!! Especially when we are all stuck at our homes. The art, story , characters everything is just plain amazing!!! This game really fulfills the wild side in me who wants to just roam around and explore the world !! SADLY as a person who suffers from screen sickness, where you feel nauseous if the camera or screen moves , I had to let go of this beautiful journey üò≠üò≠üò≠ I hope game companies come out with a solution for us gamers to play such wonderful games !

The update is great the atmosphere and music are just great in sumeru a lot of new features that are really helpful in exploring althou there are minor bugs like sometimes mobs guarding a chest disappears but it's an easy fix if you restart the game the new chracters have a really good design and the story has been pretty great so far. A great update indeed.

This game is best like the graphics, story, exploration and characters. I am recommending this game to everyone like you can do so much like building characters, Building a team, Story, events and exploration. I guess it's not very hardcore endgame focused but more relaxing and chill experience. Occasional Big events have nice story and minigames and combat. The TCG game in this really interesting too. Overall a good game if you want a package full of fun and relaxing content

Game is beautiful, it has many unique things BUT once you reach a higher AR, there is no content anymore, it gets boring. All you do is farm some domains and you can't do much of that either cuz of the resin cap and that's it, you log out. There is no more fun left, no content, just nothing. Resin cap too high and content too low. Artifact farming takes MONTHS before you get even a single decent piece. There are so many things that could/should be changed unofortunately

This game is great. I would give it 5 stars except for 2 reasons I'd love the developers to implement. I wish there was controller support for phones. And I wish the pc version allowed controller support natively, without me having to turn it on each time I turn the game on. If they add these this would easily be a 5 star game for me.

Such an amazing game, I been playing since release. Outstanding graphics, adventure, thrilling dungeons and open world challenges. As a lore hunter I am sure no one will be disappointed. Reason I took 1 star off is, on mobile device UI setting is not that good, not enough customization and camera distance is REALLY bad. Game heavily relies on RNG/LUCK which I completely dispise. I am happy to support a game I love but the rng system here is bad. I guess its tredition for asian games now.

Absolutely amazing game. Controls are a little wonky on mobile but other than that it is one of the best games I've ever played. I would play it on PC but mine is old and slow and can't run it. One complaint, could you possible make a way to sign in to Google on PC and PS4/5? It would help out so much and I really don't want to lose my progress from my phone. Thanks in advance! And one more time, one of the best games and game companies ever!

While the gameplay is fun in the earlier stages the late game gets really boring really fast. I'm hoping the future updates will change this bit-by-bit. I highly recommend reworking the artifact system because it is more luck dependent than pulling a 5 star unit. The current content is otherwise high quality and it is a free to play friedly game as long as you are willing to sacrifice some of your time.

Exceptional visuals, charming characters, super fun mechanics. Genshin Impact seems to have it all. The only things I feel are lacking are the controls (which are being slowly improved) and the story which drags sometimes, but please don't let this deter you from trying this game.

All this game wants is your money, you can spend all day and every day on this game and still not be able to get the character you want. Its either you save money or slave yourself away to this game and its honestly trash.

The design, story, and combat system are good. But maybe the Product Manager or even the Dev is the one who ruin it all. - Breaking the equality of re-run character(maybe just for some new player). Instead of re-run it equally for everyone. - In 2.0-2.1. There are the great unequal distribution between new female and male characters. - In 2.0-2.1. There are rushing new characters, that cause the new unfinished characters, but they still release them. Actually, if they planed them to take turn with re-run character, they would have more time to finalize them. - We can say good bye to Hydro-character. There are too few of them, while there are too many Pyro/Electro/Cryo-character. And Hydro-characters are quite underpowered. Which I mention above, you can say there is no balance in this game(in almost all aspect) at all. Moreover, something that need to be fixed, but it can not be fixed due to a gacha rule. So, it is the end, all we can do is accepting the fate.

I had pre-registered for genshin when it came out, and loved it. But when you get to some of the mid adventure ranks, the grind gets tedious, the drops don't increase/get better very much, and when they do event rewards, they don't give you as much as they did when the game was fresh, which is rather annoying, because that means they want you to spend money on their gatcha stuff, which makes it harder to be f2p and still be good

Amazing game! Coming from someone who refuses to play games without pvp, i gave this game a chance. It was worth it. Try this game if you havent. You can run around with your friends but you need adventure rank 16 before you can do so. It does take a bit to get there but it has puzzles, adventures, and plenty of combat along the way to get you nice ans geared for some exploration with friends on their world. Highly recommend!

Well i can give it avg since i try it out cause people hype about it but control a bit hard to handle for mobile game....... i think it would be ok for console player or may be on PC but as i try it there no target lock with really hard on mobile when it's require fast place in the game. second i think many people will get problem with the game cause it's require high spec of device to run it smoothly so you may have to buy new phone to play the game. at least get8core phone + 8 GB ram for this.

From the wonderful atmosphere of the game, to the many characrers and stuff to do, this game is everything I want in a mobile on-the-go experience. It feels like a game I paid for, seriously. Only complaint is the lack of controller support on mobile, but they have a PS4 version as well, which I play too. Overall amazing experience.

I appreciate that this game is cross platform. Playing it on both pc and Android. Controls are good for both. Love the story, exploration and love the characters. Not much to do after all the quests and exploration is done but at this point I just take it slow by doing dungeons and farm stuff. Keep em coming.

Why your company so falling love with def???? All stat, but just def will more change to upgrade dud. Hard pity, lose, def, hard pity, lose, def,. Im top up no more and waiting for your competitors and move on. Nvm right? Missing 1 player ar 60 will not effected your income hoyotod.

Must try if you like to enjot single player game where you can enjoy the scenery and like peaceful gameplay environment. The Music is Top. The Story and Lore behind this massive open world exploration is vert very interesting. Small details, side stories and easter eggs are all over the notes on items, materials. You will also fall in like with characters when you are doing their own Character quest. Must Try !

The fact that my previous review got removed for some reasons speaks how the state of the game is. Again, all the things that you do in this game is RNG based. You farm exp books, materials and artifacts, you'll get random number. You try to upgrade your artifacts, you'll get random stats. No need to sugar coat things, it's a bad game design! Everyone should just avoid this game completely. It's beautiful but not rewarding to play!

Finally a free to play game that doesn't throw so many ads or try to force to buy things with real money. You guys finally done it this is how you win the west. No auto questing.cross saves with pc. Runs smoothly on my razer phone 2. Sweet story line. There is lots to do in Genshin Impact. It does feel like there's so much more potential left in this get. And I can not wait to see them.

Absolutley Awsome! Extremely F2P friendly, great graphics, endless worlds of exploration, choices to chose depending upon your mood, to either explore, battle enemies, build up characters and weapons,and much more. Or do it all. Not committed to any specific agenda do what ever your in the for at that time.

This game is too good to be true the graphics are amazing and it's better in pc or play stations bc if you're on mobile or tablet or something else the graphics are low and you need a lot of storage because when it updates it wants like a few GB (or less or more, depends on the update because if there's like a new area it wants a lot)

ahhh, where do I start. For one this game has ruined me for every other game. It has amazing animations, beautiful storyline, each character has his own strengths, and I can still play while being f2p. I can't even download other games because I start comparing it to genshin and let me tell you genshin impact is on a league of its own. I have never seen a better game. Sure I would like it if they were generous with the primogems a bit but I'm really excited to see where it will go

There aren't many games that are similar or even near this game. It's open world rpg game. The gacha system is a bit disappointing sometimes but you don't get frustrated too much because you always have another chance to get your desired character. It's been 2 years and they've released countless characters, it still amazed me that all the characters are just as useful as they were before. Not a single one of them got power creeped.

this game has wondeful graphics and a stunning preformance! This game is super addictive and time consuming, and all quests are detailed and thought out so carefully! This is most deffinatly by far my favorite game i've played in years. One thing I would change would be the drop rate. I have spent a lot of money on this game and the character rate is sort of un fair.

Fantastic on a mechanics level. Combat can have a lot of variety and team comps are fun to play with. Huge roster of unique characters. Great little story and tons of hidden chests and challenges. People are exaggerating the cost of this game. I have plenty of 5 star characters and I've spent like 10 bucks Canadian over the course of a year of play. It is a totally free to play game. I can't speak highly enough of how absurdly good this game is and it's 100% free to play holy smokes.
It's the best game I have ever played. It was so many little details and characters, it updates a lot..and it's honestly very interesting.

It's not for me. For starters, I don't understand the appeal of generic anime art, but thought it was worth a try since it's so popular. I don't enjoy the strange character switching mechanic and can already see how they will make buying characters seem necessary for many players. While I'm fine with games having some micro transactions, I think it should only be for fluff. I'd rather buy a game outright. Even so, it ran very smoothly on my tablet and the sheer size of the map was impressive.

This game is awsome! The expirience is different depending on which gadget you use to play it but nonetheless the gameplay is very wonderful! The events and rewards are also nice. My only complain is that with the recent update with new domains, bosses and characters, the need for resin is very high. If hoyo is reading this, i simply wish for the resin's limit to be 200 or atleast lessen the amount of time needed for it to repelish

When I downloaded the app and started playing it, everything was going well, the graphics were good, no lagging. But when I opened the app the next day, the game would completely freeze after 10 seconds of playing it, I cleared the apps cache, restarted my phone, checked for viruses, it's impossible for me to lower the graphics since it freezes when I try to, please tell me what the problem is, and if it's a bug, please fix it

Please fix the graphic glitch when fighting La Signora and Dvalin, it's very hard to beat them when you can't see due to the bug that the screen will be filled with something and able to see them. If you don't know what I'm talking about just go to YT and type graphic glitch it's very hard to fix it and sometimes it can't be fix because we don't know anymore ways how. You're the developers so please make this problem solved because it's ruining the game please fix this
