Not only that but there are some other issues , a lack of end game content , an artifact system that has way too much rng , some lazy writing with long dialogue options that are unskippable and an underdeveloped co op system . I've loved this game and it's a comfort for me , but there's issues .

my graphics might not be the best but i still bet to enjoy the story and explore the world of teyvat which is great :) but i am having quite a few bugs i dont know if its the game or just my device thats acting a little weird? like sometimes ill just see areas of bright pink blocks? or the entire world having become a bright pink sea, and sometimes ill randomly fall through the floor or be able to walk through walls.. but other than that great game would 100% recommend it :D

A very good game but it's too bad that the only way of progress lays behind the gacha. Nothing to really do after a certain amount of time. If you hope for a game to grind out without paying - not your option at all. You can't get far without paying money because chances of getting the good chars are really low. And collecting chars is the only real option of progress here as was said before.

It is a brilliant game! Super addicting , and best part not a pay to win. I used to play it more than 8 hours a day (yes, it is really addicting) If you like RPG's like final fantasy and other story based games, this will be one of your favourite games, the starting music üéµ is just a pure melody. Don't play this game if you don't have the time, that this game deserves (almost a 100-150 hours).But if you do this game will be on your phone for a long time! Haha kudos to team!

It was extremely good and a very good and addicting story. But one issue I have is that some of the cut scenes are extremely lagging and freezes and cuts off. It might just be my mobile device but its really annoying and I hope that doesn't happen much longer. But over all this game is amazing and the characters too.

The graphics are amazing even if its on the lowest setting. The storyline is really good. The gameplay is amazing. The character designs are really detailed. The events are fun. The banners are nice. Overall great game even tho the event rewards are a little underwhelming sometimes.
I really like this game it is amazing it is worth playing but one thing it will run your battery down

Finally I got the chance to play! I've been waiting, wanting to play this so bad, I got an Early access but i didn't have a good phone before. This was 2 years ago.. Now i have a descent phone, I can say It is worth the wait! The game is beautiful i have not experienced a bug yet. The game now is so polished, My experience so far is wonderful. Thankyou for making this game possible.‚ô•Ô∏è Been playing for a week seems like i miss so much things from events in the past TvT

Long process to follow through **This game is not made for phones because the file is quite large. The story every traveler experiences is a long journey to complete. The game has a larger map to wander through. The co-op is now more wide open to friends and viewers for streamers to interact with. The system slowly, but surely will be more likable to new players. I would wish myself that if possible, there was not such a difficult weapon banner for players to struggle with.

From what I can see this game is amazing. Its basicly The Legend of Zelda Breath of The Wild but made into a mobile game with elements and weapons that don't break. Yes it does take alot of processing power but do be fair my phone isint the best out there. I'm really enjoying this game and hope to see what else there is to explore. You should give this game a try for sure. EDITED: looks like they don't care anymore, also got boring real quick, (about a week) events are the same, and yea 1/5 now.

Literally has become my favorite game ever. The Free-To-Play experience is really amazing on it's own and investing a little money in the game really only gives you a little bit of a bonus. Absolutely beautiful, fun, engaging game and is NOTHING LIKE a mobile game at all. A gorgeous open world with adventures to be had and stories to be discovered.
Game is really good but my pc doesn't have that much storage left please do something HoYoverse

The game is incredible, the problem is that after 1.2 it lags so much, I used to play it in 60fps most of the time, little frame fluctuations in certain zones and combat but it would still be playable. Right now it runs so poorly, once they'll fix this lag I'll change it to 5 stars.

Genshin impact is a beautifully made game that has cross-platform play between ios, android, PC, and hopefully in the future PS4. The graphics are amazing for a mobile game and the gameplay is so fun! You get to explore this huge world, complete quest, level up, play with friends, etc (basically like your typical RPG). The story line isn't bad either!! I hope there are more updates in the future for the co-op mode!
I love the adventure this game gives. The art, voices, action and characters are so cool.

Nothing. Just very boring lately. Nothing exciting even new updates. I know you guys work hard but instead of working hard, why not try change instead? Listen to players problems, be more generous etc.

It's a great game though underrated the graphics are great just so that every one knows this game has a nuclear bomb waiting for you inside when you first open it you need to download an internal data of around 2364mb it's a 15gb game. The game is great initially, especially if you love exploration. However, once you finished exploring as well as the quests, you should quit because the endgame is a terrible grind locked behind rng and the biggest problem is the lack of communication with players, selective hearing of feedback, and censoring of feedback across social media regarding their really poor anniversary rewards.. just a roadmap or increased drop rates event would be good, may not need free pulls

Fantastic game, easily one of the most enjoyable I've ever played. Great story & characters, open world, rewarding gameplay. And the fact that it works on and saves across PC and mobile allows you to play it literally anytime, anywhere. I'm glad I decided to try it out!

Great game, good open world exploration and building characters isn't too hard to understand. However after a certain point it gets stale because you're done exploring and all you can do to gain gems is do daily commissions and use resin and play the event if there is one. Furthermore Spiral abyss is available however it is very hard to fully complete without spending money on the game, also the character rates aren't the best but I've seen worse

Incredible game that puts other mobile developers to shame. No required in app purchases to progress and graphics I don't think anyone expected to be possible on a phone. Would love to see Chromebook support, but I think that would make my Chromebook explode. If you like Breath of the Wild or Skyrim, you'll love this one.

Honestly, this game is really good, especially considering that it's completely free. Can survive the game being f2p. One thing though is the amount of storage it takes, I don't understand why it needs to take so much, so beware of the storage requirements - nonetheless, I love this game a lot! Can't wait for the story to complete in like 5 years lol

I've seen ads about this and it seems pretty great! But when I tried to download and open the app, it just has a black screen. I've been waiting for hours but it still doesn't load. But when it did, there was a pop-up saying "Unable to load. Please try again or send feedback." I tried to refresh the app but no. When I uninstalled it and download it again, it doesn't open the app anymore. 1 star I really wanna play this so badly but somethings wrong with it. Please fix so I can give 5 star.

I play this game on mobile, and I feel like I'm being punished for it. Switching characters in this game is extremely important during combat. So why was it made so bad? There are 4 characters in a team, but only 3 of them are displayed on the right at all times. The constant shuffling of characters after selection makes it hard to keep track of what character I'm switching to. Give us an option to put all four characters on display and stop the list from shuffling.

I so badly want to give 5‚òÜ but there is a couple pain points: - The gacha is extremely expensive to participate in. Probably the most expensive game I have played all-in-all - Domains are repetitive and kinda mind-numbing. - The artifact system is the biggest pain point. So much RNG goes into artifacts it's a burden to the player... when you combine that with the mind-numbing domains... It's not great. Positives: -Story, game play, balance, open world. It's insanely fun to play!!

I love this game, the graphics are beautiful, the combat is fun, the story is wonderful. Only 2 problems, 1. It's a gacha hell, don't expect any of the good characters if you don't pay for them I spent about 100 bucks on the game and only got 2 5 stars. 2. Lots of grinding and you only get a small amount of energy which is required to get loot from bosses and dungeons, and this energy recharges super slow. Besides from that everything else is wonderful.

I really love this game, especially its map and its characters, I really hope that you know that I really love this game. This game is one of the things that can help me forget with stress and the problems from the outside world. Seeing the characters I owned makes me really happy to see them. Make sure to improve your security and the rng for artifacts. Thank you so much for making this game
The game is amazing but... The amount of space it takes... It's too much like 23 GB????? At this point im not even Able to update anymore

This game is simply amazing. Feels like a game from a console or pc. Gameplay is awesome. It has simple controls ,but the elements which can be combined to cause buff or debuff make this game more interesting. Not your typical mobile rpg which just uses auto-run, auto quest etc. Customization could be improved like having more options for clothes but it is a relatively new game, so hoping for an update soon. Story is intriguing, lots of dialogue so might be boring to some. Overall a 4.9/5

I really love the characters, lore, and the gameplay but this game deserves better. the devs confirmed that there's no end game content ( if there was, it's not about combat), the story from events are locked which some of them have importance to other characters background and lore, and no increase on resin which are very scarce and we need a ton to upgrade our characters that there are no use in the game because there's no way to test their full capabilities. I'm really disappointed hoyoverse.

If you love to explore and get lost in a world this game is for you. The graphics are beautiful along with the soundtrack. One of the very few games that is so much more enjoyable with the sound up. This game is very open world. You can explore, solve puzzles, look for ore, cook, gather plants, farm monsters for materials and so much more. There are daily tasks to accomplish IF you want to. I cant say enough about this game. I absolutely love it.

the character designs are amazing I love them so much especially the gacha system. I honestly wish there was a tutorial on how to count pity, because I couldn't figure how long it will take me to get a 5 star. But everything else is fine the combat, story quests, and events are all beautiful. I'm really exited for Fontaine üëà
This is the best game I've ever played. But it needs an option to connect with a controller on android

This game is thoroughly enjoyable, especially since you get enough incentives to continue playing as a free-to-play player and are not forced to pay for advancement. This is the first time i have willingly put some money into a game, because im so impressed with the graphics, soundtrack and overall gameplay.

This has been a very impressive game. Beautiful artwork done in the cell shading we saw in BotW. But better costumes and plenty of NPCs to interact with. I look forward to more coming out. My only hang up are control options. The mobile touch is not as tight as I would like and pushes the PC experience more. Like playing a full AAA game on mobile. Let me use my controller and it would be perfect!

Best MMORPG game in the playstore, i love to play eternity warrior 3 before.. but i dont like the dungeon style.. i prefer open world like genshin impact.. the storyline is superb , graphics is superb, its just that i cant customize my controls and placement of the buttons make it hard for me to play.. not sure if i can change it tho. It's the best PC port to mobile game I like it vary much

I won't rate it less than a 3 star only because it's a great game. I have well over the requirements for this game and it lags horribly in some situations. Please look into the optimization for mobile devices.

It's been a while since it happened, but 1st anniversary???? Good second anniversary rewards and I will change review. Also not very free to play friendly and takes up a lot of storage. I literally wouldn't mind the cut backs on mobile as PC is the better experience anyway when I play. I just want to quickly access from phone for quick tasks

I love how every region is inspired by real countries and their cultures, although for some of the characters of sumeru it's a little disappointing that some of the characters that are based on the people of the country isn't really giving, but overall the game is great it gives us many different and unique character designs and I also love how every character has their own attack animation as it suits the characters, love the scenery whenever I play.

Lately the game has been lagging and crashing despite having good ping, moderate graphics, no other apps open, good battery life (while using it) and the tablet's storage isn't full. It's inconvinient because it keeps crashing while I'm in the middle of a fight/puzzle, and this is the first time it happened for over a year of playing

Its a good game, open world adventure fighting mobs, easy to do free to play. Only problems are the multi-player is not really advanced and you can't do much with it, and a lack of content later on as you progress. The second issue is because its a new game and we're already getting more content

Okk first of all there's the game itself it's really fun(if you ignore the bugs) and the visuals are beautiful. But the rewards for their 1 year anniversary are absolute garbage, like some events gave better rewards. It's such a pity since I really enjoy the game, but it's just not worth it when you feel like the company it's literally laughing in your face.

This is the best game I have ever played because of the character designs, lore, story, everything is amazingly perfect, the only problem is that Dehyas kit sucks, for example when you jump it cancels the burst this includes getting frozen and dodging. But other than that its amazing I love it so much I have been playing for 2 years. I highly recommend it‚ù§

Genshin Impact really helped me get through difficult times. It's such a magical, beautiful open world game with almost endless exploration, and loveable characters. The storyline so far has been a rollercoaster of emotions from heartwarming, exciting to heartbreaking. I know a lot of people have made complaints about the anniversary rewards, but keep in mind this game has only been around for a year and there's much more to come in the years ahead. I'm really looking forward to the journey.

For a free game, it plays better then some other triple aaa games. Its cross platform and the music is excellent. Some really innovative use of enviroment and reaction between different character skillset for interesting gameplay. As a gacha game however be mindful of the "stamina" system, in this case resin. The design is really stunningly beautiful and the open world is rich and diverse. 4 stars character here are actually well balanced and use in some top tier team combination.

I dont really play this game on my phone because my phone can hardly handle it since it's so old but I still want to make this review. One of my favorite games I have played in a long time. Mid way through the prologue I was so so invested into the story, the world, in particular liyue has so much to offer and the exploration is fun for hours upon hours, by the time all of your exploration is finally done you will have so much more to do and focus on, I'm running out of space but man, try it.

HOYOVERSE, this game is so good and nice, the only thing I need is pls atleast give us a standard banner of what we need, if you can check our account you can see what elements we only have then if we don't have a good pyro charac pls give us DEHYA if no good dendro then pls give us TIGHNARI PLS HOYOVERSE PLSSS I'M BEGGING YOU PLEASE!!!

won't even let me login without giving me the "Insufficient storage space" pop-up. I have 50+ GB left on my device so this is absolutely ridiculous. Game graphics are good but keeps crashing and downloading unnecessary things into my phone to the point that i have to delete everything thats in my device (Apps, pictures, etc.) edit : Contacted customer support, were no help and never sent out an email to help me. Disappointed.

Not bad, not great either, but not bad. I played since launch up until a year and a half ago, back when it was still good. The game right now is just a grindy artifact mess. If you wanna get anywhere then you're gonna have to devote your life and your life savings to this game. The story personally I could give or take, the first 2 arcs were actually enjoyable, but the rest that followed was kinda meh. I stopped playing roughly after they added Inazuma, the third major region. Horrendous gacha.

Game is awesome but I believe mine has a glitch or an error.... For gliding licence there's no way to jump in the rings to comete the test.... Checked for hours and researched all over... Is a simple jump but in my game just don't reach ! Lol ü§£ it sucks i liked the game and was ready to buy some stuff to get me started ha ha ha, i guess it was just on time ! Over all is a great game, sucks that mine is broken üíî now moving on and find a new game... Thanks üëç

I've heard of this game but I didn't bother to play since I thought it was too good to be true. But, when my favourite youtuber ,Itsfunneh, plugged their game and showed a play through I got interested! Now I've been playing for two days and I've never felt bored playing. Graphics are amazing, the gameplay is interesting, fun and adventurous and the controls are perfect! I recommend this game for anyone, trust me you won't regret it.

Good game, though there's a bug. It automatically shuts down sometimes when I play. I don't know what's the problem. I'm playing on a new device and the only app and game downloaded and use is Genshin. So I really don't know why It's closing on me. I also clean the cache or junk of all apps in my phone so.. honestly don't know why it keeps shutting down. + Sometimes my keyboard doesn't work but maybe that's just my own device's problem..

Controls and camera are kinda wonky on mobile, so please add controller support for android. But other than that, story is pretty good, gameplay is varied and fun, and graphics are great. And the ost is amazing! A really fun game overall, looking forward to new updates!

Tell me if I really love this app because it has a lot of possibilities that you can explore and it also has a lot of elements characters that you can collect I love this game the most because as one of my favorite main characters which is the character that you get to pick at the start of the game it's super fun and I really recommend this app I hope you guys like it too just amazes me how much creativity one person can have and the graphics this game are so amazing I really want this game! üòÅ

i love this game to bits, but there are so many things that could be fixed. primogems and 5 star characters should be way easier to get. the pity system is also strange. i feel like a 5 star could at least be every 50? it's not too hard, but it's still a bit of a challenge for free to play players that don't play for hours on end every day.

I have this game on my iPad, and it's SUPER FUN and I love it so much. But the reason I didn't put 5 stars is because. When it tells me to update. It takes forever. It took 2 days and after TWO days..it's still wasn't downloaded. It's was annoying. So I just deleted it. I redownloaded it, I shut off my iPad, I did everything I can. But it still didn't work. I was so sad because, this game was awesome. And so beautifully detailed.and I deleted many games so it could work...it still didn't work üò©

I started playing during the end of 1.5 and i gotta say it isnt a bad game at all. There's many problems in the fandom but the game itself is great. Some problems in the game however are: no representation, not a lot of stuff to do after ar 50-55 and it becomes hard to get primogems, glitches /lag and the biggest problem of all: storage. This game was 50+ gbs on my pc and 20 gbs on my phone. I literally had to quit because of storage. The lore is good tho btw

This games alright there's a few bugs but there's some stuff they just don't look at to fix so it's annoying at times really one of the major things that need to be fixed/added is endgame content for the ar 50-60 players there's not a lot to do so we slowly loose interest and stop playing completely add more content endgame wise it doesn't matter if there's events it's you only get to do some of that stuff once same with commissions and bounties etc

Absolutely love the game. Amazing graphics, immersive, a huge world to explore and great characters to work on, level and create your perfect composition. Yes the anniversary rewards are meh but the game is free and whilst the end game content can be slow, we have known from the outset that the game will be updated with new content every 6 weeks and mihoyo have honroured that all year. Rating the game a one because you're annoyed at not being given free stuff for the year anniversary....üôÑ

This game is just perfect, the graphics, the story, the characters, everything. But the bad side is you have to have a good phone to play the game properly, there are actually a low graphics definition but I highly recommend you to play in high definition to have the full experience, but besides that this game is very worth playing.
It's so fun and full of adventures Totally recommended

This game is setting the bar for cross platform and cross compatibility. I'm able to go from my pc to my iPad, to my note 20 ultra with the same save. Gorgeous open world, great story, and fun combat. Downside is the gacha aspect, but they are generous with the currency - just save it all for a specific banner pull. Puzzles and mini games are an added touch

A game with lot of potential but all good has a bad. The game is too large for most mobile devices the visuals freezes on me but the audio goes on so I can't even play the game. I am sure players will find more errors and mistakes and you'll need to fix it you are the developers after all. But in the end I shall give you a 3 star rating for your potential and the big mistakes. I hope you will fix the errors and I wish you all have a good day.

Absolutely no problems in the beginning. Loved the game. The art style was great. I stopped playing for a while and updated it many times, but it constantly tells me that there isn't enough data to play the dang game. I've deleted enough, but it still tells me the same dang thing. I'm about to give up. At this point, this game is just taking up a lot of space on my phone.

This is a really simple and clean game, it's even more impressive to see a mobile game expand its horizons to consoles and pc. The story is actually pretty interesting so far, the combat is nice and simple nothing too complex(I'm on ps4). Then there is the graphics, I love this style simply due to the fact this proves good games dont need to look ultra realistic to be pleasing to the eye.
Well im enjoying in right now i look forward to meeting the Pyro archon, Cryo Archon and Hydro Archon :) Edit: So uhh hydro archon personality is trash quite annoying ngl

Good game, awful gacha system. However I can reasonably and honestly tell you that you can entirely clear anything and everything in the game with low tier characters and medium tier weapons, without too much struggle- those five stars are a bonus but not needed. Good mix of jiggle physics, wAiFuS and such, but at the same time, absolutely every character without fail has a deep and intriguing back story to unlock as you use them, this game has some of the best character writing I've ever seen.

I've been playing since February 2021 and saw the changes in the game it's really fun and I'm not getting bored at all and I like the lantern rite event because it gives many rewards every time but rewards from chests keeps getting lower and it's hard to farm but it'll be easier if you will increase the resin cup or just make it refill faster like 5 minutes is enough. Many new characters are coming and more primogems is not. Hope new player can play the events tho even if it's just for the event

That's an amazing game! I played for a bit more than half a year, and so far I have still not run out of content. End game does feel a bit empty if you burn through all the content fast, but with all the characters I still find all the different things to do. I for one, didn't do main quest until AR 45, and instead focused on exploration, it was amazing.

I have this on pc, but sadly the app is kinda too high spec....always crashing after a few minutes into the game.....so had to uninstall....i'll just play on pc only then....eventhough on pc it kinda crash too from time to time....it only crash when i open map tho......so it's kinda a gamble everytime i open the map cuz it could lead to crash....but good thing the loading is kinda fast, so it didnt bother me that much

Some of us were already frustrated with the game by now am having second thoughts if i want to continue. Lack of endgame content (no new abyss floors being added even, or anything else not in the form of a temporary event), refusing to buff characters at all that are objectively awful compared to their competition and complete lack of communication from the game devs, has turned this game into something sad.

This is a somewhat good game with travel and exploration vibes as you roleplay someone looking for their lost sibling. It has nice graphics and characters, along with action with elements. My only peev is the game felt bit incomplete for the main story. About 4/7. So players might find themselves grinding while waiting for content. Probably returning after main story gets updates beyond Sumeru. ü§ó

Its a very fun and well made game, I haven't been playing for very long but am enjoying it so far. The design is beautiful, it feels close to how I would think sao would feel/look/sound. It does get 2 stars off because unfortunately the sound has started lagging and playing over itself making it very hard to listen to, hopefully this gets fixed soon as it is an otherwise wonderful game.

This is the game I have been looking for so long!!! Open world, adventure, RPG, gacha, all in one! And it surprised me with character voices, designs, stories and lores. Not to forget the super duper pretty sceneries, and of course the in-game musics! I love all the behind the scenes videos, the orchestras, the making of Azdaha etc! Been playing for a year and will continue for the following years! Thank you to all the miHoYo staffs for this top quality game! ‚ù§Ô∏è Looking forward to the concert!

Overall, a pretty good game. The graphics are amazing, character gameplay is decent, storyline is interesting but the pity system needs improvement and it also lacks endgame content. Most importantly though, please add 2FA system. Pretty disappointed they haven't added it by now, considering the amount of players getting hacked every day.

This game has it all if you ask me. A very in depth and interesting lore. The story line is amazing. The graphics are absolutely wonderful and down right gorgeous. The character designs are unique and easily recognisable. Every character has an excellent thought through story and personality. If you like an adventure game, a fighting game, puzzles, lore, or beautiful scenery this game has it all. Absolutely fantastic job. Play it alone or with friends, up to you.
The amount of time you have to put into this game to actually enjoy it is immense. The graphics and story are very well put together but the gameplay gets very repetitive very quickly.

I have only been playing for about 10 days and the game is amazing! and all But upgrading you adventure rank takes forever but that's the only bad thing I have to say about it Edit:it's been 3 months now and i have more to say I LOVE the story! it's really good when it come to co-op and the open word is just amazing But primogems and wishes are really hard to get with out money

Personally one of my most favourite online open-world game. Gacha mechanics seem to be a bit sucky for me, but that's not really a problem. Other than those, the graphics are really good, especially with the soundtracks, character designs, thousands of high quality voicelines.

My experience of this game till now is awesome!! üòÜI am totally satisfied with the graphics and quality (they are really great üëçüèª) Make sure that your wifi or data speed is good enough to play the game. The characters and characters outfits are really well made. Doing daily quests gives you more than 50 primogems, defeating high level monsters, opening chests and unlocking teleportations also gives you primogems. The background music changes according to where you are. You can unlock starting 3 characters (Amber, Lisa, Kaeya) through temples, and if you want more characters you can go to the wish button and unlock any 4 or 5 star character (It totally depends on your luck) Mihoyo if you are seeing this then I have one request, can you make like 1 extra casual outfit for every character if possible, every genshin lovers will love it !!

sumeru's archon quest and lore are great! they're a time sink but they aren't rushed and explain a lot of important stuff. i hope that more plot-heavy stories can be permanent and not locked behind time-limited events. as for the exploration in sumeru, the entire region is fun to explore. it's interesting and new but not annoying like inazuma. the main thing i'd criticise are the character designs. many of the characters don't feel accurate to the cultures that they're inspired by.
Fascinating lore, stunning graphics, stunning cutscenes. Except from the gacha, everything is simply amazing.

The game has good story and mechanics and a lot of the fun comes from trying out new characters. So when my most looked forward to character not only comes out as complete trash, but trash that will never have a rerun my fun for the game dwindles. I was expecting her to be bad, but I was planning to get her on her rerun with higher investment. Now she never will and all of my love for the game has gone. Not only will I never spend again, I might never play again.

This is an AWESOME and HUGE triple A game which would normally cost hundreds of dollars to acquire. The review limit of 500 characters just makes it impossible to describe the many mechanics, ambiences, stories, events, characters, soundtracks and much more this game has to offer. I definitely recommend it, especially on PC.

The game is amazing, the story, the characters, and the missions but the main problem that I faced is that it takes time to load the game and while playing random crash occur. I recommend the developers to fix the random crash problem and loading time.
I love the game, but the storage thing on mobile sucks. I haven't been able to play whatsoever. Due to it. And my storage is fine. I even installed it on a new factory reset phone. Didn't work.
The graphics are nice and so are the characters

The moment I played this game, I couldn't stop coming back to it and got hooked for hours. Content is pretty much player discovered as things come and go from here and there. Game is filled with adventure and action with its immersive world and experience. Gameplay is simple and easy to learn and master. Graphics is acceptable for 4G although would be better if support would reach as further as possible. Story and lore is as deep as it should be. Above all else, I can't wait to see more of this.

I really love the game. Nice graphics, vast world to explore, events, and many more. It's a good time killer. It need some optimization because sometimes it lags i have 4gb ram and it still lags please add more optimization. Looking forward on the updates and new characters. Much love miHoYo!

Great game. Only downside is, it's a HUGE game size wise. So unless your phone can have an SD card or has a large internal memory, ide stay away. Game play is great but there's alot of buttons and alot of menus to Navigate so it might be confusing until it's memorized. HUGE map and some similar game play to Zelda : breathe of the wild. If you like open world games and decent storylines then this is the game for you, if you have storage for it. üòÇ

Having issue using BT earphones, the sound is very distorted and has a lot of static and i dont want to play on speaker it is kind of a deal breaker for me, if I find a fix (or it gets fixed) ill update. i have a few friends playing the game on pc ill probly download it there but i would also like mobile to work.
It's a wonderful game but recently whenever I try to open it, it just shuts off my phone or slows the working of my phone. I am not able to open the game so pls fix that

I got mt new phone. Realized it was capable of this game. I play this on pc but I wanted the on-the-go version. I downloaded and it was SO laggy even with minimal load. I overall recommend this game only if you have too much money in your pockets and have a REALLY good phone. Overall., average experience on the mobile version. It sure is the best on pc.

This game gives me a lot of experience not only in game but in teamwork, and also this game is awesome i can play with my friend or in other public world but i dont have much space to play this game my storage can't take update anymore its so hard to make a choice to not uninstall it but i need to do it..

The rewards are improving and the customer service is very good. My account got hacked once but they found it and gave it back in 20 days so I love the that service. And the new maps are very nice too but the new enemies are kinda getting more and more annoying because the animation takes too much time and you can't hit them in that time so the can be improved. But overall the service is great.

1 star. It's not just about the anniversary rewards, those are just one in a long searies of let downs, like the kfc glider. Deleting negative replies and reviews, ignoring a large portion of your player base and refusing to change or fix things that have been an issue sense day one, it's a shame to see such a nice game that had so much potential go downhill so quickly but that's classic chineese for you, silence anyone who disagrees with you. Been a nice year but I'm out.

The game really know how to impress me. I really love the world exploration as well as other ingame feature such as the housing system. Not forget to mention there are lots of fun event eventhough they are limited-time event like the windtrace(hide and seek) and theater mechanicus(tower defense). I really hope the dev team can bring back those event. Although the game could use some improvement as there is not a lot to do for endgame player since the content is limited.

Only been playing for a day now and it seems endless. Plenty of tasks to do and the exploration is a great way to level. No adds, no need to buy anything. Gameplay is great, controls are not bad at all on Android and the story and graphics are excellent. Definitely a keeper.

I just got this game this week and I have to say this game is really fun so far! My only problem is it's extremely difficult to have your Adventure rank go up due to the fact that you have to grind, and that the community is quite problematic, something I know Mihoyo can't really do much about. Otherwise the characters, story, graphics, open world experience, and music are all amazing! Just a warning though: the game isn't the most beginner-friendly.

I love the gameplay but hate the leveling up system. I feel like I should be rewarded more adventure rank points with every mission. I prefer playing the story they have, not side quests. It just takes way too long to level up. It also takes way to long to get enough primogems for a banner. I spent way too long just trying to grind in the past few weeks just to roll once. If I wasn't so intrigued by the story I'd quit. They don't seem to care for f2p players. I would not recommend.

Hey uh, not sure if you'll read this, but here's a suggestion many will love. (Just a request) If we were able to trade weapons (Maybe a point system?) for Intertwined Fate / Aquaint Fate, it would be so helpful to me and some other players out there. Also, this game is amazing! Best graphics game I've ever played, keep up the great work!

This game is absolutely breathtakingly beautiful. Its settings are gorgeous and the game play is entertaining. As a casual player, the quests are challenging enough to keep me engaged. There are a few quests that, at my level and strength, I cannot beat, but that's more likely due to me not building my characters correctly. Sure, the rewards aren't the best, but for a free game, I think what they're offering is good enough. It certainly hasn't dissuaded from continuing to play the game.

Graphics and combat are great and so is the story. However, end game content is extremely lacking. Also the artifact system has been created in an unfair and predatory manner. The developers have added so many layers of RNG, intentionally skewed towards bad stats like HP and DEF, with the goal of forcing players to spend real money to get more reroll chances. For the same reason they also refuse to relase artifact loadouts despite countless requests from the community.

Genshin Impact is a very pretty game with a lot of fun mechanical ideas used pretty well, but it puts a lot of roadblocks in the way of enjoying any of that. There are so many resources that funnel into so many types of progression that it quickly turns into the least fun kind of resource grinding. I like casual grinding in other games, but when the main story becomes almost unplayable because I didn't grind a half dozen types of upgrade material for multiple characters it's frustruating at best

The game runs really well on my phone (Samsung Galaxy S9+), though it does drain my battery fast. I enjoy the story, as well as how unique every character design is for each person. I'm hoping older, limited 5* characters have reruns soon, or at least gets put on a semi-permanant banner. (maybe each month or two, a banner for previous 5*s reruns?) Overall happy with the game! can't wait for 2.7

I do not understand why it does not support controllers and mouse + keyboard when the desktop version does. There is even an dropdown option for control types but you are locked to one option (touchscreen). Whats the point of it being there if it does nothing?! The key mapping tab in the game is also empty in settings. Why?! If u are okay with touchscreen though the game is awesome.

This game is fantastic starting off, but grinds to an absolute halt after playing for the first few days. You barely can progress as more and more roadblocks start showing up (Resin system, needing enough money/XP books/materials to upgrade characters) and then eventually you will have to only be able to progress using keys unlocked by doing all your dailies for 2 days. Deceptive at best, manipulative at worst gacha rates Developers should really tweak all this cuz all the good press will sour.

Honestly im disappointed. Played the game but was losing interest. Some characters are extremely lackluster but have good kits like xinyan (split scaling). Second there is hardly any end fame content. Understandable its new but jeez you only spend 30 mins the max in the game if you finish everything and only if you have resin. Three resin is so low for the amount of things it needs to provide for. Disappointed with this especially the rewards (both anniversary and in game). Please fix these.

This game is overall good, although, At some points in life, the game would stop working. After updates it would just shut down or you would not be able to enter the game. It would make you download it again and take up MASSIVE amounts of space when you already had it downloaded and an account. For me, this is a big problem that I feel like can be fixed! I think this game is perfect otherwise. <33

Genshin is a great game up until you hit end game, where it stagnates. I think that the balancing of the adventure rank was poorly done and created an issue where end game players are just suffering. The repitition issue really needs a fix. And events are not gonna fix it. The whole daily system and weekly pass needs a revamp, and if it doesn't get one, endgame players are gonna start dropping. Btw this is speaking as a person who has put a lot of money into the game too.

This game helped me through a hard time in my life and now it is my comfort game. Yes the rewards aren't as great as they used to be but personally I think that we shouldn't dislike the game or leave the game because of one problem. The scenary is beautiful and the characters are amazing and unique. The events are interesting and the new characters are good. In conclusion I really enjoy this game and hopefully other people will as well. <3

Great game but there's still room for improvement. Please raise resin from 160 to 200 and condense resin from 5 to 10. More cost halving opportunities for weekly bosses. Artifact sets are hard to complete, please implement a rotation for the pieces. The game visuals and soundtrack are 10/10, it's just that if we go into the stage of filler patches again, then we need the resin system to improve. Play at your own risk, this game has greedy management.

Beautiful game, interesting story and characters. Would prefer if controller support were a thing, because I find the on screen joystick to be a little bit clunky, and the UI is a little bit overwhelming with all the buttons and character icons

So blown away by the amazing graphics! Tried it because of the awesome reviews and so glad to be able to leave one! Love the open world map, the unique characters, and the thought they've put into every little feature - even down to the NPC's! Still shocked how such an amazing game can exist for mobile. Warning - you could easily spend hours here!

Used to be a really good game but the recent quests feel rushed and the plot was anti climatic. It is starting to feel superbly unfriendly to f2p players and rewards have been disappointing. There is nothing much to do daily and farming rarely gives anything good. Lore in the game now feels stale and even though they created a good setting for Inazuma, the promotional posters and built up suspense was useless by the end of the quest.

Developer does not listen to the community. Many bugs were still not fixed, and instead they focused on getting new character out. Even then they still failed since the new character are broken (as in weak, clunky mechanic). It showed absolutely no planning from mihoyo beside trying to make the character look good to appeal to those willing to pay for design only. The final straw was the anniversary, where the reward was absolute horrid, a new low even for first anniversary.

I love genshin impact a lot. It's so pretty and all the characters have amazing designs. Thing is, I forgot my password so I went through the verifications and put a new password after clicking forgot password. All it did was create a new account. I got extremely scared as I thought I had lost my first account, but I could still sign through Gmail. I don't remember if I registered through Gmail sign-in or if I had created an account. If I could please have some help that would be amazing.

This has to be one of the best games I played, the graphics, the music it's all awesome. But there's no end game content, well we could farm artifacts and bosses but the resin system, 8 mins for a single resin is a bit too much. Decreasing the time to restore resin would be a nice. Most games would give awesome rewards on anniversary especially the first one, then mihoyo decided to make the rewards gacha too. Good game. Bad company.
I like this alot but there is something that used to bothered me alot 1)the creaturea are strong sometimes you cannot not beat them if your hero aren't strong

so I could finally play and I've got two things to say:really fun game you can get characters from facha or just plainly going through the main story and you can even do quests to advance in your adventurer rank and I am kind of annoyed that you have to get to adventurer rank 16 to play with other friends but I understand it's for balancing that you can't just skip a whole amount of fights with an over leveled friend

The opening scene doesn't play properly, keeps lagging, it's annoying. Although the rest of the game, apart from cut scenes, is amazing. Truly one of a kind, it's impressive how this game is so detailed and yet is available for free.

Not my type of game at all. I thought the open world aspects and gameplay looked stunning but it's just a boring grindfest with very reptitive content. After I played for release until around April of this year I realized how much of a waste of time it was and how little rewards the game gave for the amount of time and effort invested. The rates of artifact drops, resin replacement, mora drops, primogem rewards, and gacha pulls are horrendous. It had potential but without new gameplay it died.

Super fun game, even if you don't participate in the gacha character wishes. You can play with just the starter characters just fine! The story and the graphics and open world are truly the best part of the game! Sure, there's some bugs that aren't getting fixed for the neglected characters (like xinyan) but that's not nearly enough to drop the game. I highly encourage you to try this gorgeous game!

I love this game to be honest, one of my favourites. I play it on my mobile and found over time a few glitches. For example, I did the update and now it won't let me login because it says there's an update and to do it before I can log in again to receive 300 primogems. I click confirm, and then nothing happens and there is no update. I bought the blessings of the welkin moon and 3 or 4 times my primogems never went in. Sometimes it glitches and I get stuck on a hill flying or failing. Sad.

I am really enjoying the game so far, but there are a couple things I don't like. The wish rates for the 5 star characters and way too low. It feels bad not getting good characters after saving up your gems for wishes. The other thing that I don't like is the resin system. I hope changes to regen rates get increased drastically in the future. The boss fights and dungeons are some of the most fun you have in the game, but they are locked to resin so you can only run them 3 or 4 times a day. Why?

The game is very good . The story line is great. the graphics are pleasing too . But after playing it for a week the game stated lagging very badly , the UI becomes unresponsive the fps drops to zero as the game becomes still . all the other graphic intensive game seem to work just fine with medium to high graphics settings on my Oneplus 6T . So unInstallating for now

I mean the skeleton of the game is good, solid gameplay, good story, exploration. But then there's the really bad systems like resin, gacha in general, artifacts which makes the game just way less fun to play. Additionally, the rewards in the game are not the best to say the least

From the ads and the videos it seemed kind of boring and hard to understand, like zelda breath of the wild. I started to play and I realized that it's so step-by-step, It's almost hard to not understand it of course, There's a few times I've searched up what to do on Google but then I'm like oh. I already knew that I could have told from the instructions. Also can I just like compliment how good the art is In this game it's so good and the movement is so fluid and the characters look amazing.

i love this game and i play with my friends everyday but my game keeps crashing every few days,, my only solution to this is uninstalling then reinstalling (which is very irritating) and lowering my graphics to the lowest to delay the crash from happening every few days. i seriously meed a solution for this. my phone is relatively new (bought it last year) so it shouldnt be my phone problem

This game is amazing! The characters, the food, the enemies. EVERYTHING. The game has so many characters, when you first download the game (not in appstore) It takes a long time to load but its totally worth it!! You can tell they put all their effort into making this amazing game. And the events are also amazing! New characters, new outfits, new weapons, etc! Its an amazing game! :)

This is a 5 star game, but no controller support makes it damn near unplayable on mobile(it isn't the worst touch screen controls, but they certainly aren't good either), and the fact that iOS had controller support for over a year now proves that they absolutely can enable it, but for some reason are just unwilling to. Edit: Updating my review(March 2023), I'd be giving this game negative stars by now if I could. The lack of android controller support is full on negligence at this point.

I have been playing this game on and off for a while now. While I mainly play on PC, this is one of the most fun games I've ever played. For once, it's not a game that's money based! I haven't spent a single penny and I have 10+ characters and am at Adventure Level 40. Not only is this game fun to play, but the music and art are absolutely astonishing. The game is still growing and I can't wait to see more!!

I'll give it a 3 star due to every time if I want to download it will will say that my storage isn't big enough and I always delete some apps and games that might had been the reason but it didn't always fix the problem, I had the game back in 21 or I remember but anyways the game was fun, it just needs some fixing in order for us to play and actually have fun.

Game is fun for the first few weeks. Great for playing instead of doing homework. Carried me through virtual class. But, around endgame game gets repetitive and boring. The updates are not really fun and commissions are a chore. The banners are all rerolls, never anything completely new. The weapons are all basically the same and the co op is poorly made. F2P is okay, but quite annoying after you get the limited banner character b/c the next one is a 50/50 chance... sad where the game is at...

Pretty fun game with many events weekly. The game is easy to learn and also has various unique mechanics. The character designs are really pretty as well as the weapons. I currently have 5 five star characters with one constellation and I think the wishing system is pretty good. In my opinion, every event might not give as much primogems but majority of them are pretty fun too.

I genuinely enjoy playing the game. The gacha system is pretty exhausting but that's how all gachas are, draining. Nevertheless, the story is questionable but still keeps me on my toes. The resin system is difficult to play with too, only getting 160 resin per day with the cost that domains are really lengthens the farming process. Which is good for the game, it being long term. There's also several opportunities to get more resin. Lastly, can I place more items in my teapot please? No limit!

I like this game, specialy the memes. 1st. the issue im having right now was the camera's auto-rotate when combat coz most of the time, the camera auto rotate where the grass, trees and etc blocks the view and i can't see where the enemies at. 2nd was just a request. i want a controller support on this mobile, coz its really much better if i use a controller. its really annoying when i have to open a controller mapper and a few hours later it will close or stop working it self.

I love playing this game so much I feel as if I have become addicted to it. It's so fun to play and the graphics and character design are unimaginable good. Some people say that it lagged or that the game is laggy or took long to download and load,but that fully depends on the device that you are using. For example it may not take long to load if you are using a newer phone or a gaming PC/ newer PC. I use a Samsung A 70 to play and there is little to no lag. I think you will enjoy the game a lot

Um, is it just me or there are times that the game crashes on some devices? I installed this game yesterday and finished downloading it, but when I started playing, the game crashes in the middle of the game. Is there anything I should do to address it? I really wanted to uninstall it now but I felt like I couldn't, not because I spend much data for it but because Paemon's just too cute. Overall, it's a great game, yet I'm looking forward for this crash issue to be addressed soon.

This game is amazing, it really is. The amount of effort put in - it's a beautiful landscape, a world to escape to. The storyline is amazing and had me hooked from the beginning, and the characters and their designs are so fun to build and work with. However, it's been a year, and there are, inevitably, problems that need to be solved. At higher ARs, rewards get progressively worse. The anniversary is also not helping encourage players nor solve these problems.

The game's mechanics and lore is very nice to this day. I mean, they added more stuffs that are related to lore and never messed them up for once. One star added to ratings, but the reason I still keep one star is that somehow that some things didn't change when needed (Ex: Adding more bosses that require resin to get rewards and you need more resin than the limit you can get by waiting)

This is a game I jave enjoyed for over a year now, but the newer versions give me a lot of headache. If I open the app, it gives me an in-game notification that there is a newer version, download it, but as it sends me to the play store, I have only two options: either to play and repeat the cycle or uninstall it. It is no fun to do that every update. Edit: it does the same for 2.6 update even after deleting an redownloading it, making the game unaccessible and unplayable.

Lots of fun to play. Climbing almost everything and then gliding down after your climb is so simple yet satisfying. Combat is fun as well, haven't figured out how to lock on to enemies yet... hopefully I'm able to as I'm still pretty new, only adventure level 8 1/2.

Very satisfying for a free game. You cant get more from free game more than this game. Lot of treasure, unlimited bag to collect item all arond the vast world, n so much more. Never regret it after installed. Really good job for mihoyo. Really recommended. Even though some part can be improve but really satisfying.25/2/21. 5* before but whenever i open bag or any setup interface my game became so laggy the frame rate drop like it gonna crash.pls fix this then ill rate 5* again.

Genshin mobile is great, very smooth, easy controls and everything seems to be not complicated and easy to navigate, although i would want genshin to add controller support for Android. And i hope that it would detect all kinds of controllers other than Xbox and Playstation since im broke and got off brand ones ;-;

I rate it back to 5 star, thank you for being considerate to the community for the anniversary The game is really amazing , it is in fact undeniable very good in terms of content and story quest is one the best among all the RPG The only thing that bothers me is that the rewards, where players have to grind so hard to collect primos or else will have to whale But I think as the game progress by years , the reward will be more generous. I have high hopes for genshin and for the long run here : )

The graphics looks great and the story animation is amazing. I love how we can complete the quest without any difficulty. In my opinion tho, it might be better if we unlock the Co-Op mode at level 8 or 10 bcause it takes time to reach 16. People might eager to play with their friends.

Awesome game, beautiful art style, huge open world map, incredible OST, really nice characters, but keeps accumulating bugs who never get fixed or addressed, the history writing recently got real rushed and bad, character comes half baked on gameplay and their relevance on history is almost non existent, even side characters have way more relevance and impact than the playable ones, additionally the lack of proper communication throw down the mayor positive aspects of the game unfortunately.

I'm totally addicted to this game, I pre-ordered the game and started playing since the first day too bad I have school and cant play as much as I could but the game is amazing. The only thing I would like to say is to add a way of transportation that's cater than gliding and running or add more time to the stamina( I'm only a rank 14 adventure so I don't know if we get anything like that in the game as I progress but I just wanted to say it).

I would like to say that, it's a great game so far. The game is in it's first stage although the events are amazing and the storyline, characters all are great.Only the request I've towards the devs is to optimize the game...even in midrange flagship phones it doesn't run smoothly sometimes.

its amazing. I do have a problem but still it deserves 5 stars. I place in a samsung tablet and it was working fine until i got to springvale to defeat enemies and rank up but unlucky it started to glitch ALOT. Only bare color screens were there. Pls fix it and when i close the app music is glitching? pls fix but iverall geart game love it

Update review after 1 year: the game has a ton of things to do for new players. Veterans however have very little to do. You'll log in for 30 mins to do dailies, resin run and then be done, until new content arrives, which even dragging out slowly still only gives 3-5 days play time. I feel like this could be fixed with more events like the summertime event. 1st year anniversary gifts were terrible. I hope next year's are better. Overall 4 stars. Best FTP game I've seen in years!!

This game has seriously changed my life- especially as an artist. I didn't think I'd like the fantasy element in the game's story, but it has completely blown me away despite it being out of my comfort zone. The characters are beautifully designed, the world is wonderfully immersive, the voice acting is phenomenal, and the Fandom (while having its few bad apples) are incredibly talented! There is so much that comes with this game, and even just traversing the land is enough to put me at ease.

I love this game- really, I do. The story is great- the animation for big scenes are absolutely beautiful. I mean seriously- this game has great graphics. But there are big issues in this game that others have criticized time and time again that Hoyoverse simply has not acknowledged seriously. The diversity issue- especially with the new Sumeru update! Artifact system as well has been a huge complaint, and difficulty has been a huge issue in inazuma. Good game- hoyoverse just won't listen.

Been playing this game since launch. Loved everything about it. Save for the low gacha drop rates and dismal rewards for things. The game demands immense amounts of time for you to complete events, which is a huge pain because it means that busier players end up missing out on the event rewards (however meager they may be to begin with) Its a stunning game and a work of art, but the barely concealed greed really is a huge turn-off.

I was primed to really dive into this game, but I fired it up on my Razer phone 2 with Razer Kishi controller, got through the tutorial to access settings, and discovered controllers on Android aren't supported. Really disappointed, especially since controller support on iOS has been available for a little while now. I'll be back when support is added, but can't enjoy it on touch interface until then

You're going to need more than 21.3gb free space to install this game. Hopefully external.storage options will work. Rating it 3 simply cause one I'm forced to click a star, and 2nd, I cant really determine gameplay atm. Though storage requirements are deceiving since it technically says 20+gb would be more than enough. But otherwise ignore my temporary rating, just letting people know storage requirements are greater than shown to install and update.

Okay mobile game, awful story writing with a lot of unecessary dialog. Characters are well designed and mostly balanced but some have years old glitches left unfixed while they continue to pile on new characters. (E.g. Diona's skill & burst still hit objects instead of enemies even when they're closer than the objects.) Wish there were more settings we could mess with. Obviously pay to win.

A fun blend Action RPG Adventure game with rather impressive visuals, soothing soundtrack, solid stories and fun characters. The game is just stuck with a very tedious, boring and sometimes frustrating endgame where it ends up being a massive grindfest and a highly predatory gacha system where all but FIVE of the highest rarity units are limited to event specific banners. Also the company is mad stingy with its anniversary rewards...

Been playing for one year, I would say the game was playable and fun until the recent updates. It all just began to be so repetitive and boring, the only thing that will probably keep you playing is the storyline which you can easily keep up with the manga. It's fun for the first few hours, then it all becomes too stagnant and feels more like a responsibility because of the gacha system.

This game is literally the start of a new generation of all mobile games. This game is the future, this is what REAL mobile games should've been from the very start. The characters, art style, the voice acting, the amount of freedom to do whatever and whenever. This is the pinnacle of a true mobile open-world rpg and and I am super satisfied from what I've seen so far. There's some bugs and glitches here and there, but that can be fixed in the future updates, as long as they focus on customers.

The game definitely isn't perfect, it has its short comings, and sometimes there's a lack of communication, however, the amount of content and passion that is put into this game every month and a half still astonishes me to this day, these guys made a full fledged concert for their anniversary for free, 2hours long and with 4/5 different bands/arrangements. It definetly has its flaws, and lack of permanent content, but i absolutely love what we as players get for absolutely zero cost whatsoever.

Beautiful and breath taking. You will absolutely love it. Everything starting from story, characters, music, graphics, lighting and gameplay mechanics is well thought and designed. You will get used to it in no time and feel like home. Yes, like all gacha games spending money is the key but even as a F2P(free to play) player myself it can completely played and enjoyed without investing a single penny. All characters are OP if built correctly. Just need more resin and faster recharge rate.

Not only the best looking game i have played on mobile, but also the most fun game i have played on mobile. The world is just beautiful, and consistent with what it is trying to do. There is literally no Pay to progress, which is something mobile games are known for, sure it is slow, but it is doable. I love the way the grind works, but the resin system is too slow. This was almost a 4 star review, but when combined all together, it is an amazing game. I dont care about gacha rates. Its optional

My game has started lagging yet again. I cant even finish a single commission. The game crashes when i try to teleport, the game crashes when i try to reply something during coop and when i try to fight the enemies it lags so much its infuriating. My network is actually pretty fast so idk why this keep happening to me. Pleass fix it asap.

After installing and login to my account via my mobile phone Xiaomi Redmi 10C it runs fine up until 5min gameplay, once you hit that time limit it starts to freeze up and for a while longer it goes back to normal but for a short period of time before it goes back again to freeze and lag. I got frustrated on waiting and decided to uninstall the game from my phone. Sad it freeze up even though the game at first runs normally. Note: phone did not heat up during the freeze/lag.

The free talking experience let's you go just about anywhere, they do try to keep you in certain areas with challenging cliffs and lakes. It is easy to get around if you are creative. But they did make it hard to get to those places for a reason. Have fun exploring
See it's a very good game but consumes too much time and it is taking ages to get. 5 star character .

Now they make a Childe Re-rerun while there are a lot of characters that people want and are waiting for their first Rerun. They are asking for it... In short, ungrateful and greed AF. @Update: Game is like 3 years old by now and still no free 5* while Star Rail launched with one...

Great game! I've sunk many hours into it and the grind has not become boring and the game is still enjoyable to play. The story is entertaining and the VA/Music/Visuals are all great! The gacha micro transaction system is optional and not overly aggressive. The game is still fun without any money spent at all and although vanishingly small, you still have a chance of acquiring the same characters as paying players can. I had low expectations and this game far exceeded them. Highly recommend!

Endgame content is just Abyss but the game gives you very little materials for powering up a character. It's been a year yet artifact RNG is still the worst. The game is fun the first time you play it but once you reach the endgame, there's nothing else to do. You can't even replay/watch past archon/story quests. I'll be uninstalling the game once my welkin ends. I hope Genshin will be better if I ever return.

I love the game, and I pop on from time to time, but I hopped on again after a long while. I play on my laptop as well, both my phone and computer use the same account, but when I tried to get on mobile, it's acting like I'm a new player and asking me to pick a twin. Please fix account restarts? I think you'd call it. Idk it's just weird that my account data is suddenly gone.

Pretty enjoyable for casual gameplay. Just some adjusting to controls when it comes to targeting mobs. It tends to get annoying to lose your intended direction to shoot your spells properly. But overall, it's not bad. 1 year later. Glad I quit the game since January at AR 25. These rewards for hardwork and atrocious rng is horrendous lmao.
It won't even allow me to play bc it says I have insufficient storage space and I have 14 GB of internal storage space free and this is the third phone it's done this to me on

5 stars for the actual game - despite the actual problems it has like the gacha, resin and artifact systems, it's still very very addictive, charming, cute, heart-warming and sometimes even poignant! but the problem with the mobile app is that it's just not really optimised for phones: takes up way too much storage, can be very buggy, slows my device down considerably if it's open etc. however, still a game I would recommend to absolutely anyone!

This is one of the best games out there. Beautiful design, music, and gameplay! Ive been playing this for a little, but its so addicting, I cant stop playing. I really wish getting 5 star characters was easier though. I only have a few 5 stars but its fine. There's constant events and hype for the new characters! I highly reccomend this game.

I've been playing for nine months now and I haven't missed a day of dailies and using up my resin. While some may say that the game gets boring late-game, I still find myself having many things to think about when it comes to levelling characters or doing domains. If you like open-world RPG and don't mind grinding, this game is pretty perfect. Just make sure you read up on the gacha aspect!

Regardless of the slow content drop, the lacking anniversary rewards, and the issue of the devs not communicating with the playerbase, this game is good, one of the best mobile games I've played, it feels like a triple A title while being free, and it delivers in many aspects, such as the game's music, combat, art direction, and character design If this game was a regular title, and the story was finished, I think it would be worth 60 dollars

There is some problems with the game in my opinion it has a bug in the game where the faces of all characters just somehow disappear and it makes it very infuriating to play and sometimes in fights you can't even see the enemy and you can't attack the boss directly so I think it's ridiculous on how this actually works for everyone else.

I started game when they were officially released in NA, and enjoyed a fair bit for a while. Then I lost interest and kind of stopped playing the game. After almost a year, I came back to play because my friend said there are a lot more things to do. Which was true. Then I was anticipating an anniversary event to boost me up a bit and slowly started to see a lot of people talking about event being really mediocre. And turns out it was. Not only I was baffled by amount of free wish they give out, amount of effort they put into anniversary event was just mind boggling. In a worst way possible. I think it would've been better if they just didn't give out anything for free for the anniversary event. And just put deep discounts on some of the stuff they offer would've been much better. I cannot give anything lower than 2 star because I did actually enjoy the game and missing out on anniversary freebee won't probably make myself stop playing. But this lack of communication ought to get some negative opinions and I think they are all valid.

I really wish I could give this game a 5 star rating; the open world is phenomenal and fun to explore. As someone who is now in the late game I'm trying to entertain myself with photo taking of the beautiful scenery etc. However ever since the 2.0 update, things have really gone downhill. The English stream for the 2.1 update was delayed by 1 and a half hours, characters have been released despite having seemingly unfinished kits. And now the anniversary rewards. Mihoyo, listen to the fans!

Best open-world game I've ever played on a phone! It's unbelievable that it works so well and there are barely any issues at all with the game that I could normally find with new games. The fact that it's free and that you can play with the same account on your phone on your PC and vice versa aswell, is mind blowing. You can tell that the developers have worked hard, and so they deserve a lot of cred!

Good point:Nice anime experience nice visulas op characters skills nice map Bad point:none error 404 no bad point found Last words everyone should play this game it is next level and specificly anime fans will enjoy it

Alright so I'm absolutely fascinated with the game, great graphics, awesome map, story, characters and enemies! But, dang killing boss monsters for only 32 character exp, no adventure rank exp and can only get loot by spending daily resine? Kinda a bummer to me. I hope for change during the next update for our adventures to be more fruitful then 32 exp for a boss mob, then there is the shop price, its basically 5 bucks a summon, then the controller support, kinda needed for this game!

It is amazing it is a good free rome game and has some depth to the game the graphics are good as well i recommend if you like free rome games. The story is also good the fight and leveling up is also good the adventure rank can get in the way sometimes but it dose gives you good loot u can also can get other characters that has different abilities that can help over a i only play this game for two days and my characters are level 20 so please play this game.
It was okay but this ads on YouTube was really piss me off.

This game is perfect, amazing graphics (especially for a mobile game), good sound track, great gameplay, and good story, even has voice overs. Loading time is a bit of an ass, but otherwise it's perfect. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone. TLDR, really good game basically anime Zelda Breath of the Wild.

AWESOME OMG BXJXBDIDNDJDJD but why four stars, you ask? The cutscenes are totally frozen in my phone's screen :< I can only hear the audio and my alternative is looking up the cutscene in the internet which sucks cause the flow of the game gets caught off I've found many in comments in videos saying the same problem. Please do something about thisss :'>

Now that I have your attention, allow me to tell you that Genshin Impact is one of the greatest RPGs I've ever played. However the mobile experience is just a nightmare. It crashes doing the most mundane things such as fighting random enemies and JUMPING TOO MUCH, but the worst offence is that whenever you want to rematch Childe for mats, sometimes the game screen will dim and you can't do anything in game. This also happens after the transition between the 2nd nd 3rd phase of the fight.

Personally, I'd recommend the PC gaming experience, but whichever you choose you can play you account on both devices. I love this game, it's lore has the level of research that shows the developers are deeply committed to making an interesting story. The music is soothing, and I feel rooted to my chinese heritage by playing this game, I use it to feel connected, so it means a lot to me.

The game is fun and very beautiful but there's one big Problem when you When you try to load the files Have to delete some of games I deleted all my games I only have Snapchat on my And it's not working

For a casual, free 2 play game... it's the best game handheld device could offer! But, for a gacha game... this is WAAAY worse than what you would expect. Everything's gated, yes, but that's not the worst part. Involvement of credit card is necessary to allow advancement in many, many things. Sure, do play this game... however don't go too deep, it will COST you! Way more than you can imagine...

It was really good, Honestly i got burnt out after 2/3 years ever since Inazuma came out its like ive lost the motivation to play, Ever since the old times i loved this game now that i stare at it, It feels nostalgic ive lost some friends and gained some, Overrall recommended, Graphics are everything, Storylines are very well thought out and detailed i hope to see this game have more representations of cultures and more stories that represent characters, Maybe lores of nations? 1000/10 for me :)

A fun open world RPG game, it has many characters with many different skill sets and elements, most are gotten thru a gacha system but I don't rlly mind that, the only issue is sometimes the camera angle turns extremely wildly or the camera adjusts and something obstructs it (ex: fighting in a forest) so hopefully this gets either fixed or tweaked

Is such a wonderful game. It has some great features relating about world building, like lots of stuff are breakable, trees are climbable as well as practically every building or terrain. Also love how live the environment is, if you see crabs they run and hide just like real ones do, the same with fireflies amd other animals. Gathering them is very tricky and challenging indeed. Characters have great design and their skills and abilities are well balanced.

im a f2p and i Reallyy love this game!! everytime i play i end up losing Hours of my time cuz i just get so sucked in :D while there r some occasional glitches (like when i tried to get out of a bounty in the recent update and my missions suddenly went from english to chinese and got all messed up) its still super enjoyable and i dont really mind when it happens! the story, the gameplay, the Characters, i love it all! almost wish i could romance em lol <3 i Cannot recommend this game enough

Very good game. I've been playing since it came out last year on and off and I've never gotten sick of seeing the amazing character animations and landscape. Only problem I do have is that it's pretty grindy all around. Being a person with not a lot of free time, it makes it difficult to progress and get more heroes without paying. Over all tho very entertaining and would recommend.
The graphics is very cool, hopin that hoyo well give us more primogems to farm someday and add some more characters to the game.
I saved forever. Will over 140 wishes for wanderers main weapon and got nothing. I'm taking a break. I feel abused after investing so much of my time in this game.

I love the storyline and graphics on the game. Its AMAZING! The only thing that ruins the game is the bugs. I can't see far, the graphics wouldn't load. I can't enjoy the full experience. Such a waste I waited about 2 hours for it to finish downloading. Is there any way this issue can be solved?

It's good. Lots of world exploring to do and I never get bored. The only reason I'm giving you 4 stars and not 5 is cause I experience lag from time to time. Fps drop and lag is the only problem for now. I think there are minor bugs but I dont mind them. I kinda want the Resin's cap to increase though. It depletes fast in my opinion.

An amazing game with stunning graphics, had no problem with connection issues and even with a phone as a potato runs like a charm, will definitely be playing this all the time. Also forgot to mention that this game can be played with no need to buy anything so anything behind a pay wall is reachable. Extremely good game would recommend!!!

Overall progress with updates have been dreadful, initially the game did look rather promising with potential for a huge world and tons of exploration. It was shaping up to be a great game with future updates. I was very excited at the time. However "updates" only occur once every two months and the "updates" are usually the addition of minigames that will take up about a few hours with no substantial content to them; just a temporary distraction. It has been almost a year until we actually got a substantial update with a whole new region, which has been great but I'm finding it very hard to believe it would take a whole year to create this. When the real updates do come, it is great but the pace of update releases have been awful. Even now, with the most recent survey it doesn't seem like the company cares anymore, previous surveys would gather more information if you didn't like something, an opportunity for constructive feedback in some way. The most recent survey doesn't even bother, don't like something? Okay cool and the survey moves on to the next question.
