The game keeps improving with every patch! In all aspects.

I like the game a lot, but there is quite a few problems with it. The gacha system is too expensive, it's hard to collect primogems every day just for a couple wishes without buying any. Levelling up in adventure ranks is very difficult as well, there are only so many things you can do day to collect experience, the amount it all gives you is also really low. The third and final problem is just how big the game is, I've had to delete so many other things just to be able to even download the game

It's full freakin game on Android I couldn't believe it! There's no compromises made to bring the graphical fedalitty on the mobile devices... It runs pretty looks amazing just amazing.. Only problem is I cannot use a controller I really hate using touch screen.. Can you please bring controller support to the game please ! Apart from that the game is just brilliant! It's like breath of the wild on Android.

I love the game, its the closest thing to a console or pc game you can find. The one problem is the performance. Half the time, the frames are consistent, but the other half the frames are going between 5 fps and 15 fps. Even with all the settings on the lowest possible level, this is still a problem. But, im not on a higher end phone, so maybe people with the newest phones have better performance.
On the new update for some reson i cant get to load in it only shows my the wvision screen for loading in,but never loads the visions in,and it doesnt work
Not great... new phone no apps over 10gb of space and some way some how I can not download the updates to even start the game due to no space...9907 error msg.... weak

I both love and hate this game. I'm still playing and enjoying it, but there are so many things that I find frustrating. I love that its casual and requires less time commitment. The combat system is good, and it's periodic events are quite creative. But it's unfriendly to new players for reasons I can't get into cos of char limit. I appreciate that they do not obfuscate the gacha currency like other games but they are also very miserly by comparison. The artifact stat system is too random.
It's good but you have to wait to. Long for the resources

Love the game, everything is fantastic, scenery, STORYLINE, dungeons, even the wishing system (never payed a penny) but still have two 5 star characters. The reason I'm giving it a 4 star review and not 5 star is because my games audio is absolute garbage. Recently the audio has been static-y and just terrible quality in general. The only way I could fix this was to screen record at the same time but that comes at a cost (everything becomes laggier on the screen as a whole). FIXED WOOOOO :DDD

Literally a next generation experience on your phone or tablet. So much work went into this, the gameplay, the graphics, the voice acting and music. It's the most ambitious game ever released on android. It's worth a try. You can play it on ps4 or pc if you can't run it from here. My only complaint is the lack of controller support on android. Please add controller support for a 5 star rating :)

Huge open world with a good story. Can be played completely for free and a free to play player can get just as good as someone that pays for the game (with effort and time). Dozens of different characters and abilities with beautiful design and different personalities and aesthetics. The game is vast and beautiful, you can dive deep and learn everything in detail or you can just play for fun following the story quest. Game is constantly being updated and there's always something new to do.

Nothing. Just very boring lately. Nothing exciting even new updates. I know you guys work hard but instead of working hard, why not try change instead? Listen to players problems, be more generous etc.

Having tried countless free games looking for a decent rpg of any genre I've got to say this is by far the best, in fact better than plenty of pc rpgs I've paid good money for. Currently level 40+ without paying a penny. The world is greatly varied, and the elemental powers are able to be used in countless ways to solve puzzles and acquire items, beyond the usual predictable ways. Combat is simple but satisfying. Only complaint is the connection, its a bit unstable and sometimes lags in combat.

Wish/or 5 star Character drop is way too low, It took me 6892 attempts till I got a 5 star Character (which is mona), On that attempts I only got 2 4 star characters and some 1 - 3 star items, FIX YOUR GAME!

The game is really good and it has a good storyline. The only problem is that when I launch the game it is completely black for around 10 minutes and I can only hear static noises while it's clearly supposed to be dialogue. If you could fix this, this game would definitely be a five stars game for me.

It's better to play the PC version since keyboard + mouse beats touch control any time of the day, especially in a game like this where it feels like playing an AAA open world game. I like everything about the game except some weird English translation if you have set voice over language to Japanese, the chance to get 5 star characters, and the resin regeneration time. It takes a whopping 22 hours or longer for it to fully refill.

Breathtakingly beautiful world and soundtrack. Combat system is simple and effective yet still interesting with how the elements are designed and interact with each other. Character designs are amazing and unique. While there's still room for improvement in many aspects, the game is still fun and engaging. The only unfortunate demerits are the toxic, immature, racist and entitled community. Thankfully this is a single player game with optional co-op so this doesn't derail the overall experience

Found this game through a friend. It's really addicting and fun, but it can be quite the hassle at some times. My phone is rather new (I got it at the start of this year), but it glitches and lags even with full battery. Apparently the English translations are off, but overall I like this game a lot! The graphics, characters and open world aspect is nice.

This is based on my experience given that I have seen people bombing the ratings of the app. Five days in and I have enjoyed the gameplay especially how battles are played out. I love the graphics and the world is very beautiful. I even climb mountains to get a better vantage point to admire the environment. There are some improvements that can be done but overall, I believe this is a good game if you can control your spending.

The game is fun and all, but I encounter a lot of bugs just after 7 minutes I played. The most annoying bugs I met are the Keaya's freezing walk-on-water bug, when I press the button exactly show in the tutorial either the water did not freeze or it froze but no ice was shown. Second bug is during the stormterror dragon, the dragon in the cutscene is fine, but during gameplay, it bug out. My entire screen was cover in blue and grey of the dragon wings, causing me to fight it blind. Oh, it kick me out of the game sometimes.
The game takes a lot of storage to the point where i think there should be a optamization update to reduce or a minimal resourse pack like most games do now

Genuinely doesn't feel like a mobile game. Awesome story, great graphics (relatively), cool characters, great exploration. It draws ideas from a lot of different games but mainly BOTW. Keep in mind it is a gacha game so if you dont like cacha systems just skip. My main gripe is the farming, the resin (stamina) needed to farm mixed with the absurd rng makes farming atrociously bad. We need rerolling options or a rework of the resin system. Great experience with the game since launch though.
I gave a 4 star review because, man we have to do a lot of work to get primogems to pull for one 5 star wapon or character

Would be 5/5 but I feel like the movement stick needs some work. The movement controls placement on my device feels a little far in for it to not be movable. It would be cool if it wasn't permanently anchored, but maybe a setting that allows it to not be there untill you press your finger down. Then it anchors based on finger position till release. If the devs read these I hope this makes sense lol. Great game otherwise keep it up!
This game is fun I like how there is things to do in the game and how the characters talk lol
Pretty fun open world, alot of content to play around with

Horribly optimized for phone, barely optimized for computer. Prices are ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS. Not the worst Ive ever seen, but $30 wont even get you a 10-pull (unless you have the never-been-purchased-before bonus). The story and characters are fantastic, honestly its the only thing that keeps me coming back every now and then, but if you have a hard time controlling yourself when it comes to *cough* gambling, please save yourself and dont get invested in this game.
it's a really fun adventure game, especialy the lore and characters! The character developments are also outstanding!

Awesome online RPG. Great story, great characters and character progression, excellent fighting system and mechanics. This is the best you will find in the genre on a mobile device. Why only three stars? No native Android controller support. I have this game on my device but I refuse to play it for this reason. On my PC? Yes! Why? CONTROLLER support. But until they introduce full controller support on Android, this game is just barely above meh on the mobile front.

Best discovery of 2020 imo. I dont know how I would have gotten through the lockdown without having this to look forward to. The gameplay is smooth and fluid even on mobile. The graphics are truly astonishing, like how have they given pc level graphics on mobile i dont know. The story quests and characters are extremely interesting and entertaining. The world is fully explorable! You want to climb a house and then run in circles on the roof? Go ahead.
One of the best Games ive played in my life. Although you guys are not that generous in freebies haha Jk

This game is by far the most entertaining masterpiece. You never run out of things to do and the story is amazing. May i suggest that you give us some form of settings to change the button's size, opacity and location. Sometimes i accidentally click jump instead of attack. But for the most part i have no complaints
I absolutely love this game, i love the characters, the story, the actual Game-Play, it's so great, i love it so much :)

Bluetooth game controllers not yet supported. I tried playing on my extra powerful tablet. Runs well, but the controls being so bad makes it impossible to play on mobile. The game itself is amazing, the controls are the only thing keeping it from being the best for me. I'd play all the time if I could.

My favourite game, love it. Perfect game to wind down after a long day and relax. Been playing over a year, still do. Gorgeous graphics, outstanding music score, interesting story, captivating voice acting and hardworking developers, no wonder it won many awards. Looking forward to what's to come. I'm recommending everyone to try it.

It's been almost 1 year since I started playing this but I rate it 3 stars because of a issue in the game. My device is Redmi Note 7 Pro and runs perfectly fine in medium graphics. However when I enter my Serenitea Pot the game freezes after 2 second of entering so I have to close the game and restart again from the long process of loading screens. Sometimes it also freezes when I try to interact with something within the pot. Please fix this problem! Then I will reconsider the rating.

It's very fun and addicting although if there's a possibility to enhance gameplay and optimize the game for lower end mobile devices. I really like playing the game and grinding for materials and such but sometimes it's just too much for my phone it frequently notifies me that it's overheating. even though my settings are in the lowest or medium.
It's a very fun game but every time I wanna play 9 times out of 10 the game crashes and I don't know how to fix the issue

The game i played so far is a free world game. You get Main Story quests as well as other Side Quests. You're also free to pick materials and ingredients up. Art style is breath catching and voice overs are available in various languages. Some parts of the game interface however are still a bit hard to use. But if i have to compare it to another game, it'd be quite similar to Monster Hunter World, as for the level of freedom we have in the game.

It's so good..graphics, visual effects and the exploration with secret treasures, different monsters with different types and bosses & dungeons...everything is awesome. Having the stamina drained in the water at a less distance is a bit uncomfortable, but the rest is good until now....and I'll definitely recommend to play.
The game takes up too much storage, as a person who used to play when it was a lot smaller, it is rather disappointing to not be able to play this game on my mobile device anymore.

Absolutely beautiful! I wish you could customize a main character to play as, but being able to switch between so many makes it obvious why that wouldn't work. Stunning game, great storyline and endless things to do. My only gripe is how much space it takes up, but with something so intricately designed it's expected.

First time to play online RPG because I saw the graphics while my partner was playing, and I did not regret it at all. The game is so interesting that you cant resist to explore more. One thing that makes me regret downloading though is playing this online for like 12hrs a day (no joke, but multitasking sometimes hahaha). I really enjoy spending time to explore more chests, challenges and appreciate the view of places I go to!! üíóüíóüíó
Hello, I've been playing your game for a month now and I really like it. But sometimes I can find bugs in it, but I find ways to fix them anyways.
To be honest, I can't really enjoy/play the game. Why? The downloading thingy is too much storage. I CANT just delete everything in my phone for this. I really want to try this game out.

The game is magnificently built and no doubt that its one of the best games of this genre. Nice storyline, graphics are soo great and the cinematic touch makes it more better. But ever since i played the game, somtimes there are graphical error the screen freezes the scenes and I can only hear voice, suddenly the graphics miss out. I have an s10+ 8gb and alot of storage, ig its more than enough ram to run everything smoothest but I am facing graphics problem.I have spent 100+ hours its so good

It's the best game I've played so far. The graphics are extremely good, but a little laggy especially on the phone. The open world system and the map are very well-prepared. I love it. I also recommend having player vs. player duels for gameplay checking and also, finding out ways on how to play the character from other players.
Hi can you add something inside the game like we can ride animal, it's make me feel more for game open world. This is best game ever need to add something cool like riding

Unfortunately, the developers have truly dropped the ball over the last few months. The quality of character gameplay design has been poor at best and the story's writing is declining to worrying levels. Additionally, the lack of communication about the anniversary and future events is extremely disappointing. I want to love this game but it's beginning to feel like there are too many flaws to overlook.

This game has quite possibly the best graphics in a mobile game that I have ever seen. The problem is that it's not very friendly with gacha rates, and getting stronger takes a decent amount of grinding. The story is very well written, the characters are very well done, and the exploration is endless, yet daunting at times. My last complaint stems from the battery life the game consumes. That may be a device issue rather than a game issue though.
I have been playing for almost 2years now it's awesome game recommended to download if you have great quality device nice qualitay
Good graphics and adventure story

Some details about weaponry, gaining objects, are constant obstacles. But the reason I give this game 5 stars, is because the scenery, dialog(Voice-acting), plot, and wide range of challenges. Everything in the game levels up as well as you. The challenges are never ending, and along with it, never ending fun. This is like being the character your playing as. I get attatchedto the characters and almost feel what they do. It's very engaging! 5 stars(again) you should INSTALL NOW!

I love the gameplay, the arts and graphics are breathtakingly beautiful, the music are greatly composed, all of the characters design are gorgeous, i've played this game since the 1st week of it released, i am very satisfied with my overall experiences playing this games. On the other had, i also hope that the developers can provide something special for the players during some special occasions.

I don't have enough tine to use the resine... you should learn from honkai star rail and give the oportunity to have more resine and also to save resine that was not used due to lack of time to be active in the game

I loved this game really much, but for a while it starts to crash on my phone and tablet, I can't even go into the actual game because on the phone it just freezes and doesn't move after, and on the tablet you can get to the door and after that it kicks you out of the game, I thought it was just a bug but after deinstalling and reinstalling it still had the same consequence, but the game is awesome and the graphics and sound is spectacular.

I love this game but unfortunately the game crashed for me and I had to re-install back for it to work again but when I tried to log in using the email I used before, it said it hasn't been registered and all of my achievements had gone down the drain. Can someone help me with this? I've gone too far and I don't want to restart back.... I love the game and wished to get my genshin account back... It happened just after I updated it.
my first underwater experience was so beautiful it felt so real that when i stopped, i felt tired as if i was diving irl. keep up the good work hoyoverse. <3

Its amazing! The graphics, gaming,(etc) are great. I've seen a comment saying that you can't walk slow but you actually can, however I've only been playing on a mobile so I'm not sure about it on PC and others with keyboards. Overall great storyline but I would love it if we could get more primogems on the daily tasks thanks !! :D
This is a beautiful game, every character is unique, and focus on small detail is just, perfect

Honestly, this is probably the best game I've downloaded ever. The graphics are astonishing and the character design and detailed and beautiful. The only probably is that sometimes the game randomly crashes (probably because of my device though). I really enjoy the quests aswell, they are fun, interesting and all the above! I highly recommend you to download this game!

Everything is going fine, except that it glitches sometimes whenever i join somebody's world. Also, would've been better if there were a choice to trade the characters you don't need for a character you actually need. That'd be cool asf, but hey, that's just a suggestion. Overall, good game. Highly suggest downloading it.
This game is super but I have one issue in network problem
Same boring heavy story focused game since day 1. But newly added soy boy card game. If you have insomia i recommend to play this game, 100% you'll sleep in 30mins of gameplay.

When I first downloaded I didn't expect much but then some how some way I love how much details they put on the game and how exciting it is to just play it now it's just the only game I play. I never experienced a game like this

The graphics, story, character development, voicing is great. I am really enjoying while playing this. It's addictive. But the main problem is the high demand of specs (though it's understandable). Overall, it really deserve the hype it's getting now and I wish they add many regions to it.
One of the best mobile games, especially if you love open world exploration, open combat system, unique characters and complex lore

A best open world game I ever played. The characters and the storyline is one of the best. Happy with the regular events so there's always something to do. With changes in the max resin it's a but easier to farm for things. Only two complaints- 1) should add alternative method for upgrading artifacts (like weapons) rather than only using artifacts as upgrading material..2) WHY ALWAYS DEF??

It's honestly one of the best mobile games I've ever seen AND played, I'm sure the resin or gacha system would need some tweaks in order to keep the game's audience, but as long as you go through the game at a moderate pace there shouldn't be any reason for u to need to spend money on such a high-quality and free to play game. It's truly breathtaking.

Genshi impact is easily one of the best games I have ever played. The graphics, story line, characters and aesthetic of the game are all on point. I never get tired of playing. What I also love about minhoyo is that they will give you primo gems or Mora if there is an update or If something goes wrong. The only trouble I've run into is a bit of a glitch where I was falling through the map but it hasn't happened again so it's not really a big deal.
It's really good, and cool, and the graphics are even better I say this game might be one of the most best fairy taled games I've ever played. ¬∞U¬∞

I'm really enjoying playing. The story, the graphics, and the characters are all amazing. My favorite so far is Lisa. My only complaint is the controls on mobile have the joystick too far towards the center of the screen and it makes moving around a little awkward. I can't put the game down though so I definitely recommend playing.

A really good game!! I really enjoy genshin a lot and its easy to be F2P (and avoid microtransactions) with a bit of luck and grinding. Most of the events give the currency you use to buy more wishes for free, so spending money is not required to have fun, even in late game. HOWEVER, I strongly recommend using PC or PlayStation instead. Mobile is incredibly frustrating to play on as its very demanding for the device and the controls are not the best. If possible, avoid playing this on mobile.

Played in the beginning, left for awhile, wanted to get back in for the Anniversary. But they really dropped the ball for Anniversary with the weak 10 pull. This game has a fairly unreasonable pay structure for rewards. The lack of resin has always been a huge problem. This game was well received initally and I had high hopes. It is too bad there haven't been positive changes to improve enjoyment for the players overall.
I absolutely love this game! Especially the amazing graphics and the story but...the story has been lately too childish.

Amazing potential. Developers are frequently probing the community for feedback, although so far results to feedback have been lackluster. The world is expansive and beautiful. Controls could be smoother. Once things calm down and we have enough content that we aren't throttled to a month of grinding for exp books only, not including the materials for character ascension, weapon upgrade and ascension materials, as well as the money for all of this. Then this game will really take off.

I loved the game!!! But the audio breaks up from time to time and it turns to just static demonic audio, so I had to exit the game and reopen it when the audio is like that. Other than that I love the game!!! (Please fix the audio) Update: So I got a new phone that is Google pixel 5G. It works great. The audio didn't crack one bit. High resolution devices might not have trouble with this I guess?
I really love this game the story is well written too it's fun to play and the characters look amazing I totally recommend it

It's a very fun game, I especially love the character and town designs. I also love how we have free will even when having missions. I would have rated it 5 stars, but it takes forever to load. For example, the other day, I went to play and let it load for a good 5 minutes but it only went from 00.00 to around03.45. but other than that, it's amazing. But please, make the load shorter if you could.

I am an end game player and I must say I still love it the way I used to when I first installed this. I was a bit skeptical initially since the size of the game is huuuuuge but given its beautiful graphics, I can see why. My only complain is that the rpg system is truly fricked up and the resin cap should be increased. Other than that, I am also concerned about safety issues since there has been a wave of hackers. It's still an amazing game though with a perfect balance of everything.
Great game i like the story and the graphics is amzing

I like the game but i dont know why it keeps crashing, i have 4gb ram snapdragon with 64gb rom (vivo) but it keeps crashing, i'm waiting for the switch version so i can actually play this or just please fix it for some phones, many people who uses vivo are experiencing the same too. Thank you Keep up the good work. And also please release it on switch, there are so many switch player are waiting for it to release.

THIS IS A FREE GAME !? The amount of work put into the world and it's characters from amazing smooth and fun animations, beautiful scenery, lore, amazing VAs, soundtrack, design... everything is just top tier quality it amazes me each time. Sometimes makes me feel bad to F2P. Not to mention the absolute convenience of cross platform play available. Highly-recommend üíØüíØüíØ

Update: 2.8 to 3.0 Genshin couldn't be better of a Game! Though i do wish there were more viable DPS characters instead of the support types we've been getting as of late. I love the game. No problems. Great storyline. Amazing art. I'd love to learn from the artists. VERY HAPPY WITH GENSHIN.! OLD: Keeps crashing after 2.5 update won't even get to the loading screen. Have plenty of available ram and storage space. I've even tried uninstalling and reinstalling twice

Genshin Impact is exactly what you would think of if you heard "like Breath of the Wild but mobile." And that's not a bad thing. It's a beautiful game with a ton of content and great exploration. The combat is genuinely fun, and the difficulty scales well to keep it interesting. Even without cross-save, I think this is probably the best mobile game ever made.

The beginning experience is fun, but at endgame, the content becomes very dry and there's nothing meaningful to do outside of waiting for energy. Over time, the devs started to get more careless and stopped acknowledging player feedback as much. They've ignored multiple bugs with characters that have been there for a long time. And now with the anniversary, they've essentially ignored the player base entirely. Sad to see. Aside from that, the characters are pretty cool.

Best simulated MMORPG. Game systems remind me of Mabinogi and Skyrim along with Tales Series graphics and gameplay, but open world and in MMO format. Issues with UI button locations and size options missing, camera angles and auto rotation needing adjustment for accuracy and viewing angles directly up and directly down need tweaking for accuracy without auto-rotation and adjustment. There needs to be a button toggle for auto-climb or a UI button to control when to climb.

The game is freemium, but definitely not pay to win. It must remain that way. My only issue is that characters you interact with and allegedly go adventuring with don't appear at all during the gameplay in many instances if you don't unlock them permanently. You just don't get the right feeling doing quests, because the key characters aren't there. Devs, you need to include them as playable characters in more main quests or just make it so they fight alongside you to make story more immersive.

This is one of a kind. It's rare enough to find a good mobile game, let alone feel like you playing a video game instead of auto through whole game like most games on the store. Combat and story are servicable Voice acting, environment design, music are superb. On the downside, Genshin is very graphically heavy forbmost mobile phone, I would recommend to play on PC instead and treat mobile version as secondary when you can't access your PC.

I tend to back away from large games, but I tried this out of curiosity. I am not disappointed. What really hooked me into this game is how it runs under weak internet connection, it doesn't lag! The quests are engaging, the artstyle is just beautiful, though kinda confusing for someone with no RPG/Gatcha experience. I rarely stay engaged playing RPGs, but this is just perfect for me. I love the open world aspect, and how you can just travel around the map if you're bored.
So far, I'm having a hard time to get new characters especially 5 stars. It makes me lose the excitement to continue the game. üôÇ
I can't login it stops at geo and goes back down and crashes I don't know why it's annoying.But It's so fun like really it has an amazing story and characters

Great game... An open world RPG with a great emphasis in exploration, dungeon clearing and character based combat... It is awesome to say the least, by whatever magic makes it run on your phone, but needs optimization for other phones that are entry level for faster playability... Overall, it is a great experience but needs to have more options to degrade graphics so that more players can enjoy the game...

I've been having fun! (Albeit stockholm syndrome esc in my current living conditions, but fun nonetheless) However I've been having massive issues with framerate on the lowest settings with a relatively decent phone. It struggles to reach a constant 60 fps and hits a solid 20 if fighting. Dungeons are fine, it's roughly 60 fps In dungeons, anywhere besides indoors or underground and the framerate tanks. And I love taking photos! but you can't change the time mid photo and it bugs me a ton.

A game that plays as if you paid for it but it's free! Incredible graphics, storytelling, voice acting, and gameplay. Getting new characters, items, and exploring the world is addictive and fun. 100% worth a try if you're a fan of games like Zelda: Breath of the Wild, anime, or just exploring and getting better at killing monsters.

The graphics and cut scenes are gorgeous, and the battle mechanics are really intuitive. It operates like a good quality rpg, and even has a gacha system for new characters, each with their own incredibly diverse style. There are sometimes where the motion controls get a bit janky, but besides that the story and scenery are absolutely gorgeous
This game is fantastic but there are very network issues

I am playing on an android phone, and though the download time took about thirty minutes for me I felt that unlike most, that was quite manageable. Thank You!

Amazing game! Still can't believe this is free to play! One of the best games you could play right now using a mid-range up to a high-end mobile device. Edit: Uninstalling it now in Nov 2023 after 4.2 patch dropped. It was a fun game for a long while!

wish it was more compatable with more devices ;; genshin is honestly my favourite game as of right now. the graphics are honestly so amazing. just wish that it was more compatible with things like chromebooks and phones. on any phone, it takes a couple hours to load, and as for chromebook it just freezes mid-load. kinda sucks as im missing on the venti banner due to this, other than that amazing game with a great structure and story.

The game great and all but I have 2 issues, 1. you can't switch server without losing your save data. So could you add data transfer between 2 servers? Make it like once every 2 weeks or month that you can transfer server 2. There has been an awful amount of lag lately even if running on high end device on the lowest possible graphic settings. The mobile version doesn't do this game justice, it's much less laggier on console and on a good pc. The graphics are amazing on those platforms, the music is great and the story is great. However once you complete the story there is next to nothing to do and it gets repetitive very fast. It's very difficult to earn primogems so in order to actually have a great experience with the game, you're basically forced to spend money on it.

Holy Cow this game is amazing!!! The humor, the story, cutscenes, world, fighting mechanics, controls, characters are truly well made. I don't have Genshin on this particular account but,this is by far the best game i have played! This is a solid example of a fun exploration game. The elemental combat interactions are great and enemies get more complex with time. My only complaint is the speed at which one unlocks the map is lower than my desire, but it may be protection from wandering into instant death this early in the game.

The game is free to play, offers a lot of stories, exploration, puzzles and regular updates with new characters, new events and at some points even new regions. All within Open World. Some extra rewards that are expected by seasoned players are kinda lacking, but if you put all of them together, I'd say it is decent.

During combat the camera is very bad. it sets the pov to the ground and all i can see is grass. Also i would really like the game to be snappier, i hate that i have to wait for animations to end, like when a character dies I'm screaming SWIIIIIITCH and there i am, infuriated. The swapping is one of the main thing that makes me annoyed the most, and the fact that i have to dash cancel and there's a cool down after the second dash to dash again. Pls change it, its only purpose is to be annoying.

An overall great game. It lags heavily on mobile though. The graphics, design and lore are very interesting, however the recent 2.4 update seems to have caused a huge lag although my ping is usually under 100ms. The mobs die 5 minutes later after they have been killed. I struggled severly on a quest as I couldn't kill the mobs. The mobs would randomly die and disappear minutes later. I'm not sure how to fix the bug, but overall it's a really great game and quite time consuming..

Good game. I play it on computer and tried it on mobile. It's like 30gb on mobile rn and will get larger with updates so you need good storage to run this game. If you are complaining about the 30gb size for mobile, you would be surprised to hear that it's more than double that for the other platforms it's available on.

Definitely a battery burner like most mobile games. Graphics are amazing if you have the internet for it, still pretty nice when you don't haha. Story is constantly being updated and always keeps you interested. New characters and landscapes keep you busy. Other players are always friendly and helpful in co-op mode. Overall great game and I always try to recommend it.
10/10 This is a Action Rpg game that just has gacha elements the open world exploration and storyline is amazing! The voice acting is also phenomenal! The community are very open and kind!

So far I am enjoying it a lot. I love exploring the world and the combat is fun so far. Best graphics and so many diverse characters!!

Despite the obviously high production value, Genshin Impact lacks some basic QOL features I've seen out of other mobile games. There's no setting to change the location of the virtual joystick, no controller support, and no options for changing the layout of the attack and skill buttons. The camera also makes moving and combat a real chore, always zooming in and pointing at the ground. The player character's head keeps blocking things I'm trying to see, like enemies.

It's fun as there are many places to explore, I love how they use different places for each nation like how mondstat is inspired by Germany. And the amount of detail there is. The meaning behind each name, they also put a lot of effort into the story and also of the characters and little story quest for us to learn more about them. They also inspire of many things. It's fun and enjoyable game and I highly recommend it. I been playing it for more than a year and am now at 57.

I have mix felling about this game, the story is well done, but this doesn't stop the game from having cons. The game have your standard mobile "energy " which you have X amount to use to farm mats. The biggest problem the way the game designed for progression.
I like the game but when it says I need more storage space and I can't play when I try to make a new account I try to delete everything but doesn't work

It's a strange combination of a Skyrim type finite single player gameplay and gacha mechanics with little reason to pay for them. But if you are willing to accept a bit of randomness in what characters and weapons you are able to get, it is a great game. Quests are just as shallow as Skyrim, but the world is so easy to get lost in. A lot of the game is about collecting items and grinding but it is exceptionally enjoyable in this one.
Repeated and boring daily quest. Run through the whole maps just to get 10 primo. Too much unskipped story. High ms. And not even an f2p friendly game.

The game got better in the recent few updates. As for the reason, it's because there has been new stuff to explore on each update for the last few patches and the lore reveals have made the plot more interesting. However, the game lacks some serious QoL improvements and more endgame content like Spiral Abyss. Although this has turned into my comfort game, I still wouldn't recommend this to people who can manage to find time to play for long periods.

One of the best games with amazing graphics and one that the advertisement and promotional videos are actually how it looks like in the game. how come no controller support for android but ios does? very unbias. i will play again if they add controller support for android, i might give 5 stars for that.

One of the best graphics and no adds and it does not glitch

The game is fine. What isn't fine is that it takes up 24.4gb on my device and doesn't offer controller support, yet ios has it. If controller support is added, I'll reinstall.

This is farmost the bestest open world game on mobile that I have ever played. Great graphics, satisfying actions, heartwarming storyline, and best of all, awesome characters. Although the main problem I've encounter so far is that the game requires a very strong internet connection to play throughout the game, even on single player. This issue should be optimize for a better gaming experience for those who does not have a strong internet connection when playing

Amazing game, extremely well polished, deserves every praise it can get. Wish system is too hard though, for a mobile game it should be easier to get characters and weapons considering we need to get more of the same one to max them out.. Also resin (energy system) is very stingy, dont expect to play much more then 15mins later in the game, and dailys to resolve takes 15ish minutes. After that everything else is gated behind resin (energy) making me want to play something else which is sad :(

Still a good game, though I only use mobile for purchases and primarily play on PC. I wish the game didn't time-gate as much and expanded the ability to play more at the users own pace, regardless of how fast it slow they'd like to go through content, but understand the game is still in development and this may not be feasible at this time. I hope they do consider increasing resin; improving drop rates and attribute rates on artifacts; and updating the standard banner as the game matures.

This is a great game, I absolutely love it! The graphics are beautiful, the gameplay is great, and it's just overall wonderful. I definitely recommend it if you are a mature age. There is mention of alchohol, and you gotta fight enemies, but that's why it has an age recommendation. Very fun, 12/10 Edit: Can't play on my phone anymore because of the 2 Gigabyte update :/ This game kills your storage, not recommend for devices with small storage. This one game alone took up 24 gigabytes.

Another year, another review. This is an amazing game, I'll say that. There's many cool stuff worthy of praise, with an amazing lore, amazing characters, amazing designs. Some of the friends I made here are people I'll treasure for a long long time. I think anyone who can should play it. There's also a lot of stuff to complain about, like how long it takes for the lore to progress and the bit of neglect the fanbase gets, but no one should let that stop you from playing.
Honestly one of the best infact the best free to play open world RPG available for mobile platforms absolutely love the gameplay and graphics and storyline
Awesome game! It has really great storyline and characters! Also I like the beauty of the game. I would recommend this game for everyone. Keep it up!

I give it a 5 star for the incredible graphics, well versed story line, unique characters and fighting styles, and many more top notch techs they incorporated in the game. However, due to the enormous amount of data it spills, many average players vould not play - because of incompatible devices and slow ISP.

Great game, alone or with friends, and across pc or mobile. My favorite mobile game in recent years, and one that's kept me engaged for almost a year already. Art is beautiful, story and characters are memorable, and story progression isn't blocked on paying. This is a gacha game, so you can get better characters by paying, but I appreciate how the game doesn't feel like it requires it.

Very rough to play on mobile, the archer characters have an insane disadvantage with touch controls and are virtually unusable. Most smart phones aren't capable of running the game to its max graphical settings, so it's an easy skip if you have a PC capable of running it.

Now with my phone it does not run well but thats just me. This game is short and could be played in one sitting but it is still challenging and very fun. And I like how many characters you can play as. Also when you beat the game you can do side quests. You don't need to spend money at all. So overall great game and I loved playing it.

Been playing for months now and I enjoyed it all to the point where it becomes monotonic. Grinding to build a single character requires repeating the same thing for months. Events keeps the game going but the story is what actually makes this interesting.

If u want a good f2p game this is the one. The only issue I have with the game is that u need a lot of GB and I mean a lot. 1.3 needed 8GB and then 1.4 needed 2GB extra. Other than that it is absolutely amazing for both story and gameplay. I have been playing since the launch and I never needed to pay. I love this game like crazy.

For about a year now, the game is now getting boring. Imagine, having more characters even though the game is still in its third nation (Inazuma). Standard characters are now useless. It looks like this now a pay to win game for you to enjoy. Hopefully, some of the featured characters can also be obtained through standard banners in the future like the 4-stars.

Great game amazing everything. I love the story and the combat is so addicting no matter how many times I do it. My only complaint is that it can take a while for the textures to render and the cutscenes lag a lot and sometimes stay frozen but that's somewhat excusable considering that this was meant for pc.

Have been playing the game for a week now everything seems perfect and fun except for the monstrous size of the app and the data it consumes during each update. It would be more efficient if the players could configure what additional file to download or not as per there choice just like pubg, apex ledgen Or even like league of ledgens.

I love the game and the adventure in the game. It's just that, i want to make the character more detailed but i cannot put it in high in the settings because I don't like how the camera animation when shifted or turned, but i love the game. It's okay to keep my game in medium or low ‚ù§Ô∏è
Just got back but the game seriously large, 26gb is enough but additional 14gb for 4.0 update..ughh really? Sorry I rather play HSR. I think genshin only great if you play on PC.

Have played this game since release and completed it (so far). Every achievement, most characters lvl 90, tons of weapons, artifacts, explored every region 100%, participated in each event - it's something that took me through a wonderful journey and the game keeps getting better. Of course, not every game is perfect, but this has been the only game I've sincerely stuck with. It is absolutely worth it and extremely fun. I'm also F2P besides welkin and BP sometimes! It has a lot to offer!! <3

It is a marvelous game ngl! The mobile version has its problems for how big it is (I moved to PC so it's perfect now) amazing graphics, engaging story that is still ongoing! The gacha aspect rlly makes it a bit harsh to F2P users but you can manage pretty well! The constant events and their prices are good! Something I personally would like to see added is alt outfits for various characters like Amber from the manga which is so cute <3 anyways 5/5 stars best anime style open world game so far!

For the past year of playing this game, from what i experienced it is a good game, great even. You can get many things from the game considering it is a free game. Sure there is the gacha, but it is the player's choice to spend money. You can really get attached to the characters with building them and reading their lore. And the sites of the regions are very beautiful. Happy anniversary Genshin Impact. Even though, i think the anniversary events & rewards are a bit lacking i really had fun.

the game is awesome, just like that, open world like no other, free to play friendly as it can get, fun to no end, but I can't really give it all 5 stars, since as all things, it's not flawless, there are times when it can feel off, not majorly, but it's still there, like even on the PC version I outright can't kill one of the bosses no matter what I did, I mean, it doesn't stop progression, but it locked an entire element type of characters from getting past a certain level.
great game but the problem is the developer itself because they think players who plays this game plays on their PC... please be considerate, your game is using up too much space on our phones üò°

New update today: 11/11. I always loved this game, but always found weird that using elemental skills from my characters to fight would also cause damage to them. It never made sense, but ok, it was a damage that they could take and survive. Now, they have updated that and the damage now is way worse! THAT'S JUST STUPID AND MAKES NO SENSE! I'll have to avoid using electric on water to avoid getting killed by myself! What's the sense on that? That's precisely when we need those skills and now...

Everything so far about this game is amazing. The items to craft, the weapons to get and enhance, the characters to meet and play as are all great aspects of the game. Open world games are always more interesting to play and the controls are pretty easy to get used to.

I've never seen a game in mobile with this level of polish and yet I am very excited with all the things you'll be adding in the future like expansions, seasons, actual cosmetic items or other forms of character customisation. You can even play it and have fun without buying anything, which is rare considering its on mobile. I truly do appreciate the effort you've put into this game, something I've never seen from any mobile game before. Giving a 5 star review is the least that i can do.

It's the most amazing game I have ever played The storyline,the characters,the designs,the quality, the art and everything thing about it is awesome the only issue is the storage. Alot of people want to play the game but they don't storage on their phone and there are some devices that has low RAM But everything about the game is awesome. Thanks you for making this game for us we really appreciate it ^^

It's allot of fun and beautiful game. The only being I can complain about is the fact that there is no controller support yet. Hopefully they ad that soon and that the tough controller make it hard for intense combat. But if you can look past that and I hope you do it's a great game.

Great characters, story, music, so yes the parts are great the sum of most of it is great! The want from the gacha system is real and honestly could break a person without limits but is not needed for gameplay However if you do really like a characters form of gameplay i recommend spending to get them as fight style usually revolves around a character
I feel that their could be so much more but otherwise I love the game

I can't get in my ps4 account even I already link it with my gmail it's keeping said account or password error but after I tried to register it said account email already exist and after I change my password it's still the same

Not worth it anymore. It started being another chinesd gacha. Pros: this game is so addictive at the beginning. The visuals are great, alot of thought was put into the map. Cons: treats the community like trash, becoming a cash-grab at this point. The stories are becoming rushed and a cringy dating sim, instead of expanding on the characters and their motives.

It's a great game, I really like the plot and character releases- I enjoy the game alot, but I was hoping for hoyoverse to give more primogems on longer and harder quests, especially with puzzles. There are quests that I find hard and too long for just 60 primogems. I find it hard to earn primogems once you reach high AR.

I'm in the Asia server and i dont know if anyone else could also experience this but please i hope this can be fixed soon cuz im definitely sure that nothing is wrong with my network and this has been happening for days. I hope this can be fixed. Although i rlly love the game! (Been playing since beta)

One of my all time favorite games. I usually play on ps4 however I wanted to try it on mobile. Its not as great as it is on pc or ps but for a mobile game, its awesome. So the game itself, theres a lot of grinding (especially when you get to higher ranks) but if you're okay with that and can still stay committed to the game, its really fulfilling to play. Theres many things you can do (explore, fight, level up your characters, customize your own inner world [serenity pot] etc. ) so yeah try it!

Its a good game with lots of puzzles and adventure very addicting game but there's things that make me upset like 1.power creeping: its a problem not most people care about but for some people there favorite character will slowly be unusable in the coming months and new characters will thrive in the meta, making people uninterested in playing. 2.not listening to the community: hoyovers is known to not listen to the players especially with character bugs fix or character buffs they never listen.

Definitely one of the best games ive played. Its so addictive and so good. Even though all I do is my dailies and use resin, the co-op system really makes the experience even better Im not someone who uses the wish system much, but i really do love it. People rated this game 3.9 i guess cause we dont get many primogems? Well, the game isnt only about wishing, even after youve completed all quests. I really love this game, and cannot wait to see what the future stories will be like!
I love it I can not take my eyes off of the game until I finish a missio
The game keeps improving with every patch! In all aspects.

Yooooo, such a great game. Surprised that it's so free to play. Absolutely love it. Would give it 6 stars if I could. Games like this were never free when I was younger. Open world greatness. Plenty of baddies to fight and skills to learn. It's a large download. If you don't have the memory.... Clear it! It's worth it. I promise. Also, you may need a newish device. I've seen complaints that it doesn't work well on less technologically advanced phones or tablets. Keep up the great work. üìú‚öîÔ∏èüõ°Ô∏è

I really love genshin impact, the graphics are super detail and cool. I would recommend having this game and the characters are so unique and have their own ability and you collect characters along the way. Super easy to get them, but comes along of alot quest, which makes it fun.

Not going to lie, but the main story line is really what keeps me going in this game, and maybe a little bit of stress relief and meta to become better at building things in the future. Even if the new quest was rushed it still managed to give me goosebumps, which means in some way it was still good but unimpressive. The game is slowly falling apart and the majority is quitting because of the game's latest actions. I do hope you respond to this issue as this one can affect the game so much.

While the game itself is amazing, this game is not meant to be played on mobile. Its highly optimized, but there's still a lot of lag. Tabbing out of the app will cause you to relog into the game, with an insanely long load time. This app should only be used for story, dialog or character enhancement; anything where lag would not matter.

Absolutely love this game, I can't stop playing! It's exactly like the adds make it out to be and it's nothing like any other adventure and/or survival game out there. The story line keeps you on your toes and you never know what's gonna happen next, not to mention the character designs are gorgeous! Over all its amazing. Would recommend playing if you're into a long game with a detailed storyline. If you tend to not listen to the lore in games I wouldn't recommend because the lore is important.

This is a really good and entertaining game! And I love how you guys designed the characters and I love how everything is very pretty and all of them are nicely detailed! But the only thing I dislike about the game is artifacts. Trying to get good stats in artifacts are kinda just based on how lucky you are and it's tiring to keep doing the same domain again and again just to get one single good stat artifacts. That's why i don't like artifact farming since it always takes so much of my time.

Good open world, cool chracters, good music, and decent story. Im not a big fan of how some upgrade materials for weapons/characters can only be obtained at specific times but I understand its designed to keep players coming back. Also not a fan of gacha games but at least you can mostly avoid the gacha system if you are a f2p player. Overall a good game.

ive been a fan of this game for a long time and finally got around to play it, the game is great. there's a lot of stuffs to do as a new player, although its a bit sad that i have to miss out a lot of limited events. still, its a lot for my phone to handle, which isnt the game fault at all. but im a bit confused as why there're certain things you cant do when you're in co op mode, thats the reason why i have to remove one star. still, i like this game.

Reason I'm giving this 1 star is simply because the game won't work. I want others to enjoy this game without any "Network error" atrocities occurring. But it seems no matter what I do the game won't let me in. I just started playing, and from the looks of it I can't even start the game because of the stupid update errors.
