Love the game! I'm not really mad about the rewards since I find more enjoyment in the gameplay rather than the rewards. This game has made this one year so much better for me. Would be great if we got a skin or a namecard for 1 year of playing. But I won't stop playing the game just because of some rewards. The reward for me was meeting great people along this way.

Really love the game plot and graphics its all well done but I recently got a new phone and the ram isnt all that bad but despite that the game lags a lot and I sometimes dont see the enemy's health and I never see the amount of damage I do. Ive played on different devices and Ive never had this problem before. I dont know if its just a me problem

The game itself is amazing. There a lot of things you can do beside the storyline since it's an open world type of game. Although I experienced a bit of frame drops everytime I teleported to places but I'm okay with that. So far it's the best game I've ever played. Also can you add adjustment to low-end phone, my cousin love this game but unfortunately he doesn't have good phone right now. Hope you can make adjustments for those players who can afford a high-specs phone

Great game I mean they really did go full crazy mode and did this but this game takes so long to install (not from google play that part is fast) but damn you will be waiting for a century almost. I installed it yesterday and its been 9 hours and its still downloading like 1st and 2nd download was completed but the 3rd was stuck at 86.0% and its has been like that for 2 hours even though I closed and opened the game again but now its 96.58% so it improved but I still didn't get a chance to play.
Do not play this game, once you play this game its hard to get out, you will become genshin addictor. Overallthis game is awesome, just need very good device

Ok. Well. The game itself? It's fantastic. I really do love it. The scenery is beautiful and the character designs are lovely as well. The story could use a bit of work, I think that's a general consensus among players. The connect between company and players isn't very great though. It's proven by the huge anniversary backlash. Many people were upset by the lack of regard for communication and widespread censorship of valid frustration. But overall, I do love the game.

This is kind of the best game you could wish for! Unlike other games you can climb houses mountains buildings and actually swim! The graphics are beautiful and well made the character designs and backstory are also amazing, the events are super fun and there are just so many things to do! I would delete all my games to keep Genshin Impact.

it's a really good game, but the company doesn't. you guys don't care about mobile players and you keep releasing more heavy updates and you're losing a lot of mobile players because of it! The artifact drop system sucks, it can take months to not be able to build a character and there are ppl who simply quit the game because they are too weak for the mobs in the game, I hope you rethink your choices, hoyoverse!

I like this game. But it's difficult to play the game if there are glitches at dvalin's story and boss battle. I used a phone to play it, and I am not sure if it also applies to there players as well... And the space it takes on phone is actually 14gb or more. It grows a bit, per update the game takes. if you play it on phone, make sure to have spare storage for this.

A nice game for people who wants a place to escape to, with its lovely, idealistic world, intriguing plot, and mesmerizing score. If you have a gacha addiction or unable to budgeting though, this might not be the game for you. Personally I think the main story took a nosedive in quality in patch 2.1, but I still have hope for the future of the game.

The downloading resources is repeating back to zero. I waited for several hours to download it to 10GB. I paused it and I decided to continue it later but it back to start again, repeating me to download 15 Gb resources. I didn't reset or clear anything and the storage of this game is here filling my phone storage. I repeat it 2 times but it didn't work, back to start again.

This game is the best of all of the best games I've ever played.I'm a type of person who gets really bored in games but Genshin Impact is really unique.Although,the game crashes frequently, in the end,I realize that my phone can't really handle the game,for me the game is not the problem when I'm playing it,it is the device that I use,thus, a high graphical good game requires a good device to be able to handle it.It changes the perspective of my life, on how I understand certain things.ILOVEIT.

No ads first off, I have been playing for a few days and the only time it asked if I could do something was to write a review which I was happy too. Its a fully fleshed out single player mobile game that has 0 to no drawbacks for being a non-paying player. Gameplay wise if you love botw you will like this. Same combat but it gets slightly stale if you only play with 1 character. The game notices this and has enemies and puzzles requiring different elements so you have to switch up your gameplay.

Genshin Impact is probably the best open world ANIME RPG you will find in this time. The characters are interesting and diverse, the elemental system adds a lot of depth to combat and the story will make you want to keep playing! Although, this game is heavily gacha reliant to get new characters and the rates aren't the best and the cash resource is very scarce in comparison to how expensive the gacha is.
This 4.1 update exploration makes me really sick then dizziness and nausea

The game is just amazing !!! I'm more into the lore about the characters , weapons and artifacts have. The game is unique due to the subtle differences in the tiniest of details both in open world and in domains. It would have been more fun to play if the game was better optimized for mobile gameplay.

Its fun, has beautiful music and interesting lore for a game thats free to play. Its definitely playable without spending money on it, but it also depends on your expectations and preferred playstyle. The online concert was a really cool anniversary gift tbh! It really brought back all the feels from when I first started playing the game :')

This program inserts a cookie that identifies you by processor serial number among other things. They track and record all internet activities, including exact pages and data on when and what you do on all pages. Note the risk of criminal use of this information.

The game is quite enjoyable with a story and sidequests to keep you entertained. I don't mind the gacha system much. Yes it can be a money grabber but there's also a f2p, though it can take time to save primos. It's also not the end of the world if u don't get a character u want, most of them aren't limited time anyways and most get reruns lol.

It is my currently favorite mmorpg game in mobile. I like its design, animation, and combat styles. As well as I also like its story, and the new update which is the Serenitea pot. I have a suggestion though, the xp you gain on mobs is extremely low, not recommendable to grind mobs for character xp, might've been better if you buff it or maybe remove it.

This game is good I've been playing since the game came out I have took some breaks and I regret on all the events I missed. Being f2p is hard because of how quickly priomgems go fast. some other cons are that this game is very time gated you need to spend alot of time and resin to level up some materials are only available on certain days. I really hope that some of these common problems can be fixed for the time being this game has really cool animations and graphics so I would recommend this

Uhh it's kinda boring now. It is a stunning game but there is little to no endgame content and the pity system is extremely unfair and annoying. The game creators have barely any representation of black cultures with characters and designs. Other than a few other problems, the game is a solid rpg/mmo game with fun gameplay, lots of characters and cool characters animations. The lore of the game is very deep and is all explained or yet to be. This is not a grindy game so play once every few days!

Repetitive after you finish all the current story updates, but inbetween updates you can farm primogems to save for new characters. Story and characters are great, but wish we could somehow breeze through the time-consuming non-important daily commissions I between updates. Also wish there was an easier way to keep track of your wishes, like a counter or something in the banner pages, so we can easily see when we get our guaranteed 5 star.

I really enjoy playing genshin because of it's sceneries,quality,how much there is to explore and it's like the adventure never ends,althought there are lots of games that have the same idea of adventure and fighting genshin is different I can't easily get bored of it and quests never end and even if there aren't any quest you could explore the map in general and do challenges,open chests and gain Xp,I really think you should try Genshin out even if you have no interest in adventure games.
Is Good I been playing since the first ayaka banner I did stop at some point because school but now I'm back but not as active like in the past.

The best adventure & storyline game ever! I've tried many different games that are adventure and has a storyline but this is the best so far, the other games didn't really get my interest in playing but as soon as I found this game I was surprised that this game is no other like adventure and storyline games! This game is easy to play unlike the other ones are very confusing and too messy. I am glad that I found this game!

How is this game 1 year after it comes out : 1) Almost no end game content. 2) A resin system that limits your progression so badly that you can't get a decent level and equipment for the characters you have. 3) When you are done exploring, there is nothing to do 4) RNG based 5) A first year anniversary event that is a slap in the face of many players and show how greedy MiHoYo is : almost no rewards were given. The worst part is that players were asked to make advertising for the game. lol

It was good! Everything seems well balanced and well. I like how some things are timed out because it's a good reminder to go outside and/or do other things. Also loved the characters and their stories, just wished for a little more diversity in skin color and body type/height (reminder that as long as the earth quarters exist, light and darker skin tones will exist.) But anyways, to everyone giving the game a 1 star because of the anniversary rewards, y'all are petty asf I'm sorry.

Update after some more time playing it. Graphics, gameplay and story are still great, but the big problem is the stamina system (resin). In half an hour you'll have done everything you can do and drained your stamina, and there's nothing really to do while it regens - one point every 8 minutes and you'll need 20 at a minimum so 2.5 hours wait to run a dungeon or ley line. 7.5 hours wait to run a boss. So far I'm still enjoying roaming and seeing the sights while waiting, but that'll fade.

While the game itself isn't bad. It has become boring where there are less stuff to do. There are a lot of re-works of many characters that needs to be done. I would also like to address the underwhelming reward of the anniversary where everything are web event and less in-game content that has a few rewards.

definitely a good game, good graphics, all in one tbh. the characters are well designed and also the story line is very interesting but the storage intake is too big. there are still some bugs, hopefully you guys can fix, ping issues and stuff. overall, it's great.

Nice game,nice graphic and story. But the game is very easy and there are no hard contents in this game so there is no need for you to spend money in this game. So if you are willing to spend money don't spend more than battle pass or walking moon. It's not worth to spend money on it.I gave it 1 star because early game it's soo fun but late game when u reach level 50 or above it will be soo boring nothing to do other than doing commissions and spend Resin then log out.
Best game ever it is so fun also the archon quest is amazing ü§©ü§©üòç‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüíØ

I am truly impressed with just how beautiful this game looks on my phone. I'm running it on the OnePlus 7pro and it is captivating. The lore, the charm, music, and combat blend together in a way that draw you in and make you want to stay and explore. It can be a bit of a grind the further you get though which is the downside but other than that pop some headphones in and breeze through quarantines with this game.

Paradigm shift, this just set a new bar for mobile games. Its now up to every other dev to catch up. Every now and then something happens that moves a genre, or a platform forward, proving that its capable of handling a game so profoundly polished, so huge that we can only look in awe and hope that from now on this is the quality and scope we will continue to get. GENSHIN impact is that step forward.Phenomenal a breath of fresh air in a stale platform overrun with autoplay shallow titles.

I was one of the players who started playing since its official launch and honestly, i fell in love with the game. It has astounding graphics and awesome voice actors. The background music and sfx was tantalizing. There was too much to explore and it made it all the more addictive. But as the game progressed there was less and less new contents. Some events were fun, but some were just too cumbersome and not too rewarding. Events only gave primos enough for 1-2 pulls, then you get debate club.
When I play on my laptop and went to Fontaine, it always freez and crashes, I tried playing on my phone and it works perfectly fine. Please fix this

Beautiful game that has massive issues in its core loop. It markets itself as a "game as a service" but then tries all it can to stop users from playing the content they paid for. It should be played as a 1 time RPG and dropped afterwards. Updating to 4 stars duo to recent events and content, it would be a 5 star if said content could actually last the update's life time ~6 weeks, but instead it last for rougly half of it and the original issue returns. Heres hopping for future improvements.

Great game on PC. Not so much on Mobile. I have a Moto G Stylist phone and it can run a lot of demanding games but for some reason not this one even on the lowest graphic settings. It would be great if it was better optimized because I would love to play this on the go rather than only ever having to play it on PC

I've been playing it for 2 years, the game itself is fun. There's a lot to do in it, from exploring, to puzzle solving, to quest lines that are part of the base game. Then you have events that add more to the aforementioned stuff above. Music is outstanding, quite atmospheric. Graphics are nice and pleasant to the eyes. Unfortunately the RNG that comes from the gacha system, artifact type and stats plus the stamina function, keeps this game from being a 5 star.

In my opinion it's probably the best game ever. I usually have a hard time playing games and get bored easily, but with Genshin impact the story line, the side stories, the quests, the fighting and the animation is truly so amazing. Let's not even get started on how great the characters are and how beautifully the cut scenes are made.

I really never write comments on any games or apps, i guess this is the first time. Truly I've never played such an wonderful game, It's story line mainly archon quests are so good and especially the graphics and music themes are so relaxing amazing and there are so many cool characters. It's not only thing there are so many other things to do you can coop with others, puzzles, charaters building etc just because of these i don't get bored. It's worth playing Thank you Hyoyoverse!

First of all, This game is good, good graphics, good music and good story, but it's lagging and consume more battery, and give us the option to twick the draw distance because it load the 500 metres away mountain and that's what makes the game lag most of the time. The camera is far far away from the character if it's near the character, I would be immersed in the gameplay, the camera zoom is not helping because after some times the camera comes to the normal position

Edit: One of the greatest open world, animethetic action RPGs of this time. World/Character Design is amazing and a joy to explore while listening to enchanting orchestral OSTs. Combat and grinding gets abit boring after a while but that is due to endgame. But most of the latest characters need extreme balancing and any new players will be SOL until they spend 50+ hours of main story (+extra weeks of grinding AR) to be able to upgrade them (mats are AR/region locked). This system makes no sense.
This is the opest game I have ever played . This is the best game who want to play open world adventure games.

Game is absolutley beautiful and the story is really good. But i was deeply disapointed once i downloaded it to find its essentially a one player game (though a co op with another person can be done). It certainly isnt an mmo rpg. Had this been done in a the same way that Toram and other similar games have, with these graphics and depth of story, this would be unbeatable.

The game is 10/10 on PC however the mobile version should use some work, It's extremely laggy even with everything at it's lowest settings, my best guess is the character models have too many polygons for a mobile device to render yet I'm not a programmer. I'd suggest to play this on your computer if you have one cause it runs much better on there.

The game is super good and the characters are so cool but overall farming artifact is pain but it's worth if you got lucky! The anniversary reward is kinda forced! And overall the game looks so cool and good character but they need to add resin or lower down the resin cost because it's going to take a lot of time to build your characters but all i say now is the game super good i got no plan to quit in the game because it's so good gatcha game I've been playing!!!

Absolutely beautiful game. The graphics are simply amazing and the storyline and plot is extremely well thought-out. The characters are really likable too and the enemies are all really fun to fight. I have experienced minor glitches when I play but there was nothing major that stopped me from enjoying it.

Great game, Diverse stories, and events. But playing for almost 3 years there is one thing I'm annoyed in this game. And that is the time of loading every domains, house, etc. Can you remove loading when entering domains or houses like Witcher 3 for example.

The story line is great, the character design.. well let's not talk about it since this is hyv's games of course it'll be amazing, the amount of content in each update is sufficient, the difficulty is just right (Well it's hard if u can't READ) all in all it's a great games other than the weapon banner being a bij haha. If the Epitomized Path's pity carry on whenever the banner change it'll be great.

Overall the game is nice and the storyline is also good. Even the characters are well made, except Dehya. (Her kit is literally the worst but it's not like we are gonna get characters like Hu Tao or Raiden Shogun everytime) Please optimise the game for low-end devices. (Overheating, lagging, crashing very frequently) The graphics is messed up. (Lags on Lowest Graphics but it's smoothly playable on Medium-High Graphics with some overheat and lag with no constant frame rates) Vivo Z1 Pro (4+64 GB)

Good graphics on it. But it's a copy of zelda. The enemies are similar aswell. There's no real different biome and it looks the same. The reason I'm not saying stuff about them copying the glider is because it's a good way to travel and without it everyone will complain about the travel being slow. The "puzzles" aren't even puzzles as they show you the way. And Paimon is super annoying and they show cut scenes like at the start "swim over the lake" for no reason. Just a Zelda copy.

Great story, very engaging, if you try this game dont give up on it till you've gotten the first story quest done the game picks up in speed quite a bit after, upgrading characters and gear is easy and their is a bit of grind involved that doesn't feel like a hassle with a healthy amount of world lore. Noticed an issue with an achievement, recently i got the daily commission to play pirates with the 3 little kids on the ship, I was not credited the achievement for playing pirate with them

It's a fun game and feels like playing an expansion of Breath of the Wild, but touch controls are a nuisance in any fps/tps-style game. Without controller support on Android, I won't be playing Genshin Impact. There is no reason for this game to not support an Xbox controller since Android has Xbox controller support out of the box. Microsoft has made it easy and free for developers to implement controller support on Android. I will update my review and play when controller support is added.

Its a great game, however i think people should be able to buy genesis crystals on any device instead of it only being the one you started on. My PS4 account is American, so my server is automatically set to america and currency is set to USD,however I live in Hong Kong, and getting a playstation giftcard in usd here is hard. Other than that, I still think that they should buff the anniversary rewards, as they are still quite underwhelming, overall the gameplay is good.
It good and graphics are insanely good but the thing that I don't like about this is hard to find good game like this lucky that Genshin impact has finally in mobile now

Best game I've ever played but it takes a lot of storage T^T The story is fantastic and runs very deep. The charaxters are all charming and unique. The gameplay is so much fun and keeps me very entertained. I never thought I would enjoy a video game so much. I am so happy I started playing and I can't wait to see where this journey will take me. The biggest downside is the amount of storage it occupies. I hope they find a way to optimize this.

I found out about this game like a year ago when I read something about it being a BOtW clone, and I've been impatiently waiting for it's release, now it's here and I LOVE it! It's got some zelda elements to it but I think it's better. I have it on my phone and PS4 and I cant believe its free on both! The ONLY thing I wish was possible was to connect & sync my gameplay across all platforms so I don't have to start over from the beginning each time. Otherwise it's fantastic. ‚ù§Ô∏è

At first, it was a very fun game. Then, once you progress later in game, the resin system appear. The resin system is so limiting that you basically stuck, cannot upgrade weapon, cannot upgrade character, etc. I'll probably leave this game soon, as the grind get really crazy after the initial stage, almost impossible to stay as F2P user unless you just want to torture yourself. Genshin Impact ‚ùå‚ùå Resin Impact ‚úÖ‚úÖ

Game is free and some of the content is good. I dont like the resin system and most of the artifacts that i get from the dungens is garbage. I feel like the drop rate is rigged. For example, if i try to farm the set i want alone in my world, i don't get the set i want. But if i farm it in my friends world, i get it easily. We(me and my friend) try to farm our sets by visiting one another. Its so frustrating. And gems are so over priced. I have spend money on this game. But now i wish didn't.

At first it was very good, now this game is horrible to play with phone.Voltage charge daily quest doesn't work. Also oh archon, and gourmet supremos doesn't continue, even if I do it right, I got the same quest again. Finally in the abyss it takes the enemies too much time to spawn. Feed back system shows an error,and don't let me send any feed back.

This game is amazing. I was immediately met by OP graphics with a beautiful soundtrack (and sfs), along with clear instructions on how to play and graceful animations. Every movement is beautifully animated. Unlike other mobile rpgs, this one has an EXTREMELY engaging storyline that makes you feel like you're really in the game. All characters have their own charismatic personalities that are hard to forget. You really have to take your time to complete the stories. 5/5

Production quality is top tier. Art, music and gameplay animations are beautiful. Pumps constant stream of updates and new characters. Freebies in game can be limited but I honestly don't mind it as much because I value quality over quantity. I just hope mihoyo can throw more endgame contents at us because it is getting stale after exploring the new maps. That said, still a great game!

Since I don't own a device with a lot of capacity, I might eventually have to stop playing this game, which I've been playing for nearly a year. Regarding that issue, I'm hoping the Genshin team would scale down the game's overall size as it takes up a lot of room on computers and I can't even begin to imagine how much space it would take up if all the regions were added.

The game overall is good. It gives nice player experiences such as quests, battles, and probably events. The story of the game is amazing. It captures the attention of players, meaning that not only the players can visualize what is happening, but also feel what these characters are going through. Great Game, Great Story? With that you can learn much more about people just like in the real world. Great Game overall.

Best game ever. It is so relaxing to play. And good lord, they are not trying to add more end game content. We don't need more end game content. It just needs to be relaxing to play and not stress about getting stronger to play end game. Well, overall, beautiful OST, art is superb, same goes to gameplay. Really looking forward to the Anime adaptation

This game is quite good. Even though i haven't been playing Genshin impact for a long time. I can say that the story,Lore,The breathtaking scenery,and the Backgrounds of each characters is Good. No Best. This game can be addictive sometimes in a good way. There are times is you are facing hardship in this game which make things fun in my opinion.

Needs controller support playing this on my tablet with touch screen I don't like iOS has controller support give it to us for Android!. I play this game on occasion for PC where I can use mouse and keyboard but would love to be able to sit back and relax in my living room and watch TV with my wife and play this game with a Controller 8bitdo Pro 2 would be amazing on this.

I love this game so much I hope the game gives u more primo tho I'll go broke XD well the artstyle and character fesign is so detailed. The game is very exciting to play for me this game is the best open world rpg game.

I'm lazy to write reviews but this game is just PERFECT. It has everything I was looking for in a game, free roam, good main and side stories, fun and bug free fantasy world... It's a delight to play, you can see how much has gone into this game (even common people have been voiced) and best of all, it's NOT pay to win, which actually makes me want to support this game. It kinda reminds me of ALO from sword art online (?). Thankyou developers fire making the dream game I've been looking for :)

I genuinely don't like how the serenetea pot works, you have to do a bunch of bugs and stuff before you are satisfied with the design or furniture. I would like it to be easier to place furniture without having to do the bug or glitch(merging items/furniture freely). It's just really difficult and I usually take half an hour to make 1 building because I have loads of bugs to do in order to make it pretty.

I have no complaints with this game. Yes the One year anniversary rewards were quite unfair but think of the other events the character design the World Generation and Graphics are all amazing and they took time for it to give Travelers an amazing time in the open world map and stories. Lets appreciate the Producers for giving us the Amazing Experience And Lets not be disappointed on it if we dont like certain events theres still so much more to this game other than those..

I am new to this game, so far I enjoy playing it. My only suggestion is that, they must not bar adventurers from leveling up their ranks. Because, god! It is so hard to do the ascension task at level 25. Though my heroes are at a higher level, with the right element to combat the electro hypostasis, still my heroes were underpowered. It is so tiring to play and deal with them over and over again.. you should also consider hero replacements if your deployed heroes were all down.haha

I love the game but the issue of resin limits my enjoyment and I really wish theres a skip option on the story or dialogues. I get it tho a story for you to understand and know the character or any but here I am taping like a maniac to finish asap to continue playing cause I have things to do or arrive super tired and I don't have the energy to endure all. A skip will let me enjoy it and I could read it later on the game archieves cause I really appreciate the though on every stor.
This game made me fell in love with a fictional characters>3 (LoL jk, but great game though)

The game is fantastic and I love it with all my heart. But one thing I don't like personally is ascending characters. If you don't do it before your world Level increases your screwed in a sense. I learned the hard way. But honestly I love everything about the game from the characters to the scenery. Literally everything is beautiful and I feel so relaxed when playing.

The game is really good so far apart from some glitches in the cutscene but they cleared up after awhile. Controls are good and responsive, just need to get used to placement. The ONE MAJOR downside: PLEASE LET ME PET THE DOGS. They looked at you longingly and I cannot do anything about it. My animal lover heart breaks everytime üò≠üò≠

I've played the game since 1.2 and are level 54 now, if you're a new player then I recommend that u enjoy the game instead of grinding and rushing through it. You can spend money for other characters if you want to but I urge you not to wish for a character just because someone tells you it's overpowered and stuff you can play the game normally with 4 star characters you get as you play and eventually a 5 star ones. I do admit the end game gets somewhat stale at times when you finish events
A great game to get lost in for hours...... Love how I can just chill at home and play this on the PlayStation then go on the road and pick up right where I left off on my phone.

Arguably the best game on Mobile right now with stunning graphics and awesome writing not to mention the great animations and character design but it does have its own share of issues mainly a boring and kinda repetitive grinding system you have to level up like a minimum 6 Adventure every story act which continued to get harder every time and the quests are kinda repetitive and boring also the game can't be played on mobile devices unless they have 4 RAM or more but that's a phone issue.

With all honesty it's one of the best games I have ever played. I'm not the anime type of person but the graphics and colors in the game makes it really good. It's also the type of game from wich you can take a break without feeling any type of addiction and always being a pleasure logging back in.

Tl;dr be prepared to be disappointed if you're a gacha-player who likes to grind/play a lot but in general its very enjoyable. Many problems appeae in the form of of end content and the energy / timegated system to get artifacts/progress for better gear, the story is very enjoyable but dont expect something well-written, a lot of character problems, event rewards are okay but itself very boring to play, there is no replayable content, side quests can become very tiresome and the gacha is insane.

It is my favourite game, thoigh it takes a lot of storage to install every update I understand the map is big and there are a lot of quests added idk people are complaining abt rewards and the characters appearance when there is really nothing wrong it took long to download but it was worth it. I understand if you dont agree with me its your opinion not mine. But that isn't enough let me add I dont like how the resin stays at 160 and doesn't add but I'm not really mad abt it its enough for now.
I really like the graphics and the game play of the app its amazing specially the characters and quests!

Used to the best among its genre for a couple of months after its initial release. Now, its nothing but a hollow shell of its former self. Terrible progression system, hardly any content left after AR 45 besides the merciless grind unless you dump $. Poor RNG system with a buggy Mobile port. Graphically, its really appealing to the eyes but thats about it. I used to love this game but now even the veteran players have to admit that its an unfinished game. Best of luck in your future endeavours.

i really like the game so much, the graphics are well good as well as the soundtrack. interesting story and quest üòäüòä. One problem that i experienced is that the game sometimes stop during NPC conversation and also when moving around even though we have fast internet connection. ü•∫

I adore this game; the graphics are stunning, and the stories are enthralling. But there is one minor detail: it would be nice to be able to switch between servers without losing your progress. I've always wanted to play the game with other friends, but they all seem to be on different servers, and I just wish I could.

The first thing that happened when I loaded up the game was a 7.5 MB download, when I actually got into the game, the cutscenes were way too much for my phone to handle, it was searingly hot and the cutscenes were very glitchy, after picking my character, the game crashed and I wasn't able to open the app without it crashing again. Update 15/01/2022: I tried to download on my laptop which took 2 ¬Ω hours then the game wouldn't launch

As a huge fan of Legend of Zelda: Breath of the wild, I picked up this game instantly. It's a great game for people who want to commit time and money but it's still amazing as a casual free to play player. Character and environment designs are beautiful and game mechanics are easy to pick up for newbies but mastering them is still challenging enough to keep higher skill level players engaged.

The game as a whole is mind-blowing and is state-of-the-art. I mean, who would've expected such high quality graphics, precise details like shadowing, day and night availability, and a vast terrain to visit with such beautiful sights. Exploring the map everytime will lead you to find something new. Only problem is the chance of getting a 5-star character in the temporary banner, and 5-star character in the permanent banner....

Full of potential, but ultimately just another money hungry company that doesn't listen to the player base, reaching a point of releasing unfinished and unplayable characters with the premise of being eventually usable with future character releases for team composition. No end game as-well. Really slow paced main story development.

The story line and world quests are one of the best stories out there. The music is the BEST part of this game. The anniversary rewards are very low or non existent though. I wish they also give an option to change the gender of the traveller. I mistakenly selected kumine instead of aether and now there is no option to change it. I am even willing to pay for it in a f2p game. The artifact farming is very very bad though. You can farm for the good artifact fir months and still not have it.
So far it been great but the only thing I don't like is the fact that all the icons on the screen but other than that it's one hell of a game and the graphics are pretty great as well

It started very well. The base of the game is amazing. Characters, exploration, world design, music. But mihoyo does not care for their player base and is unwilling to change. The player rewards, specifically for long term veterans are really non-existent. This is separate from the anniversary reward backlash. The games rewards as a whole are so greedy and even though I've invested a lot of money and time, I get back nothing. I am nearing quitting because there simply isn't any endgame content.

This game is really good, but the phone takes up way too much space and most phones can not even run it without kt being laggy or crashing. Not everyone can afford a expensive phone that can run all this game making this game lose a lot of players. If there is a setting for players to have lower graphics. This game is too advanced for most phones.
it's a great game wish I could make it 5 and a half stars because everything about it is good tbh except it takes a lot of storage for each update

The game has potential. But it lacks many things like events with rewards. Also the resin system seems to be a bit odd‚Äî that you need full 20hrs to fill it up. Which is for the free to play side, gates them pretty hard. Everyone in the game wants to be strong. Do you guus think players will go away if they get strong? I don't think so... I think more players will come if it was like that. Thank you for the wonderful game. I hope you all to get this game up and better!

The load times and wait times are worth it. This game has so much detail put into it. Honestly, I've only started it and just... WOW. That being said, it's likely going to have payment based options. However, if I could just get the whole game for free on the Nintendo Switch for $60, I might just consider oumping money into it.

I like the game. The storyline, plot, sceneries, characters. I'm glad that you fixed the Signora, Yun Jin, and Dvalin glitch. Though, it would be a WONDERFUL experience if you were to change the glitch where you can't see ice. Also with the text damage, which is really bothering me because it's hard to showcase or see your character's damage. That is all I have to say.

The gameplay is fun, but improving your team in this game is extremely slow. You need to kill the same boss a lot of times, farm a large amount of gold, exp and skill books, so you need more than a month worth of energy to reach max level and level the skills to lvl 9, lvl 10 requires a very limited item, for a single character. Don't forget about the equipment, the RNG for getting artifacts is insane, you could be farming for months to get a set of just decent artifacts, also spending energy.

I love the game and everything about it but after 1.2 I can't play the game without litterally crashing 4-5 per hour.üò§üò§üò§... A well developed game, awesome visual effects, cool music and many more. Enhancements / requirements : Might need more info on what we need to do in making the character stronger like a demo at the start of game where we will learn about various enhancements/stuffs that are available rather than us surfing the internet to learn

great game, amazing and exciting music, lots of enemies to battle with, and so much more. I do have one problem, as a minor money spender on this game, I have difficulty with saving up primogems because of the lack of rewards in chests and commissions, I wished there was more than just 2-5 primogems. I understand that you can get primos from the events but sometimes the events would only be giving around 30 primos per challenge.

Great game! Very great when you have interest in games that include adventure and an open world to go on journeys that have not been voyaged before. Discovering new weapons, artifacts, solving puzzles, and more, are great features of the game. Thank you Developers!

Variety of things you can do in the game. Takes some time to learn every nook in the game (specially with artifacts and their stats) but overall a fun learning experience. If you like adventures and story you should totally give this game a go. The only thing I can complain about is resin cap. But definitely 5 stars from me.
The update is boring and 5 star rates are a little to less.so I don't kinda enjoy collecting alot of primogems just to waste in 0.5second and getting 1 four star weapon.

Playing since launch (2 years) and have thoroughly enjoyed combat, exploration, events, etc. But there are some elements of the game that are not to my taste. The rng is bad, from trying to power up your artifacts, getting good artifacts, to just getting a character you want. The positive being there is a pity system but you potentially have to spend 180 wishes (approx. $450) to get the character you want Lastly is the lack of character roadmaps and time to prepare for upcoming characters.

The story is exquisite. It is incredible, and the action is just right. The music is not only tailored to fit the regions, but I'm amazed by how beautiful they all sound. All details including the finer details when you look closer at them can really be worth exploring. Truly an experience worth the storage and worth spending money on despite it being a free game. Well done in creating such and excellent story game.

I like the games it's simple but super good, and getting character is not that hard and i like that... And the one that i don't like is the outfit of our mc(Main Character)what i want to see is if the character change elements to anemo to geo the outfit will also changed.That is the missing part for me the Mc is just to plain. But Overall 5Star because the game deserve it!!!

Amazing artistic choices are clearly visible in the environment and the game has great storytelling and appealing multidimensional characters. Though problems still arise, the gacha system is very greedy, the resin system inhibits endgame progression, and the lack of account security is concerning to say the least. EDIT: Mihoyo have clearly demonstrated that they do not listen to the player base whatsoever nor do they care about the current state of the game. Hopefully, they can hastily resolve this predicament and reengage with the community because I can no longer recommend this game to anyone

The game is great but it's so hard to get better characters to make the gameplay easier. I wish I'd known that you can't crossplay between two different regions. I wouldn't have downloaded this on my phone and pc. It actually sucks that I can't play with my friends and get their help on the EU server. I'm stuck on the NA server because the ping is better but I don't want to grind on the EU server just to play with my friends. Don't download if you think you can crossplay. Single player is fine.
Its pretty hard to get 5 star characters but it is a nice game

Heard many amazing things about this game. So when I got the chance to download I was really excited; when I played it, I was really disappointed. It took extremely long to load and took up a bunch of space. However, that wasn't my biggest pet peeve about the game. My biggest problem was that it wouldn't allow me to complete my first quest. Every time I defeated two fire monsters, it would keep on coming back by two's not allowing me to finish the quest. I think it's a bug on only mobile.

PROS: Unique combat system using elemental reactions, BGM & overworld design is immersive, great story & characters with huge world to explore. CONS: ANXIETY (yes, I read the article). That aside the reason for -2 star was the lack of love for it's players especially F2P & the greedy business model that earns billion $. Still recommended if you like ARPG with exploration but it's not worth to invest & spend money if the future you get is only new weaker characters & expanding tedious world.

This game will only be fun for 2 months at most. After 2 months, just delete the game. It's just a grindy garbage. The game restricts progress with resin system and horrible RNG ü§Æ. Permanent content is non existent. The open world is basically dead after the first 1~2 months of exploration. The story is amazing but archon quests only comes out once every few months so it loses momentum. Unless you want to waste your time on hours of unmeaningful content, don't bother playing this gacha trash.

You're doing great with the map expansions. Puzzles are fun. Finding secret/hidden chest is fun. Doing hidden quest is fun. But, exploring the map with maxed out characters is boring because you can do 1 hit per kill. Please add high risk zones for maxed out characters. Make us feel that we still need healers while exploring maps.
I enjoy playing this game. I love it. Will continue playing this game. Mostly excited for Natlan (Pyro nation)!

Had a very long loading time especially when it displays the elemental symbols. Also when I enter the game my internet speed goes down to 0 kb/s and says reconnecting to server every time. But when I watch movies in YouTube speed is fast. The landscape change each time I rotate or move around. What is happening?! Is it my phone? Can I know the system specifications required to play this game? I really want to play this game
Game Is just great especially the music is so peaceful. In high graphics and 60 fps it's like heaven to eyes! I liked the story too.

Pretty decent at first, wonderful graphics and amazing character designs. However as you level up, it becomes increasingly difficult to gain any items for gacha summons and just to progress. Resin, an in game item used to progress, replenishes way too slow. Overall a fun experience but many fundamental flaws that ruin it.

This game is wonderful. The graphics are beautiful, the story and characters are well thought and the fighting system isn't to hard. I hope we get end game content that isn't the spiral abyss at some point though, because other than that there really is no reason to build your character aside from yourself

It's a fun game! It's very well made and extremely detailed, and an engaging adventure game, and the most fun I've had in a while. Edit: I have some things to say about the game that kind of ruins the enjoyment: - Grind-y nature: -Fluctuating Writing Quality: -Strange Company to Audience relationship..otherwise, it's still a fun game if you aren't burnt out by the grinding.
1 star because of the lack of communication and censoring. You can't treat your players like this. If you delete this again, I'll post again.

It's a fun game, and I'm excited to see what comes next in the storyline! However, learning how to use artifacts/ build your characters is a little difficult to understand, especially for new players. Plus grinding for characters isn't my favorite thing to do. I would also like to add that syncing and deleting accounts is too complicated. I used to play on mobile when I started out, and recently moved my account to PC and the process is very nerve-wracking.

This game is visually stunning and has been an amazing and enjoyable experience. However it gets stale once you reach the end game and wait for new content to drop. There is a diminishing return when investing in characters past certain level due to layers of RNG. Rewards beyond AR50 is not worth the effort or time. It's a better experience to take a break between patches, but currency for wishes is too rare and require daily log in and events. Mixed feelings about the company.

I enjoyed the game a lot! There are a lot of challenging quests, I just downloaded in 5 days ago and now I'm at AR 20. It was really fun! The mechanics of the game is understandable, not to easy yet not too complex either, its just right. I love it so much. Though I began to realize as we go on to a higher rank, the little we get to see chests? Is that part of the game or something? Or is it a bug?

I love this game and all of its features. I've been playing for a while and it never fails to keep me intrigued. I just want to know when it will have controller support for Android users? I play on the go a lot since my job requires me to be away from home so I can't always play on my laptop. However there are some flaws with just touchscreen play that would make controller support that much more seamless. It is provided for IOS mobile players so I don't understand why it's taking so long.

This is a game with which I have mixed feelings. How to make a technically flawless game, with great visuals, great music, good gameplay, though with a (for my taste) forgettable story, a lack of originality (BotW and its idiosyncrasies), and a huge -- and sometimes boring -- open world? And, above all, with dopaminergic overstimulation carefully designed to induce addiction (and not necessarily fun)? In short: a frankenstein with an identity crisis; cute, but ordinary.
fix auto aim la, rather closest to strongest enemy... bro I missed so many reaction eh (yes it's skill issue) but at least have option like that for preference la

Good storyline, great graphics, even greater game play. Loot boxes is quite expensive and RNG low, but f2p is perfectly fine to progress in game. Grinding rewards does not scale well with world level, meaning it gets grindy at higher levels.
I'm glad I download this Game is Such a Good StoryLines,Quests,Characters and Such a Details in every Graphics...I wish it could last on Foreverü§ó

Storage problem has been solved!! Big thank you to hoyoverse. Genshin impact isn't a bad game. Very fun when you first start, and I still find a few things to do even if I'm near reaching the level limit. The company listens to the consumers well, and they have great customer service. I only recommend when much time is on your hands, however, for it's quite hardcore.

If I could, I would give it 6 out of 5 stars, the graphics are beautiful for being a mobile game, the soundtrack is amazing, adding an atmosphere to the experience, and the game balances out the power and abilities of all the characters extremely well, making it so that the 5 stars don't outperform the lower 4 stars by that much. Overall amazing game, if you are a fan of any Zelda-like experience of fantasy and adventure, well then this is a must try game.

As a player of both honkai and genshin, you have made a wonderful and fun game. Even with your current situation with the player comunnity, chin up. So dont worry, keep up the goodwork.Also can you fix the problem on my samsung note 9, the cutscenes still stutter way bad.

The game gets too repetitive, I wish there was more incentive to explore the open world instead of going to point a to point b using teleporters. There needs to be more things to do rather than a few puzzles and enemies randomly placed around the area. The open world feels empty and just feels like it's just there with barely any purpose.

This game is very very good, i would recommend this to my friends that haven't play, if i had friends, because the graphic is good, gameplay is fun, easy to get characters and stuff, intresting story, but after adventure rank 40, i'm starting to feel bored because all i do is farming artifact, commision, and stuff. i would be pleased if you add events more often and add many main quest for ar 40+

Absolutely a masterpiece! the stunning graphics , the story and the main game exploration never gets you get bored of this game highly recommended for players looking for a time consuming game. The android version's graphics is very bad compared to the PC ones i can feel like the PC low graphics is the mobile highest and alsor some mobile players i saw complaining that the game is not optimised for low end devices i know that this game is hard to be optimized so it is better they stop complainin

I was recommended this game a lot by my friends, but it... just doesn't work well on android. Every time it gets to the "Wearing headphones may improve your gaming experience" part, the game usally crashes and closes down. Also, the loading takes WAY too long. As well as the dowloading.

I don't say this very often but for free game, this is absolutely stellar. I'm only in the second part of the prologue but I haven't been asked to buy a single thing and haven't seen a single ad... Just for that it deserves five stars on top of the fact it's a very comprehensive game. I can play it on my phone and then log in on my PC and play it and on an even bigger screen, and keep the same game on both. If you haven't tried this game on your PC I highly recommend it. It looks great.

This is the future of mobile gaming. I wasnt sure what to expect after realizing it was going to take 5GB of storage to download. But from the gameplay to the graphics, im blown away. Im getting heavy Breath of the Wild vibes but in mobile game form. Joystick controls are a bit clunky but the rest is epic.

I was great! But my experience that GI didn't properly downloaded, and that it became buggy, the characters look dead with no facial expression, the cutscenes we're laggy and static audio, So I'm going to re-download it, hope it downloads properly. Also i really want a cross play between ps4 and mobile if possible in the mean time!

This game is pretty fun to play. I'm a newbie so I came late in the update 1.2 which has a problem for archers in mobile since I can't move the gyro aim so I just had to manually adjust the character to aim. They fixed it this 1.3 update and I can finally practice aiming. However, there are more bugs now. Defeated monsters and mobs don't dissipate, they just stay there as well as interactive animals. Also enemies with half their hp stop attacking so I can't finish the mission.

It's so good. The art is great, character are fun. Everything was great until this recent update. It seems like the app can't go 5 minutes without crashing That and it freezes half the time now. This really sucks because I've been playing since day one, and nothing like this has happened until this recent update. It makes me sad :/

i used to roll my eyes at the ads because most mobile games don't live up to their promises - until i tried it out. this one delivers and i've been absolutely obsessed for over a month now. never wanna stop playing <3 edit: i hope they'll look into optimization for chromebooks more. it crashes half way through the download even though i'm on the latest software. it's totally fine on my phone which theoretically has lower specs.

This game is just wonderful. It has the best stories, backstories, and sights. It always has theories that are fun to read. This game easy play since it can easily guide you to the location of the quest, there are waypoints as well which makes traveling easier. They also have co op which is one of the many things games like this don't have.

I love the game so far. The story is pretty good, graphics is good for a mobile game, I seen a bit of bugs but they are still working on the game so it's understandable. There's really not much to complain, the game is fantastic. I wish I could connect my controller somehow so I can play the game a bit more comfortable. The buttons a bit close it's manageable but I feel if I could use a controller it would be better.
Five stars for the game,I love it But still 4gb update, it's too big for update
One star till game starts working again I've tried everything for error code 4201 it's not my device it's the game

It's amazing and all but my phone can't take that much storage and there are already many things that I have a problem with, especially visual bugs. Like the grass, ice (on bodies of water), and especially the damage taken not being seen. Overall, it's a great game, I love it sm but please do fix these visual bugs as it greatly affects the gameplay. Much love to HoYoVerse<3

I like the open world gameplay but the quests can be a little painfull it just overwhelmeds you like do this do that is kinda hard but I do like it tho some quest where good and others I hate but good 10/10
This game is extremely amazing. I just love it. I just wish we could repeat the archons' quest as we wish.

It was fun when you're starting playing it but as you progress, it will get hard at a certain point. If you have a lot of patience in building/upgrading a certain character you want, this game is good for you. Edit: Due to the new update, the game became laggy, keep crashing, and it's been hard to control the keys (to mobile users). I'm not satisfied in terms of the new setting update.

The only bad thing in the mobile version is the character switching, characters swap places in the row while switching which makes it difficult to conduct reactions as it is very likely to select the wrong character. Change it to the same way the pc version uses, it's much better. I request the developers to change it.

The game has lot of qualities, I strongly recommend it. The players are kind and have good humor. The characters are also very hot, and their voices are also hot and charming. Some are cute and wholesome. You can't help but get immersed into the story. The cutscenes are also very enjoyable. The more our Adventure Level level up, the more monsters level up.

This is one my most favourite games. From the storyline to the game play is a masterpiece. The characters have substance and the lore is very interesting. It takes time and effort to build up your team. But that's what makes it better. Also all those complaining about lags should check the system requirements before installing the game runs perfectly fine on both my Samsung phone and pc.
Excellent game ,it just has forced updates like Fontaine ,so make option to not get or get newer things for those with storage problems.

It's pretty amazing to see an Anime game come to life. I personally have never played anime games in the past so experiencing this new world is very unique and entertaining. I've also got this game on my console so I am able to play this on the go too. What is also good is that you are able to crossplay with majority of the platforms (PC, PS4, mobile, no Xbox atm üò≠). Alas, in order to play with friends, you must be adventure rank 16 which takes a bit of time to get too. Overall, amazing game üëç
It is the most enjoyable and greatest game i have played. It has its storoes, development and character to every character in the game.

Grate game! But there's a problem, when I play it on pc the game is just fine but when it comes to mobile, the problem strucks. All the boss are bugged or glitched my whole screen is filled with lines when fighting devalin. Please fix it for the sake of android users and thanks also for the grate experience. Been playing this game from first release but unfortunately I lost my first account so, overall ... Killer game, love it.

I really like the game but it doesn't run nearly smooth even in the lowest settings on my 8GB ram phone. Not just that it is extremely difficult to catch butterflies, lizards, fireflies or the crystal core flies , they are really hard to catch. Most of the time even if I am standing closer than 1cm to these things I can't catch then because the option doesn't show and it really ruins the mood.
